21|27|Kare-ra (tenshi-tachi) wa, kare yori saki ni tsugeru koto mo naku, mata kare no meirei ni motodzuite kōdō suru dakedearu.
21|28|Kare wa, kare-ra (tenshi) izen ni aru mono mo,-igo ni aru mono o mo shitte ora re, kare ga ukeireru mono no soto wa, torinashi o shinai. Kare-ra (tenshi) wa kare ni osore tsukaeru.
21|29|Moshi kare-ra no naka ni,`hontōni watashi wa, kare to wa betsu no kamidearu.' To iu mono ga areba, ware wa kono yōna mono o, jigoku de mukuiru. Fugi o okonau mono ni ko no yō ni mukuiru.
21|30|Shinkō shinai-sha-tachi wa wakaranai no ka. Ten to ji wa, issho ni awasatte itaga, ware wa sore o waketa. Soshite mizu kara issai no ikimono o tsukutta nodearu. Kare-ra wa sore demo shinkō shinai no ka.
21|31|Ware wa mata, daichi ni yamayama o suete kare-ra fushinjin-sha ni tottemo daichi o yuruginai mono to shita. Mata soko ni, ōrai no tame no hiroi michi o tsukutta. Sore de kare-ra wa kanarazu risuru tokoro ga arou.
21|32|Sarani ware wa, ten o yane to shi shugo shita. Soredemo kare-ra wa, korera no shirushi kara somuki saru.
21|33|Kare koso wa hiru to yoru, mata taiyō to tsuki o sōzō sa reta katadearu. Sorera wa, kidō ni ukande iru.
21|34|Ware wa anata izen no dare ni taishite mo, towa ni ikiru mono to shita koto wanai. Anata wa shinu no ni, kare-ra wa eikyū ni ikiru to iu no ka.
21|35|Hito wa subete shi o ajiwau. Ware wa shiren no tame ni, kyōji to kichiji de anata gata o kokoromiru. Soshite (saigo wa) ware ni kisa reru nodearu.
21|36|Shinkō shinai mono wa anata o miru toki, tada chōshō no-teki ni suru. (Kare-ra wa iu. ) `Kono-shadesu ka, anata gata no kamigami o hihan suru mono wa.' Kare-ra wa jihibukaki okata no kunkai o, 冒 ( 演 ? ) Suru monodearu.
21|37|Ningen wa kimijika ka ni tsukura rete iru. Ware wa sugu ni shirushi o shimesudearou.Dakara isoide are ni saisoku shite wa naranai.
21|38|Mata kare-ra wa,`anata gata no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, sono yakusoku wa nanji (kuru no) ka.' To iu.
21|39|Moshi fushin-sha ga (sonohi) sonotoki,-gao kara mo, mata se karamo gōka o fusegu koto ga dekizu, mata tasukeru mono mo nai hi no koto o shitteitanaraba.
21|40|Iya, sore wa totsuzen kare-ra o osotte, odoroki awate saseyou. Kare-ra wa sore o yokeru chikara mo naku, yūyo sa renaidearou.
21|41|Anata izen no shito-tachi mo, tashika ni chōshō sa reta. Daga chōshō shita mono wa, chōshō shite ita koto ni torikakoma reru nodearu.
21|42|Itteyaroga ī. `Jihibukaki okata (no ikari) kara, chūya dare ga, anata gata o mamoreyou ka.' Soredemo kare-ra wa,-nushi o nenjiru koto kara somuki saru.
21|43|Soretomo kare-ra ni wa, ware igai ni kare-ra o shugo dekiru kamigami ga aru no ka. Kare-ra (kamigami) wa, jibun jishin mo tasuke rarezu, mata ware kara fusegi ōsenai.
21|44|Sorenanoni, ware wa korera no mono ya sono sosen-tachi o kyōraku sa se, sono kigen made nagarae saseta. Ware ga kono (fushinjin-sha no)-chi ni kite, sono sumizumi kara seifuku shite iru no o minai no ka. Soredemo kare-ra wa shōri-shana no ka.
21|45|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa tada keiji ni yotte, anata gata ni keikoku suru dakedearu.'Daga kikanai mono wa, keikoku sa rete mo sono yobikake ga kikoenai.
21|46|Soshite anata no omo no chōbatsu no ibuki ga, mo shikare-ra ni (sukoshidemo) furereba,`ā , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi wa hontōni fugi o okonaimashita.' To iu.
21|47|Ware wa shinpan no hi no tame ni, kōseina ase o mōkeru. 1-Ri to shite tatoe keshi hitotsubu no omo-sadeatte mo futō ni atsukawa reru koto wanai. Ware wa sore o (keisan ni) mochidasu. Ware wa seisan-sha to shite banzendearu.
21|48|Katsute ware wa, mūsā to hārūn ni, shikibetsu to kōmyō to, osoreru mono e no kunkai o sazuketa.
21|49|Me ni mienakute mo omo o osoreru mono to, shinpan no toki o osoreru mono e no kunkai o sazuketa.
21|50|Kono (kuruān) koso wa, ware ga kudashita shukufuku yutakana kunkaidearu. Anata gata wa, soredemo nao kyohi suru no ka.
21|51|Ware wa izen iburāhīmu ni, hōseina okonai o sazuketa. Ware wa kare o yoku shitte iru.
21|52|Kare ga chichi to kare no hitobito ni, kō itta toki o omoi nasai. `Anata gataga sūhai suru korera no gūzō wa, nani monodearu no ka.'
21|53|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, sosen ga sorera o sūhai suru no o mimashita.'
21|54|Kare wa itta. `Anata gata to anata gata no sosen wa, akiraka ni ayamatte ita nodearu.'
21|55|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa shinri o (nishi? ) Shita nodesu ka. Soretomo tawamureru-shana nodesu ka.'
21|56|Kare wa itta. `Sōde wanai. Anata gata no omo wa, ten to ji no omo. (Mu kara) sorera (tenchi) o sōzō sa reta katadearu. Soshite watashi wa sore ni taisuru shōnin no hitoridearu.
21|57|Arrā ni chikatte, watashi wa anata gataga se o mukete satta nochi ni, anata gata no gūzō ni hitotsu no saku o megurasou.'
21|58|Kōshite kare wa, kanarazu kare-ra ga soko ni kaette kurudearou to (omotte), yuiitsu-tai no kyozō o nozoki sorera o tataki kowashita.
21|59|Kare-ra wa itta. `Dare ga watashi-tachi no kamigami o kōshita nodeshou ka. Hontōni kare wa fugina monodesu.'
21|60|(Aru mono ga) itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, iburāhīmu to iu wakamono ga, sono katagata o hihan suru no o kiita.'
21|61|Kare-ra wa itta. `Sorenara, sono-sha o nyū bito no me no mae ni hikidase. Kanarazu mina ga shōgen surudeshou.'
21|62|`Iburāhīmu yo, anatana nodesu ka. Watashi-tachi no kamigami ni taishi ko no yōna koto o shita no wa.' To ichidō wa itta.
21|63|Kare wa (kotaete),`iya, iya, sorera no naka no kono ōkī (gūzō) ga sore o shita nodesu. Kare-ra ga kuchi ga kikeru mononara kiite mi nasai.' To itta.
21|64|Soko de kare-ra wa, mizukara (ryōshin ni) kaerimite (kokoro ni) itta. `Tashikani anata gata (jishin) ga warui nodesu.'
21|65|-Kan o oite, kare-ra wa mata hon'i shi (te i~tsu)ta. `Anata wa korera (kamigami) no,-guchi ga kikenai no o yoku shitte imashita.'
21|66|Iburāhīmu wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, arrā igai no mono o sūhai suru nodesu ka. Anata gata o, sukoshi mo ekisezu mata son wa nai mono o.
21|67|Ā, nasakenai kotodesu. Anata gata mo, anata gataga arrā o sashioite sūhai suru mono-tachi mo. Anata gata wa, nao satoranai nodesu ka.'
21|68|Kare-ra wa itta. `Dōse yarunara, kare o yaki nasai. Soshite anata gata no kamigami o sukui nasai.'
21|69|(Sonotoki) ware wa meirei shita. `Hi yo, tsumetaku nare. Iburāhīmu no ue ni heian'are.'
21|70|Kare-ra wa kare ni taishi sakudō shiyou to shitaga, ware wa kare-ra o hidoi shippai-sha ni shita.
21|71|Ware wa kare to (sono oi no) rūto o, ban'yū no tame ni ware ga shukufuku shita ji ni sukuidashita.
21|72|Soshite kare ni (ko no) isuhāku o sazuke, mata sono-jō no tamamono to shite (mago no) yaakōbu o sazuketa. Ware wa sorezore o, tadashī mono ni shita.
21|73|Ware wa kare-ra o, waga meirei o hōjite (hitobito o) michibiku dōshi to shi, kare-ra ni zenkō ni hagemi, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o suru yō keiji shita. Soshite kare-ra wa isshōkenmei ni ware ni tsukaeta.
21|74|Mata ware wa rūto ni handan-ryoku to eichi to o sazuke, katsu harenchina okonai ni fukeru machi kara, kare o sukuidashita. Kare-ra wa,-nushi no okite ni somuku jaakuna mindeatta.
21|75|Kare (rūto) o ware no jihi ni hitara seta. Hontōni kare wa tadashī monodeatta.
21|76|Mata nūfudaga, izen kare ga inotta toki o omoi nasai. Ware wa sore ni kotaete, kare to kare no kazoku o, ōkī sainan kara sukutta.
21|77|Ware wa, waga shirushi o kyohi suru min ni taishi, kare o tasuketa. Hontōni kare-ra wa jaakuna mindeatta. Sorede ware wa, subete kare-ra o obore saseta.
21|78|Mata dāūdo to suraimāndaga, aru mono no hitsuji ga yakan kōchi ni mayoikomi, sakumotsu o arashitaga, sore ni tsuite saiban shita toki no koto o omoi nasai. Ware wa kare-ra no saiban no risshō-shadeatta.
21|79|Ware wa sore o suraimān ni rikai sa seta. Soshite sorezore ni handan-ryoku to eichi o sazuke, mata ware wa dāūdo ni yamayama ya tori-tachi o shitagawa sete (omo o) tomoni tatae saseta. Sore wa (mina) ware no shiwazadeatta.
21|80|Mata ware wa, kare ni (kusari) katabira o tsukuru jutsu o oshie, bōryoku kara anata gata no mi o mamora seta. Soredemo anata gata wa kansha shinai no ka.
21|81|Mata ware wa, mōi o furuu kaze (o okosu jutsu) o suraimān ni (sazuke), kare (suraimān) no meirei no shita ni, ware ga shukufuku suru ji ni fuka seta. Ware wa subete no koto o shiru monodearu.
21|82|Mata akuma-tachi no naka ni mo, kare no tame ni sensui suru mono ari, mata sono soto no shigoto o shite iru mono mo atta. Ware wa itsumo kare-ra o mihatte ita.
21|83|Mata aiyūbu (ni eichi to handan-ryoku o sazuketa). Kare wa omoni yobikaketa. `Hontōni saiyaku ga watashi ni furikakarimashita. Daga anata wa, jihibukai ue ni mo jihibukai kata de ara remasu.'
21|84|Sorede ware wa kore ni kotaete, kare ni toritsuita saiyaku o nozoki, kare ni kazoku o sazuke, sono hitobito o baika shita. (Koreha) ware kara no jihideari, mata ware ni tsukaeru mono ni taisuru kunkaidearu.
21|85|Mata isumāīru, idorīsu to zu ru kifurudearu. Zen'in ga yoku taeshinobu monodeatta.
21|86|Ware wa kare-ra o waga jihi ni yoku sa seta. Hontōni kare-ra wa, tadashī monodeatta.
21|87|Mata zun nūndearu. Kare ga gekido shite dekaketa toki o omoi nasai. Kare wa, ware ga jibun o nangi sa seru yōna koto wa nai to omoinagara mo, kurayaminonakade,`anata no soto ni kami wa arimasen. Anata no eikō o tataemasu. Hontōni watashi wa fugina monodeshita.' To sakenda.
21|88|Sorede ware wa kare ni kotae, kare o sono kunan kara sū tta. Ware wa kono yō ni, shinkō suru mono o kyūjo suru nodearu.
21|89|Mata zakarīyādearu. Kare ga omoni (inotte),`omo yo, mottomo sugureta sōzoku-sha de ara reru okata yo. Watashi o kodoku no mama hanatte okanaide kudasai.' To sakenda toki no koto o omoi nasai.
21|90|Sorede ware wa kore ni kotae, kare ni yahiyā o sazuke, mata tsuma o kare ni fusawashiku shita. Kare-ra wa tagaini kisotte zenkō ni dō shimi, mata kibō to osore o motte, ware ni inotte ita. Ware ni taishi (tsuneni) kenkyodeatta.
21|91|Mata jibun no teisetsu o mamotta on'na (maruyamu)dearu. Ware wa kano on'na ni waga rei o fukikomi, ka no on'na to Sonoko o ban'yū no tame no shirushi to shita.
21|92|Hontōni, anata gata no kono unma koso wa, yuiitsu no kyōdōtaidearu. Soshite ware wa anata gata no omodearu. Dakara ware ni tsukae nasai.
21|93|Sorenanoni kare-ra wa, sono (shūkyō-jō no) kotogara o, kare-ra no ma de kirihanashi (shūha o tsuku~tsu)ta. (Mamonaku) kare-ra wa mina ware ni kaeru nodearu.
21|94|Daredemo zenkō ni hagemi, shinkō shite iru mono wa, kesshite sono doryoku o munashiku sa reru koto wanai. Ware wa kare-ra no tame ni, kanarazu (sore o) kiroku shite iru.
21|95|Ware ga horoboshita toshi ni wa kinrei ga (kyōsei-teki ni) a tte, kare-ra wa kaette ko rarenaidearou.
21|96|Ya~ajūju to ma~ajūju ga kaihō sa rete, dono oka kara mo ikioi yoku kudatte kuru toki made wa.
21|97|Sonojitsu no yakusoku wa chikadzuite iru nodearu. Mi nasai. Shinkō shinai mono no me wa suwatte kite (iudearou). `Ā , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi wa kono koto o orosoka ni shite imashita. Iya, watashi-tachi wa fugina monodeshita.'
21|98|Hontōni anata gata (fushin-sha) mo, arrā no soto ni anata gata no sūhai suru mono mo, jigoku no nenryōdearu. Anata gata wa soko ni (kanarazu) ochite iku nodearu.
21|99|Korera ga moshi kamideattanaraba, soko ni ochiru yōna koto wa nakattadearou.Daga (kare-ra wa) sorezore, sono naka ni eien ni sumu nodearu.
21|100|Kare-ra wa sono Chū de umeku, sokode wa (soto ni nani mo) kikoenaidearou.
21|101|Ware kara zenkō (no kiroku) o izen ni atae rarete iru mono wa, jigoku kara tōku hanasa re,
21|102|soko no bina oto mo kikoenaidearou. Soshite kare-ra no tamashī ga nengan shite ita tokoro ni eien ni sumu.
21|103|Ōkina osore ga kare-ra o nayamasu koto wa naku, tenshi-tachi wa demukaete (iudearou). `Kore ga yakusoku sa reta, anata gata no hidesu.'
21|104|Sonohi ware wa, kakimono o maku yō ni sho ten o makiageru. Ware ga saisho sōzō shita yō ni, futatabi kurikaesu. Kore wa ware no sadameta yakusokudearu. Ware wa kanarazu sore o kansui suru.
21|105|Ware wa (mūsā) ni kunkai o sazuketa nochi, uta Atsushi no naka ni,`hontōni kono daichi wa, ware no tadashī shimo be ga kore o tsugu.' To ki shita.
21|106|Hontōni kono (kuruān) no nakaniha,(arrā o) sūhai suru mono e no shōsoku ga aru.
21|107|Ware wa tada ban'yū e no jihi to shite, anata o tsukawashita dakedearu.
21|108|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, anata gata no kami wa yuiitsu no kamidearu to iu kotodearu. Tokorode anata gata wa, kie shite iru no ka.'
21|109|Mo shikare-ra ga, somuki sareba itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa (anata gata ni) onajiyōni senkyō shita. Daga anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto ga, chikai ka tōi ka watashi wa shiranai.
21|110|Hontōni kare wa, arawana kotoba o kiki shitte ora reru. Mata anata gata no (kokoro ni) kakusu koto mo shitte ora reru.
21|111|Daga watashi wa, sono (yūyo) ga anata gata e no kokoromidearu no ka, matawa ichijiki no tame no kyōrakudearu no ka o shiranai.'
21|112|Kare wa itta. `Omo yo, shinri ni yotte o sabaki kudasai. Watashi-tachi no omo wa, anata gataga kuchinidasu ( 冒 ( 演 ? ) ) Ni taisuru o tasuke o o negai dekiru jihibukai kata de ara reru.'
22|1|Hitobito yo, anata gata no omo o osore nasai. (Shinpan no)-ji no shindō wa, mattaku Hitoe daijidearu.
22|2|Sonohi anata gata wa mirudarou. Subete no honyū suru mono wa, honyū suru koto o wasure, subete no ninpu wa sono taiji o nagashi, mata hitobito wa yowanai no ni, yoishireta yō ni mamieyou. Omou ni, arrā no chōbatsu ga kibishīkaradearu.
22|3|Daga hitobito no nakaniha, chishiki mo naku arrā ni tsuite hihan suru, hankō-tekina akuma nado ni shitagau mono mo iru.
22|4|Kare (akuma) ni tsuite wa, kō sadame rareru. `Daredemo kare o tomo to suru mono ga areba, kare wa sono-sha o mayowa sete,-en no chōbatsu ni michibiku nodearu.'
22|5|Hitobito yo, anata gata wa fukkatsu ni tsuite utagau no ka. Ware ga anata gata o tsukuru sai ni wa mazu tsuchi kara hajime, tsuide seieki no itteki, tsuide chi no katamari to shi, sarani katachi o nashita. Mata katachi o nasanai niku tamashī kara (anata gata o tsukutta). Anata gata ni (waga iryoku o) meiji suru tamedearu. Ware wa hossuru mono o, sadameta jiki made tainai ni oki, sorekara akanbō to shite anata gata o shussei sa se, sorekara seinen ni tōtatsu sa seru. Anata gata no chū aru mono wa (wakakushite) shina seru mono mo ari, mata aru mono wa nanigashika o shitta nochi, subete wasuresaru hodo ni yowamaru rōrei ni kaesa reru mono mo aru. Mata anata wa daichi ga karete arehateru no o miyou. Daga ware ga ichido sore ni ame o furaseru to,(seiki ga) yakudō shi fukurande, subete no shokubutsu ga shiyū de utsukushiku moederu.
22|6|Kore wa arrā koso shinrideari, shisha ni nama o atae, subete no mono no ue ni zen'nō de ara rerukaradearu.
22|7|Hontōni,(shinpan no)-ji wa yattekuru. Sore ni tsuite utagai no yochi wanai. Hontōni arrā wa, haka no naka no mono o yomigaera sa reru nodearu.
22|8|Daga hitobito no nakaniha, arrā ni tsuite chishiki mo naku, michibiki mo naku, mata kōmyō no keiten mo naku, 戯 Ni hihan shi,
22|9|倣限Na taido o totte, hitobito o arrā no michi kara mayowa seyou to suru mono ga aru. Kare-ra wa gense ni oite, kutsujoku o name, mata ware wa shinpan no hi ni honō no chōbatsu o aji wa seru.
22|10|(Sonotoki iwa reyou). `Kore wa, anata no te ga yatta koto no mukuidearu. Arrā wa sono shimo be-tachi ni taishi, kesshite fusei o nasa renai.'
22|11|Mata hitobito no naka ni henken o motte, arrā ni tsukaeru mono ga aru. Kare-ra wa kōun ga kureba, soreni manzoku shite iru. Daga shiren ga kare-ra ni furikakaru to, kaowosomukeru. Kare-ra wa gense to raise to o ushinau monodearu. Kore wa meihakuna sonshitsudearu.
22|12|Kare-ra wa arrā o soto ni shite, jibun ni gai mo naku mata eki mo nai mono ni inoru. Kore wa tōku mayou monodearu.
22|13|Kare-ra wa jibun o ekisuru mono yori mo, gai no kata ni chikai mono ni mukatte inoru. Nanto warui hogo-shadeari, warui nakamadearu koto yo.
22|14|Arrā wa, shinkō shite yoi okonai ni dō shimu mono o, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni haira se rareru. Hontōni arrā wa o nozomi no koto o okonawa reru.
22|15|Arrā wa gense demo raise demo, kare (shito) o tasuke rarenai to kangaeru mono ga areba, kare ni tenjō ni nawa o hara sete miruga ī. Sorekara (mizukara o jimen kara) kirihanashite miruga ī. (Kubi o tsuru koto. ) Sore de kare no sono kōi ga, kare no ikari o torinozoku koto ga dekiru mono ka, yoku nagame sasete miruga ī.
22|16|Kono yō ni, ware wa meihakuna shirushi (kuruān) o kudashita. Hontōni arrā wa o nozomi no mono o michibika reru.
22|17|Hontōni (kuruān o) shinjiru mono, Yudaya kyō o hōjiru mono mata sābia kyōto, kirisutokyōto, haikakyō to soshite gūzō shinja-tachi, arrā wa shinpan no hi ni, kare-ra o saiketsu nasa reru. Hontōni arrā wa subete no koto no risshō-sha de ara reru.
22|18|Anata wa minai no ka, ten ni aru subete no mono ga, arrā ni, sajida suru no o. Mata ji ni aru subete no mono mo, taiyō mo tsuki mo, Murubushi mo yamayama mo, kigi mo jūrui mo, mata ningen no ōku no mono ga sajida suru no o minai no ka. Daga ōku wa chōbatsu o ukeru no ga tōzen'na-sha-tachidearu. Mata arrā ga misage rareta mono o, dare mo sonkei suru koto wa dekinai. Hontōni arrā wa o nozomi no koto o okonawa reru. 〔Sajida〕
22|19|korera ryōsha wa, kare-ra no omo ni tsuite ronsō suru tekishudearu. Sorede (omo o) kyohi suru mono no tame ni shitate rareru no wa,-en no ishōdearou. Kare-ra ni zujō kara nettō ga sosoga rete,
22|20|haranouchi no mono mo hifu mo, sore de tokasa rerudearou.
22|21|Sono Ue, kare-ra ni wa tetsu no muchi ga kuwae rareru.
22|22|Kurushi-sa no tame, soko kara deyou to suru tabi ni, sono naka ni oshimodosa re,`hiaburi no kei o ajiwae.'(To iwa reyou).
22|23|Hontōni arrā wa, shinkō shite zenkō ni hagemu (soto no ichidan no)-sha o, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni haira se rareru. Kare-ra wa soko de, kogane no udewa to shinju ni kazara re, ishō wa sokode wa kinu (-zukume)dearou.
22|24|Kare-ra wa junseina kotoba ni michibika re, sanbi subeki hō no michi ni michibika reru.
22|25|Hontōni shinkō o kyohi shita mono,(hitobito o) arrā no michi kara samatageru mono, soko (makka) no kyojū-shadearou to, gairai-shadearou to subete, ware ga hitobito no tame ni konryū shita seinaru masujido (ni hairu koto) o kyohi suru mono, soshite sono Chū de shinsei o yogoshi fugi o takuramu mono ni wa, ware wa itamashī chōbatsu o aji wa serudearou.
22|26|Ware ga iburāhīmu no tame ni,(seinaru)-ka no ichi o sadame (kō itta)-ji no koto o omoi nasai. `Dare mo, wareto issho ni hai shite wa naranai. Soshite tafūfu (kai-jun) suru mono no tame, mata (reihai ni) tachi 〔kiyāmu〕, ritsurei 〔rukūu〕 shi sajida suru mono no tame ni, ware no ie o kiyomeyo.
22|27|Hitobito ni, junrei 〔Hajji〕 suru yō yobikake yo. Kare-ra wa aruite anata no moto ni kuru. Aruiwa, dore mo yasekokete iru rakuda ni notte, tōi tanima no michi o harubaru kuru.
22|28|Sore wa mizukara no (gense to raise no) goriyaku ni sanka shi, mata sadame rareta hi no ma, kare ga kare-ra ni ataerareta (gisei no) kachiku no ue ni arrā no gyomei o tonae, sorekara “anata gata wa sore o tabe, mata konkyū shite iru mono ni mo tabe sase nasai. ”
22|29|Sore kara kare-ra no hitsuyōna gishiki o oe, chikai o hatashi, soshite korai no ie (kāba) o, tawāfu shi nasai.'
22|30|Ijō (ga junrei no sadame)dearu. Arrā no shinsei (na gishiki) o junshu suru mono wa,-nushi no omotode wa mottomo yoi monodearu. Sorekara kachiku wa, anata gata ni yomi kikasa reta mono o nozoki,(junrei-chū no shokuryō to shite) gōhōdearu. Sorede gūzō no yogore kara hanare, kyogi no kotoba o sake nasai.
22|31|Arrā ni junsei ni fukujū, kie shi, kamigami o kare ni hai shite wa naranai. Arrā ni kamigami o haisuru mono wa, chōdo ten kara ochite tori ni sarawa reta mono no yōdearu. Matawa kaze ga, kare o tōi tokoro ni fuki saratta mono no yōdearu.
22|32|Ijō (ga sadame)dearu. Arrā no gishiki o sonchō suru taido wa, hontōni kokoro no keiken-sa kara dete kuru mono.
22|33|Sorera (no kachiku) wa, sadame no kigen made, anata gata ni yakudateta ue korai no ie (kāba) no chikaku de gisei to shite sasage rareru nodakara.
22|34|Ware wa subete unma no (kyō gi no) gishiki o sadameta. Kare ga sadzuke rareru 4tsu ashi no kachiku no ue ni, arrā no gyomei o tonae nasai. Hontōni anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no kami de ara reru.Dakara kare ni fukujū, kie shi nasai. Anata wa, kenkyona-sha-tachi ni kippō o tsutae nasai.
22|35|Korera no mono wa, arrā no gyomei ga tonae rareru toki, kokoro wa ifu ni michi, sōgū suru koto ni yoku taeshinobi, reihai no tsutome o mamori, mata ware ga sazuketa mono o hodokosu-sha-tachidearu.
22|36|Mata (gisei no) rakuda (ya ushi) o, ware wa anata gata no tame arrā no gishiki-yō to shita. Sorera ni wa anata gata e no (ōku no) rieki ga aru. (Gisei ni sonaeru ni atari) nabete, sorera no ue ni arrā no gyomei o tonae nasai. Soshite sorera ga yokozama ni taore (ugokanaku na~tsu)tanaraba, anata gata wa sore o tabe, mata kuchi ni dashite kowanai mono,-mono koi suru mono-tachi ni tabe sase nasai. Ko no yō ni sorera o anata gata (no yō) ni kyō sa seru no mo anata gata ni kansha no nen o okosa seru tamedearu.
22|37|Sorera no niku mo chi mo, kesshite arrā ni tassuru wakede wanai. Kare ni todoku no wa anata gata no tokushin 〔takufū〕dearu. Ko no yō ni kare wa, sorera o anata gata (no yō) ni kyō sa seruga, kore wa anata gata e no kare no michibiki ni taishi, arrā o tatae saseru tamedearu. Yoi okonai no mono-tachi ni kippō o tsutae nasai.
22|38|Hontōni arrā wa, shinkō suru mono o shugo nasa reru. Arrā wa, uragirimono, onwowasureru-sha o o konomi ni nara renai.
22|39|Tatakai o shi mukeru mono ni taishi (sentō o) yurusa reru. Sore wa kare-ra ga aku o okonau tamedearu. Arrā wa, kare-ra (shinja) o chikaradzuyoku enjo nasa reru.
22|40|(Kare-ra wa) tada `watashi-tachi no omo wa arrādesu.' To itta dake de seitōnariyū mo naku, sono-ka kara owa reta-sha-tachidearu. Arrā ga moshi, aru hitobito o soto no mono ni yori yokusei sa reru koto ga nakattanaraba, shūdōin mo, kirisutokyō-kai mo, Yudaya kyō-dō mo, mata arrā no gyomei ga tsuneni 唱念 Sa rete iru masujido (isurāmu no raihaidō) mo, kitto uchikowasa retadearou. Arrā wa, kare ni kyōryoku suru mono o tasuke rareru. Hontōni arrā wa, kyōdaide iryoku narabinaki hō de ara reru.
22|41|(Kare ni kyōryoku suru mono to wa) moshi ware no torihaka i de chijō ni (shihai-ken o) kakuritsu suru to reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi,(hitobito ni) seigi o meiji, jaaku o kinzuru monodearu. Hontōni subete no koto no ketsumatsu wa, arrā ni zokusuru.
22|42|Tatoe kare-ra ga, anata o kyogen no todearu to shite mo, kare-ra izen ni mo, nūfu no min mo, ādo mo samūdo mo (sono yogen-sha o) shinjinakatta.
22|43|Mata iburāhīmu no min mo, rūto no min mo,
22|44|madoyan no jūmin mo (shinjinakatta). Mata mūsā mo kyohi sa reta. Soredemo ware wa fushin-sha ni yūyo o atae, kekkyoku kare-ra ni chōbatsu o ataeta. Ware no kyohi wa don'na monodeatta no ka.
22|45|Ware wa o kare-ra ga aku o okonatte iru ma ni, ikaga ni ōku no machi o horoboshita kotodearou ka. Sorera wa, yane o shita ni shite taore tsubureta. Mata (ikaga ni ōku no) ido ya kengona shiro ga misute rareta kotodearou ka.
22|46|Kare-ra wa kokoro ni 梧Riga akeru yō, mata sono mimi ga kiku yō ni, chijō o tabi shinakatta. Hontōni mōjin to natta no wa, kare-ra no shikakude wa naku, mushiro mune no naka no kokorona nodearu.
22|47|Kare-ra wa anata ni, subayai chōbatsu o motomeru. Daga arrā wa yakusoku ni somuka renai. Hontōni omo no omoto ni okeru tsuitachi wa, anata gata no keisan suru Chitose ni ataru.
22|48|Ware wa, ikaga ni ōku no aku o okonau toshi o yūyo shi, sorekara korera o shobatsu shita kotodearou ka. Kaeri-sho wa ware no moto ni aru nodearu.
22|49|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Hitobito yo watashi wa, anata gata ni hakkiri keikoku suru (tame tsukawasa reta)-shadearu.'
22|50|Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa, o yurushi to eiyo aru kate o atae rareru.
22|51|Daga waga shirushi o munashiku suru yō ni tsutomeru mono wa gōka no nakamadearu.
22|52|Anata izen ni ware ga tsukawashita shito ya yogen-sha demo, nanika nozomi o motsu to, akuma ga sono yokubō o sosonokashita monodeatta. Daga arrā wa, akuma no yūwaku o mu ni sa re, o jibun no shirushi o kengo ni nasa reta. Hontōni arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
22|53|Kare wa, akuma no yūwaku de, kokoro ni yamai no aru mono, kokoro no gankona-sha o kokoromi nasa reru. Hontōni aku o okonau mono-tachi wa,(shinri kara) tōku kakehanareru.
22|54|Mata chishiki o atae rarete iru-sha-tachi wa, kono (kuruān) ga anata no nushi kara no shinridearu koto o shiri, kokoro o kenkyo ni shite sore o shinjiru. Hontōni arrā wa, shinkō suru mono-tachi o tadashī michi ni michibika reru katadearu.
22|55|Shinkō no nai mono wa sore ni tsuite utagai o daki tsudzukeyou. (Shinpan no) toki ga, totsuzen kare-ra ni osoikakaru ka, saiyaku no hi no chōbatsu ga kuru made wa.
22|56|Sonohi, taiken wa arrā no yūdearu. Kare wa, kare-ra no ma o sabaka reru. Sorede, shinkō shite yoi okonai o shita mono wa, kanki no rakuen ni hairu.
22|57|Haishin shite, ware no shirushi o kyogidearu to shita mono ni wa hazubeki chōbatsu ga aru.
22|58|Arrā no michi no tame ni ijū shi, sonogo (tatakai de) korosa re, matawa shinda mono ni wa, arrā wa kanarazu zenbina kate o ataerudearou. Hontōni arrā koso wa, mottomo sugureta kyūyō o ataeru kata de ara reru.
22|59|Kare wa, kanarazu kare-ra ga yorokobu tokoro ni haira se rareru. Hontōni arrā wa zenchi ni shite sōmeina okatadearu.
22|60|Soreha (kōdearu). Dare demo jibun ga kabutta mono to onaji hōfuku o shita no ni, mata futōna shiuchi o sa rerunaraba, arrā wa kanarazu kono-sha o tasuke nasa reru. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite yoku yurusa reru okatadearu.
22|61|Sore wa, arrā ga yoru o hiru no naka ni warikoma se, mata hiru o yoru no naka ni warikoma seru tamedearu. Hontōni arrā wa zen Akira ni shite zen-shi de ara reru.
22|62|Kore mo, arrā koso shinjitsudeari, kare-ra ga kare igai ni inoru mono ga itsuwarino (kami no) tamedearu. Hontōni arrā wa shikō ni shite shidai de ara reru.
22|63|Arrā ga ten kara mizu (ame) o furase rarereba, daichi ga midori ni naru no o anata wa minai no ka. Hontōni arrā wa shinsetsu ni shite chishitsu sa reru okatadearu.
22|64|Ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono wa, kare no yūdearu. Arrā, hontōni kare wa, michi tara reru okata, sanbi sa renabeki okatadearu.
22|65|Anata wa minai no ka. Arrā wa chijō no subete no mono o anata gata ni shitagawa se, kare no meirei ni yotte,-sen o kaijō ni hashira se rareru. Mata ten o kare no o yurushi naku chijō ni ochinai yō sasae rareru. Hontōni arrā wa ningen ni, yasashiku jihi o tare rareru okatadearu.
22|66|Kare koso wa anata gata ni nama o sazuke, mamonaku shi o atae, sorekara mata yomigaera se rareru katadearu. Hontōni ningen wa onwowasureru.
22|67|Ware wa subete no unma ni mamora rerubeki gishiki o sadameta. Sorede kore ni kanshi, kare-ra ni anata to ronsō sa sete wa naranai. Anata no omo ni (kare-ra o) maneki nasai. Hontōni anata wa, tadashī michibiki no ue ni iru.
22|68|Kare-ra ga moshi anata gata to ronsō surunaraba, itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā wa, anata gata no okonau koto o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru.
22|69|Arrā wa shinpan no hi ni, anata gataga sore ni tsuite sōi shita koto ni kanshi, anata gata o sabaka reru.'
22|70|Anata wa arrā ga, ten ni ari-chi ni aru issai o shitte ora reru koto o shiranai no ka. Sore wa subete kiroku ni nosete aru. Sore wa, arrā ni oite wa yōina kotodearu.
22|71|Kare-ra wa arrā o soto ni shite, nani no ken'i mo sazukatte inai mono, mata sore ni tsuite nani no chishiki mo nai mono o sūhai shite iru. Aku o okonau mono ni wa enjo-sha mo nai.
22|72|Ware no meiryōna shirushi ga dokuju sa reru toki, anata wa shinkō shinai-sha-tachi no kao ni, kyozetsu no iro ga ukabu no o shitatamerudearou. Kare-ra ni waga shirushi o dokuju suru mono ni mukatte, kōgeki o kuwaeyou to sae suru. Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa sore yori mo sara ni warui mono o, anata gata ni tsugeyou ka. Sore wa hi gokudearu. Arrā wa shinkō shinai-sha-tachi ni, sore o yakusoku nasa reru. Nanto warui jūkyodearu koto yo.'
22|73|Hitobito yo, hitotsu no hi (wa? ) O tokukara, sore o tsutsushinde kiki nasai. Hontōni anata gataga arrā no soto ni inoru mono wa, tatoe kare-ra ga taba ni natte mo, ichi-biki no hae (Sae) mo tsukurenai. Mata hae ga kare-ra kara nanika ubai satte mo, sore o torimodosu koto mo dekinai. Inoru mono mo, inora reru mono mo, mattaku chikara ga nai nodearu.
22|74|Kare-ra wa, arrā no shinka no hodo o hyōka shite inai. Hontōni arrā wa kyōdai ni shite iryoku narabinaki okatadearu.
22|75|Arrā wa, tenshi to ningen no naka kara, shito o eraba reru. Hontōni arrā wa zen Akira ni shite zen-shi de ara reru.
22|76|Kare wa, kare-ra no mae ni aru mono mo, kare-ra no ushiro ni aru mono o mo shitte ora reru. Arrā no omoto ni (subete no) jibutsu wa kisa reru nodearu.
22|77|Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo. Ritsurei 〔rukūu〕 shi sajida shite, anata gata no omo ni tsukae nasai. Soshite zenkō ni dō shime. Kanarazu anata gata wa seikō surudearou. 〔Sajida〕
22|78|arrā no (michi no) tame ni, kagiri o tsukushite funtō doryoku shi nasai. Kare wa, anata gata o eraba reru. Kono oshie wa, anata gata ni ku-gyō o oshitsukenai. Kore wa anata gata no sosen, iburāhīmu no kyōgidearu. Kare wa izen mo, mata kono (kuruān) ni oite mo, anata gata o musurimu to nadzuke rareta. Shito wa anata gata no tame no risshō-shadeari, mata anata gata wa hitobito no tame no risshō-shadearu. Dakara reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o okonai, shikkari to arrā ni sugari nasai. Kare wa anata gata no gādiandearu. Nanto sugureta gādian, nanto sugureta enjo-shadearu koto yo.
23|1|Shinja-tachi wa, tashika ni shōri o kachi toru.
23|2|Kare-ra wa, reihai ni keikendeari,
23|3|munashī (subete no) koto o sake,
23|4|hodokoshi 〔zakāto〕 no tame ni hagemi,
23|5|jibun no inbu o mamoru mono.
23|6|Tadashi haigū to, kare-ra no migite ni shoyū suru mono (dorei) wa,-betsudearu. Kare-ra ni kanshite wa, togame rareru koto wanai.
23|7|Shikashi hō o koete motomeru mono wa, arrā no okite ni somuku monodearu.
23|8|Mata shintaku to yakusoku ni chūjitsuna-sha,
23|9|jibun no reihai o (chūjitsu ni) mamoru monodearu.
23|10|Korera no mono koso hontō no sōzoku-sha de,
23|11|firudausu (tengoku) o tsugu monodearu. Kare-ra wa soko ni eien ni sumu nodearu.
23|12|Ware wa doro no seizui kara ningen o tsukutta.
23|13|Tsugini, ware wa kare o seieki no itteki to shite, kengona sumika ni osameta.
23|14|Sorekara ware wa, sono sei shizuku o hitotsu no chi no katamari ni tsukuri, tsugini sono katamari kara nikukai o tsukuri, tsuide sono nikukai kara hone o tsukuri, tsugini niku de sono hone o ōi, sorekara kare o soto no seimei-tai ni tsukuri ageta. Ā, nanto subarashī arrā, mottomo sugureta sōzō-sha de ara reru.
23|15|Sorekara ato, anata gata wa kanarazu shinu.
23|16|Sore kara fukkatsu no hi ni, yomigaera sa reru nodearu.
23|17|Ware wa anata gata no ue ni, 7tsu no ten o tsukutta. Kesshite ware wa sōzō o tōkan ni wa shinai.
23|18|Ware wa ten kara tekiryō no ame o furase, sore o chichū ni tomara seru. Mata ware wa, sore o nakusu koto mo dekiru.
23|19|Ware wa sore de, anata gata no tame ni natsumeyashi to budō no en o sodateta.-En no nakaniha ōku no kajitsu ga atte, anata gata wa sore o taberu.
23|20|Mata shinaizan ni san suru Ippon no ki ga atte,-yu ga tore, tabemono ni ajiwai o tsukeru.
23|21|Sorekara kachiku ni mo, anata gata e no kyōkun ga aru. Ware wa sorera no haranouchi ni aru mono o anata gata ni noma seru. Sorera ni wa ōku no yōto ga ari, mata anata gata wa sono (niku) o taberu.
23|22|Anata gata wa sorera ni nori, mata fune ni yotte hakoba reru.
23|23|Ware wa nūfu o sono min ni tsukawashita. Kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, arrā ni tsukae nasai. Kare no soto ni wa, anata gata ni kami wa nai nodearu. Anata gata wa kare o osorenai no ka.'
23|24|Hitobito no naka, shinkō no nai chōrō-tachi wa itta. `Nanda kore wa, anata gata to onaji tada no ningende wanaidesu ka. Kare wa anata gata no ue ni, takaku tomaritai nodeshou. Moshi arrā ga o nozominara, kare wa tenshi o tsukawasubekidesu. Watashi-tachi wa, mukashi no sosen kara mo, Konna koto wa kikimasendeshita.
23|25|Kono otoko wa tada (ho? ) Kareta ningen ni sugimasen.Dakara shibaraku matte yōsu o mimashou.'
23|26|Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, kare-ra wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to īmasu. Dō ka o tasuke kudasai.'
23|27|Sorede ware wa kare ni keiji shita. `Ware no keiji ni shitagatte, ware no menomaede fune o tsukure. Ware no meirei ga kudatte, kama ga tagiri (Yutaka? ) Retara, kare-ra no naka de sengen ga sudeni kudasa reta mono o nozoki, anata wa subete no (iki) mo no ichiban to, anata no ikka o norikoma se nasai. Aku o okonatta mono no tame ni, ware ni tangan shite wa naranai. Kare-ra wa kanarazu oboreru nodearu.
23|28|Soshite issho no mono to fune no naka ni ochitsuitara (inotte) ie,`aku o okonau hitobito kara, watashi-tachi o o sukui kudasatta arrā ni tatae are'
23|29|ie,`omo yo, shukufuku sa reta jōriku chiten ni, watashi o jōriku sa sete kudasai. Hontōni anata wa mottomo sugureta jōriku o kanae rareru katadearimasu'
23|30|hontōni kono nakaniha (rikai aru mono e no) shuju no shirushi ga aru. Ware wa (hitobito o) shiren suru monodearu.
23|31|Sore kara kare-ra no nochi ni, ware wa soto no sedai o tsukuri ageta.
23|32|Ware wa kare-ra no ma kara (eranda) shito o, kare-ra ni noko wa shite,(iwa seta. ) `Arrā ni tsukae nasai. Kare no soto ni, anata gata ni kami wa nai nodesu. Anata gata wa (kare o) osorenai nodesu ka.'
23|33|Kare no min no naka no chōrō de shinkō ga naku, raise no (arrā to no) kaiken o usodearu to shi, gense de haburi no yoi-sha-tachi wa itta. `Kore wa anata gata to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Anata gata no taberu mono o tabe, anata gata no nomu mono o nonde imasu.
23|34|Anata gataga, jibun to onaji ningen ni shitagaunaraba, kanarazu shippai surudeshou.
23|35|Anata gata wa shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara (futatabi) yomigaera sa reru to, kare wa yakusoku shita nodesu ka.
23|36|Son'na yakusoku wa mattaku ari emasen.
23|37|Watashi-tachi ni wa, gense no seikatsu no soto wa nai nodesu. Watashi-tachi wa shinde mata ikikaerudeshou ka. Watashi-tachi wa, kesshite yomigaera sa reru koto wa nai nodesu.
23|38|Kare wa arrā ni tsuite, kyogen o netsuzō shita tada no ningen ni sugimasen. Watashi-tachi wa, kare o shinjimasen.'
23|39|Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, kare-ra wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to īmasu. Dō ka o tasuke kudasai.'
23|40|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Shibaraku shitara, kare-ra wa kanarazu kuirudearou.'
23|41|Sorede hitokoe (chōbatsu) ga kakujitsu ni kare-ra o osoi, ware wa kare-ra o (tokinonagare ni ukabu) awa kuzu ni shita. Dakara aku o okonau mono yo tōzakare.
23|42|Sore kara kare-ra no nochi ni, ware wa soto no sho sedai o tsukutta.
23|43|Dare mo sono sadame rareta kigen ni,-saki ni suru koto mo okureru koto mo dekinai.
23|44|Sokode ware wa tsugitsugini shito o noko wa shita. Daga shito ga hitotsu no min ni arawareru tabi ni, kare-ra wa kare o usotsuki yobawari shita. Sorede ware wa (ko no yōna fugi no to o) tsugitsugini ato o owa se,(horoboshi), kare-ra o mukashi no katari kusa ni shita. Dakara shinkō shinai mono yo tōzakare.
23|45|Mata ware wa, waga shuju no shirushi to meiryōna ken'i to o sazukete, mūsā to sono kyōdai no hārūn o noko wa shita.
23|46|Firuaun to sono chōrō-tachi no moto ni. Daga kare-ra wa ōheide omoi nobotta-sha-tachideatta.
23|47|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi dōyō ni ningen ni suginai futari o (dōshite) shinji raremashou ka. Shikamo kare-ra no min wa, watashi-tachi no doreide wanaidesu ka'
23|48|sore de kare-ra wa, ryōnin o usotsukidearu to ī, kekkyoku horobosa reta.
23|49|Ware wa, kare-ra ga tadashiku michibika reru yō, mūsā ni shikato Keisuke (rippō) o sazuketa.
23|50|Mata ware wa, maruyamu no ko to sono haha o shirushi to nashi, ryōnin o izumi no waki deru anseina oka no ue ni sumawa seta.
23|51|Anata gata shito-tachi yo, yoi kiyoi mono o tabe, yoi okonai o shi nasai. Ware wa anata gata no suru koto o jukuchi shite iru.
23|52|Hontōni anata gata no kono unma wa, yuiitsu no kyōdōtaidearu. Ware wa anata gata no omodearu. Ware o osoreyo.
23|53|Sorenanoni kare-ra wa sho shūha ni bunretsu shita. Shikamo kaku-ha wa jibun-tachi ga subarashī to itte iru.
23|54|Dakara tōbun'nokan, mayoi no mama ni kare-ra o hōchi shi nasai.
23|55|Kare-ra wa ware ga, zaihō to shijo de kare-ra o chikaradzukeru to kangaeru no ka.
23|56|Ware wa kare-ra no tame ni, yoikoto o isoide iru to omou no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa (kokoromi ni) kidzukanai.
23|57|Hontōni omo o osorete ononoku mono,
23|58|mata omo no shirushi o shinjiru mono,
23|59|mata omoni (nanimono o mo) hai shinai mono,
23|60|mata omoni kaeru koto o kokoro ni osore, ataerubeki mono o ataeru mono,
23|61|korera no mono wa subete zenji ni isogi, sono sentōnitatsu-shadearu.
23|62|Ware wa darenimo, sono nōryoku ijō no omoni o owa senai. Ware ni wa shinjitsu o kataru shomotsu ga aru node, kare-ra wa kesshite futō ni atsukawa reru koto wa nai nodearu.
23|63|Iya, kare-ra no kokoro wa kore (kuruān no oshie) o mattaku rikai dekinaide iru. Tokorode kare-ra no kōi wa, sore yori hidoi okonaidearu.
23|64|Yagate ware ga, kare-ra no naka no zeitakuna mono o chōbatsu no tame ni toraeru to, miruga ī. Kare-ra wa nakisakebu.
23|65|(Sonotoki ōse rareyou. ) `Imasara aigan shite wameku koto wanai. Anata gata ni wa ware kara no kyūjo wa nai nodearu.
23|66|Ware no shirushi wa, anata gata ni dokuju sa rete itaga, anata gata wa kakato o kaeshite nige,
23|67|kōmandeatta. Kore (kuruān) ni tsuite waruguchi o itte yawa ni fukette ita.'
23|68|Kare-ra wa, kono o kotoba o jukukō shinai no ka. Mukashi no sosen ni okoranakatta mono ga, kare-ra ni okoru to kangaeru no ka.
23|69|Soretomo kare-ra e no shito to mitomezu, kare o kyohi suru no ka.
23|70|Sore de,`kare wa (gu? ) Kareta monodearu.' To iu no ka. Sōde wanai. Kare wa shinri o (wan? ) Shitaga, kare-ra no ōku wa shinri o kirau.
23|71|Moshi shinri ga, kare-ra no yokubari ni fusawashī mononara, tenchi to sonoaida no subete no mono wa,(konran shi) taihai shite shimattadearou. Sōde wanai. Ware wa kare-ra e no kunkai o sazuketaga, kare-ra wa kunkai kara somuki satta nodearu.
23|72|Soretomo anata wa, hōshū o kare-ra ni motomeru no ka. Anata no omo no hōshū koso wa shijōdearu. Kare wa mottomo sugureta kyūyo o ataeru kata de ara reru.
23|73|Hontōni anata wa, tadashī michi ni kare-ra o maneku.
23|74|Daga raise o shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, kanarazu sonomichi kara hagureru.
23|75|Ware ga jihi o hodokoshite kare-ra o nayamasu saiyaku o nozoite mo, meiro ni shūchaku shite tohō mo naku samayoudearou.
23|76|Katsute, ware wa kare-ra ni chōbatsu o kuwaetaga, kare-ra wa nao, omoni heri kudaru koto naku, sunao ni tangan shinai.
23|77|Ware ga kibishī keibatsu e no mon o, kare-ra ni hiraku made wa. Mi nasai. Kare-ra wa sore de zetsubō shite iru.
23|78|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame ni, chōkaku to shikaku to kokoro (chikaku, rikai-ryoku) o tsukura reta katadearu. Daga anata gata wa, kansha shinai.
23|79|Anata gata o chijō ni, hanshoku sa se rareta no wa karedearu. Kare no omoto ni, anata gata wa atsume rareru.
23|80|Kare koso wa, ikashi mata shina se rareru katadeari, hiru to yoru no kōtai o kisei sa reru. Anata gata wa nao rikai shinai no ka.
23|81|Iya, kare-ra wa, mukashi no hito ga itta no to, onajiyōna koto o itte iru.
23|82|Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natta toki, hontōni yomigaera sa rerudarou ka.
23|83|Hontōni watashi-tachi mo watashi-tachi no sosen mo, katsu teko no koto o yakusoku sa rete ita. Kore wa tada mukashi no monogatari nisuginai.'
23|84|Itte yaru ga ī. `Daichi to soko ni aru subete no mono wa, dare no monodearu ka. Shitte irunara (itte mi nasai).'
23|85|Kare-ra wa kanarazu,`arrā no yūdearu.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa, mada kigatsukanai no ka.'
23|86|Itte yaru ga ī. `7Tsu no ten no shu, eikō ni michita shikō no gyokuza no omo wa, daredearu no ka.'
23|87|Kare-ra wa kanarazu,`arrā.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa nao osorenai no ka.
23|88|Subete no jibutsu no tōgyo wa, dare no te ni aru no ka. (Ban'yū o) shugo shi,(dare karamo) shugo sa renai kata (wa dare ka), anata gataga shitte irunaraba,(itte mi nasai).'
23|89|Kare-ra wa kanarazu `arrā.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Sorenara anata gata wa, dōshite madowasa reta no ka.'
23|90|Iya, ware wa shinri o kudashita nodearu. Kare-ra wa hontōni uso-tsukidearu.
23|91|Arrā wa ko o mōke rarenai. Mata kare to issho no soto no kami mo nai. Sōdeattara, sorezore no kami wa jibun no tsukutta mono de bunretsu shi otagai ni nuki deyou to shite kisoiau. Arrā ni tatae are. (Kare wa) kare-ra no haisuru mono o (chōetsu sa re),
23|92|yūgen-kai to genshō-kai o shitte ora re, kare-ra no haisuru mono no ue ni takaku ora reru.
23|93|Ie,`omo yo, anata ga kare-ra ni yakusoku shita koto (chōbatsu) o, moshi watashi (no zaisei-chū) ni shimesa rerunara,
23|94|omo yo, watashi o aku o okonau min no naka ni, hairenaide kudasai.'
23|95|Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra ni keikoku shita mono o, anata ni shimesu koto wa tashika ni dekiru.
23|96|Zenkō ni yotte, aku o gekitai seyo. Ware wa kare-ra no iu koto o jukuchi shite iru.
23|97|Soshite (inotte) ii nasai. `Omo yo, akuma-tachi no sasayaki ni taishi, anata no kago o negaimasu.
23|98|Omo yo, kare-ra ga watashi ni chikadzukanai yō, anata no kago o negaimasu.'
23|99|Daga shi ga otozureru to, kare-ra wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi o (nama ni) okuri ki shite kudasai.
23|100|Watashi ga nokoshite kita mono ni tsuite yoi okonai o shimasu.' Kesshite sōde wanai. Sore wa kare no kōjō ni suginai. Yomigaeri no hi made, kare-ra no ushironi wa modorenai shōheki ga aru.
23|101|Rabba ga fuka reru toki, sonohi, kare-ra no ma no sho kankei no kizuna wa todae, tagaini towanaidearou.
23|102|Sore de hakari ga (zenkō no tame) omoi-sha-tachi wa, shijō no kōfuku o eru.
23|103|Mata hakari ga karui-sha-tachi wa, tamashī o ushinai, jigoku ni eien ni sumu.
23|104|Hi wa kare-ra no kao o kogashi, sono Chū de haguki o mukidasu.
23|105|(Kare-ra ni iwa reyou. ) `Ware no shirushi ga anata gata ni dokuju sa renakatta no ka,nanoni sore o usodearu to shita no ka.'
23|106|Kare-ra wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa fuun ni uchi make, mayotte imashita.
23|107|Omo yo, watashi-tachi o koko kara dashite kudasai. Moshimo nao watashi-tachi ga (aku ni) kaerunaraba, hontōni fugi no todesu.'
23|108|Kare wa ōse rareyou. `Sono naka ni iyashime rarete haitte shimae. Ware ni monowoiu na.
23|109|Hontōni ware no shimo be no nakaniha, kō itte ita ichidan ga aru. “Omo yo, watashi-tachi o yurushi, jihi o ataete kudasai. Anata wa mottomo sugureta jihi o ataeru katadesu. ”
23|110|Daga anata gata wa, kare-ra o waraigusa ni shita. Anata gata wa, kare-ra o waratte iru ma ni, ware o nenjiru no o wasureru koto ni natta.
23|111|Hontōni kare-ra ga taeshinonda koto ni yori, kyō ware wa mukuita. Kare-ra koso seikō shita monodearu.'
23|112|Kare wa ōse rareyou. `Anata gata wa, chijō ni nan-nen taizai shite ita no ka.'
23|113|Kare-ra wa mōshiageyou. `Watashi-tachi wa tsuitachi ka, tsuitachi no ichibubun taizai shite imashita. Kanjōyaku (tenshi) ni o toi kudasai.'
23|114|Kare wa ōse rareyou. `Anata gata no taizai wa tsukanoma nisuginai, anata gataga (kono koto o) shitteitanaraba
23|115|anata gata wa, ware ga tawamure ni anata gata o tsukutta to demo kangaete ita no ka. Mata anata gata wa, ware ni kisa renai to kangaete ita no ka.'
23|116|Arrā wa, tattokute kedakai, shinjitsu no ōjadearu. Kōketsuna gyokuza no omo o oite soto ni wa kami wanai.
23|117|Arrā to issho ni, nani no shōko mo nai soto no kami ni inoru mono no keisan wa omo no omoto ni aru dakedearu. Hontōni fushin-sha-tachi wa, kachinuku koto wa dekinaidearou.
23|118|(Inotte) iuga ī. `Omo yo, o yurushi o atae, jihi o ataete kudasai. Anata wa mottomo sugureta jihi o ataeru kata de ara remasu.'
24|1|(Koreha) ware ga kudashita 1-shō 〔sūra〕. Ware ga sadameta mono de, meiryōna shuju no shirushi o sono naka ni kudashita. Kanarazu anata gata wa ryūi surudearou.
24|2|Kantsū shita on'na to otoko wa, sorezore 100-kai muchiute. Moshi anata gataga, arrā to matsujitsu o shinjirunaraba. Arrā no sadame ni motodzuki, ryōnin ni taishi jō ni makete wa naranai. Soshite ichidan no shinja ni, kare-ra no shokei ni tachiawa se nasai.
24|3|Kanpu wa, kanpu ka matawa tashinkyō to igai (no on'na) to wa, kekkon suru koto wa dekinai. Kanpu mo mata, kanpu ka matawa tashinkyō to igai (no otoko) to wa, kekkon suru koto wa dekinai. Ko no koto wa shinja ni taishi kinji rareru.
24|4|Teisetsuna on'na o hinan shite 4-mei no shōnin o age rarenai mono ni wa, 80-kai no muchiuchi o kuwae nasai. Kesshite kon'na-sha no shōgen o ukeirete wa naranai. Kare-ra wa omo no okite ni somuku-sha-tachidearu.
24|5|Shikashi, sonogo kuite mizukara aratameru mono wa betsudearu. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
24|6|Jibun no tsuma o hinan suru mono de, jibun'igai ni shōnin no nai baai wa, tandoku no shōgen de, jibun no shinjitsuna koto o arrā ni chikai kete 4-do chikau.
24|7|Soshite 5-dome ni,`moshi jibun no kotoba ga kyoginara, arrā no o ikari ga jibun no ue ni (kudaru yō ni).'(To chikau).
24|8|Mata, ka no on'na kara, sono chōbatsu o menji rareru. Tsumari moshika no on'na ga, arrā ni chikai kete kare (otto) no kotoba ga kyogidearu koto o 4-do chikai,
24|9|soshite 5-dome ni,`moshi (otto no kotoba ga shinjitsunaraba, arrā no o ikari ga jibun no ue ni (kudaru yō ni).'(To chikaunaraba).
24|10|Arrā no onkei ga anata gata no ue ni naku, jihi mo nakattanaraba (dōdearou. ) Hontōni arrā wa, tabitabi kaigo o yurusa reru eimeina kata de ara reru.
24|11|Hontōni kono kyogen o hirometa mono wa, anata gata no naka no ichidandearu. Kore o anata gata e no wazawai to omotte wa naranai. Iya, sore wa anata gata no tame yoi kotodearu. Kare-ra no naka sorezore no mono wa, sono kaseida tsumi ni yo (ri basse rare)ru. Nakademo sore ni ōkiku kan'yo shita mono wa, kibishī chōbatsu ni shose rareru nodearu.
24|12|Anata gata wa sore o kiita toki, shinja no otoko mo shinja no on'na mo, jibun jishin de naze kōi aru kangae o shinakatta no ka. Soshite,`kore wa akiraka ni chūshōdearu.' To naze iwanakatta no ka.
24|13|Kare-ra wa naze, kore ni taishi 4-mei no shōnin o agenakatta no ka. Shōnin o dasanakattanode, korera no mono wa arrā no o me ni wa kyogen no todearu.
24|14|Moshi anata gata ni taisuru arrā no onkei to, gense to raise de kare no jihi ga nakattanaraba, kono jiken ni tsuite (fukinshin ni) hanashita koto ni taishi, kibishī chōbatsu ni shose rareta tokorodeatta.
24|15|Mi nasai. Anata gata wa shitasaki de sore o uketome, mata anata gata no kuchi wa, jibun no shiranai koto o itta. Soshite arrā no o me ni wa jūdaina koto o, karuku kangaete ita.
24|16|Anata gata wa sore o kiita toki, naze kō iwanakatta no ka. `Kore wa watashi-tachi no kuchi ni subeki kotode wanai. Arrā ni tatae are. Kore wa taihen'na chūshōdearu.'
24|17|Arrā wa, moshi anata gataga shinjanara, kono yōna koto o kesshite sōrihenshite wa naranai to imashime rareru.
24|18|Arrā wa, anata gata ni shirushi o tokiakasa reru. Hontōni arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
24|19|Shinkō suru mono no ma ni kono shūbun ga hiromaru koto o yorokobu mono wa, gense demo raise demo, itamashī chōbatsu o ukeyou. Anata gata wa shiranai ga arrā wa shitte ora reru.
24|20|Arrā no onkei ga anata gata no ue ni naku, jihi mo nakattanaraba (dōdearou). Hontōni arrā wa shinsetsu kiwami naku jihibukai katadearu.
24|21|Shinkō suru mono-tachi yo, akuma no ayumi ni shitagatte wa naranai. Anata gataga moshi akuma no ayumi ni shitagaunaraba, kare wa kanarazu shūkō to akuji o anata gata ni meijirudearou. Moshi anata gata ni taishi, arrā no onkei to jihi ga nakattanaraba, anata gata no naka ichi-ri mo junketsu ni narenakattadearou. Daga arrā wa, okokoro ni kanau mono o kiyome rareru. Arrā wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru.
24|22|Anata gata no naka, onkei o atae rare fuyū de nōryoku arumononiha, sono kinshin ya, hinja to arrā no michi no tame ijū shita-sha-tachi no tame ni kisha shinai to, chikawa sete wa naranai. Kare-ra o yurushi ōme ni mite yaru ga ī. Arrā ga anata gata o yurusa reru koto o nozomanai no ka. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
24|23|Mufunbetsu ni teisetsuna shinja no on'na o chūshō suru mono wa, gense demo raise demo kitto norowa reyou. Kare-ra wa kibishī chōbatsu o ukerudearou.
24|24|Sonohi, kare-ra no shita to te to ashi wa, sono okonatta koto ni tsuite kare-ra ni (furina) risshō o suru.
24|25|Sonohi arrā wa, kare-ra ga ukerubeki ōhō o (subete) haraimodosa re, kare-ra wa, arrā ga shinrideari,(subete no koto o) meiryō ni nasa reru koto o, shirudearou.
24|26|Fujōna on'na wa fujōna otoko ni, mata fujōna otoko wa fujōna on'na ni (fusawashī). Junketsuna on'na wa junketsuna otoko ni, mata junketsuna otoko wa junketsuna on'na ni (fusawashī). Korera no mono wa, hitobito no iu koto ni dōjinai. Kare-ra ni wa, yōsha to eiyo aru onmegumi ga arou.
24|27|Anata gata shinja yo, yurushi o motomete, kazoku ni aisatsu suru made wa, jibun no ie igai no sumai ni haitte wa naranai. Sore wa anata gata no tame ni yoi. Kanarazu anata gata wa ryūi surudearou.
24|28|Moshi ie ni daremoinai to wakattanaraba, yurushi ga aru made, sore ni haitte wa naranai. Moshi kaeru yō iwa reta toki wa kaere. Sore wa anata gata no tame ni ichidanto seirendearu. Arrā wa anata gata no okonau koto o shitte ora reru.
24|29|Anata gata ni hitsuju-hin ga sonaete aru, jūnin no inai ie ni hairu koto wa tsumi ni naranai. Arrā wa, anata gata no gen wasu koto mo kakusu koto mo shitte ora reru.
24|30|Otoko no shinja-tachi ni itte yaru ga ī. ` (Jibun no keirui igai no fujin ni taishite wa) kare-ra no shisen o hikuku shi, teiketsu o mamore.' Soreha kare-ra no tame ni ichidanto seirendearu. Arrā wa kare-ra no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru.
24|31|Shinja no on'na-tachi ni itte yaru ga ī. Ka no on'na-ra no shisen o hikuku shi, teishuku o mamore. Soto ni hyō wareru mono no soto wa, ka no on'na-ra no bi (ya kazari) o medata sete wa naranai. Sorekara vu~eiru o sono mune no ue ni tare nasai. Jibun no otto matawa chichi no soto wa, ka no on'na no bi (ya kazari) o arawashite wa naranai. Nao otto no chichi, jibun no musuko, otto no musuko, mata jibun no kyōdai, kyōdai no musuko, shimai no musuko matawa jibun no on'na-tachi, jibun no migite ni motsu dorei, mata seiyoku o motanai tomomawari no otoko, matawa on'na no karada ni ishiki o motanai yōji (no soto wa). Mata kano on'na-ra no kakureta kazari o shiraseru tame, sono ashi (de-chi) o butte wa naranai. Anata gata shinja yo, minaissho ni kaigo shite arrā ni kaere. Kanarazu anata gata wa seikō surudearou.
24|32|Anata gata no naka dokushin no mono, mata anata gata no dorei no otome de renseina mono wa, kekkon shi nasai. Kare-ra ga moshi mazushikereba, arrā wa onkei ni yori yūfuku ni sa reyou. Arrā wa Kan on fuka chi de ara reru.
24|33|Kekkon (no shikin) ga mitsukaranai mono wa, arrā no onkei ni yori, tomu made jisei shi nasai. Mata anata gata no migite ga motsu mono no naka,(kaihō no shōmei) shōsho o motomeru mono ga atte, anata gata ga kare-ra no zenryō-sa o shitatamerunaraba, sono shōmei o kaki nasai. Nao arrā ga anata gata ni atae rareta shizai no ichibu o kare-ra ni atae nasai. Dorei no musume-tachi ga, teisō o mamoru yō negaunaraba, gense no hate nai ritoku o motomete shūgyō o kyōsei shite wa naranai. Ka no on'na-ra ga tatoe dareka ni kyōsei sa retanara, arrā ga yasashiku tsumi o yurushi, itawatte kudasarou.
24|34|Ware wa jibutsu o meiryō ni suru shirushi o kudashi, mata anata gata izen ni sugisatta-sha-tachi no senrei o shimeshi,-nushi o osoreru mono e no kunkai to shita.
24|35|Arrā wa, tenchi no hikaridearu. Kare no hikari o 譬Reba, 燈 O oita, kabe (zai? ) No yōna monodearu. 燈 Wa garasu no naka ni aru. Garasu wa kagayaku hoshi no yō. Shukufuku sa reta orību no ki ni tomosa rete iru. (Sono Sunao wa) tōhō (no san)de mo naku, seihō (no san)de mo naku, kono abura wa, hi ga 凡 Ndo furenai no ni hikariwohanatsu. Hikari no ue ni hikari o soeru. Arrā wa okonomino-sha o, kare no o hikari ni michibika reru. Arrā wa hitobito no tame ni,-hi (wa? ) O age rareru. Hontōni arrā wa subete no koto o shitte ora reru.
24|36|(Kono 燈 Wa) arrā no yurushi ni yotte, tate rareta uchinonaka ni ari, kare no gyomei ga soko de tonae rare, asayū, sokode kare o tataete 唱念 Ga okonawa reru.
24|37|Hitobito wa, kōeki ya shōhin ni madowasa renaide, arrā o nenji, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha ni okotari naku, kare-ra no osore wa kokoro mo me mo tentō suru hidearu.
24|38|Arrā wa kare-ra no itta, saizen no mono ni mukuwa re, katsu onkei ni yori hōshō o tsukekuwae rareru. Arrā wa okokoro ni Kanō,-sha ni, saigen naku ataeru.
24|39|Shikashi shinkō no nai mono wa, sono suru koto nasu koto, sabaku no naka no shinkirō no yōna mono de, kawaki kitta mono ni wa mizuda to omowa reru. Daga yattekureba nani mo midasenai. Sokode wa arrā no gozendeari, kare no kanjō ga harawa reru koto o shirudearou. Arrā wa seisan ni jinsokude ara reru.
24|40|Mata (fushin-sha no jōtai wa), shinkai no ankoku no yōna mono de,-ha ga kare-ra o ōi, sono-jō ni (mata) nami ga ari, sono Jō o (sarani) kumo ga ōtte iru. Ankoku no ue ni ankoku ga kasanaru. Kare ga te o sashinobete mo 凡 N do sore wa mi rarenai. Arrā ga hikari o atae rarenai mono ni wa, hikari wanai.
24|41|Anata wa, tenchi no ma no subete no mono ga, arrā o tataeru no o minai no ka. Hane o hirogete tobutori mo sōdearu. Mina sorezore reihai to 唱念 O kokoroete iru. Arrā wa kare-ra no gyō tte iru koto o shitte ora reru.
24|42|Ten to ji no taiken wa arrā no yūdeari, arrā ni (subete no mono no) kaeri-sho wa aru nodearu.
24|43|Anata gata wa minai ka. Arrā wa kumo o kari, yagate sore o ai i-awase, sarani katamari ni sa re, yagate jiu ga, sonoaida kara furu no o. Mata hyō o fukumu, yama (no yōna kumo) o ten kara kudashi, kare wa, okonomino-sha o sore de uchi, okonomino-sha o yoke rareru. Inazuma no hirameki wa, hontōni me o ubaou to suru.
24|44|Arrā wa yoru to hiru o tsugitsugini kōtai sa seru. Hontōni korera no nakaniha, mirume o motsu mono e no kyōkun ga aru.
24|45|Mata arrā wa, aritoarayuru dōbutsu o mizu kara tsukura reta. Sono aru mono wa, hara de hai, mata aru mono wa 2-pon ashi de aruki, aru mono wa 4tsu ashi de aruku. Arrā wa o nozomi no mono o tsukura reru. Hontōni arrā wa nanigoto ni tsuke zen'nō de ara reru.
24|46|Ware wa meiryōna shirushi no kazukazu o kudashita. Arrā wa okonomino-sha o tadashī michi ni michibika reru.
24|47|Kare-ra (nise shinja) wa,`watashi-tachi wa arrā to shito o shinji, fukujū suru.' To iu. Daga sonogo, kare-ra no ichibu wa somuki satta. Korera no mono wa (shin no) shinjade wanai.
24|48|Kare-ra no ma wa sabaki no tame ni, arrā to shito no mae ni yobidasa reru to, mi nasai. Ichibu no mono wa kaihi suru.
24|49|Moshi, kare-ra ga tadashī nonara, sunao ni kare no moto ni yattekurudearou.
24|50|Kare-ra no kokoro ni wa yamai ga yadotte iru no ka, soretomo utagai o daite iru no ka. Matawa arrā to shito ga, kare-ra ni taishi fukōheina atsukai o suru to osoreru no ka. Iya, kare-ra koso fugimonodearu.
24|51|Hontō no shinja-tachi wa, sabaki no tame, arrā to shito ni yobidasa reru to,`kashikomarimashita. Shitagaimasu.' To iu. Hontōni, sono yōna hitobito koso sakaeru monodearu.
24|52|Arrā to shito ni fukujū shi, arrā o osore, kare ni jibun no gimu o tsukusu mono, sono yōna hitobito koso (saigo no mokuteki o) jōju suru monodearu.
24|53|Kare-ra (nise shinja) wa, moshi anata ga (shussei o) meijitanaraba, kanarazu dete iku koto o arrā ni chikai kete genshuku ni chikau. Itte yaru ga ī. `Chikawanakute mo yoi. Kyōjun koso dōri ni kanau. Hontōni arrā wa anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru.'
24|54|Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā ni shitagai, shito ni shitagae. Anata gataga moshi somuki saru to shite mo, kare ni hakare no owasa reta tsutome ga ari, anata gata ni mo anata gata no owasa reta mono ga aru. Daga anata gataga moshi kare ni shitagaunaraba, tadashiku michibika rerudearou. Shito ni kase rareru koto wa, tada meiryō ni (keiji o) tsutaeru dakedearu.'
24|55|Arrā wa, anata gata no naka, shinkō shite yoi okonai ni isoshimu mono ni wa, anata gata izen no mono ni tsuga seta yō ni, kono daichi o tsuga seru koto o yakusoku nasa reta. Soshite kare-ra no tame ni, kare ga eraba reru mono o, kare-ra no yurugi no nai shūkyō to nasa re, kare-ra no kyōfu (fuan no seikatsu) o, anshin buji (no kyōgū) ni kae rareru. Kare-ra wa ware ni tsukae, ware ni nanimono o mo haishinai. Daga sore-igo ni nao fushinjin ni naru mono koso wa,-nushi no okite ni somuku monodearu.
24|56|Sore de reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi, shito ni shitagae. Sō sureba anata gata wa, jihi ni azukarudearou.
24|57|Anata wa, fushinjin no mono-tachi ga chijō de (arrā no keikaku o) shippai sa seru to kangaete wa naranai. Kare-ra no sumai wa gōkadearu. Nanto warui matsurodearu koto yo.
24|58|Shinkō suru mono yo, anata gata no migite ga shoyū suru mono to, anata gata no joshi-tachi no naka miseinen no monode mo,-ji no 3ttsu no baai wa,(ima ni hairu toki) anata gata no yurushi o motome sase nasai. (Sunawachi) sōchō 〔fajuru〕 no reihai no zen, hirunaka no (atsusa no tame) datsui o shite iru toki, sorekara yoru 〔ishā〕 no reihai no nochidearu. (Koreha) anata gata no tame no 3-do no suhada (hadaka) no tokidearu. Korera no (jikoku no) soto wa,(kyoka o enaide) tagai ni ikiki shite mo anata gata ni mo kare-ra ni mo,-zaide wanai. Ko no yō ni arrā wa, anata gata no tame ni shirushi o tokiakasa reru. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
24|59|Anata gata no kodomo-tachi ga seinen'nitassuru-ji wa, sore izen ni sō shite kita yō ni,(nyūshitsu ni saishi) yurushi o motome sase nasai. Ko no yō ni arrā wa, anata gata no tame ni shirushi o tokiakasa reru. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
24|60|Kekkon o nozomenai, sanji-ki no sugita on'na wa, sono sōshoku o koremiyogashini shimesanai kagiri,-gai i o nuide mo tsumide wanai. Daga hikaeme ni suru no wa, ka no on'na-ra no tame ni yoi. Arrā wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru.
24|61|Mōjin demo enryo wa iranai. Mata ashi no shinshōsha demo enryo wa iranai. Mata byōnin demo enryo wa iranai. Mata anata gata jishin mo, jibun no ie de tabetemo yoku, chichikata no ie demo hahagata no ie demo, kyōdai no ie demo, shimai no ie demo, chichikata no oji no ie demo oba no ie demo, hahagata no oji no ie demo, hahagata no oba no ie demo, anata gataga kagi o motte iru (ie demo), anata gata no yūjin (no ie demo) tabete yoi. Mata anata gata wa, issho ni matawa betsubetsu ni tabetemo, togame wanai. Sorede ie ni hairu toki wa, arrā kara shukufuku sa reta yoi aisatsu no kotoba de, hitobito ni aisatsu shi nasai. Ko no yō ni arrā wa, anata gata no tame ni shirushi o tokiakasa reru. Kanarazu anata gata wa rikai surudearou.
24|62|(Shin no) shinja to wa, arrā to sono shito o (kokorokara) shinji, aru yōken de (hitobito ga) atsumari shito to issho ni iru toki, sono kyoka o eru made wa tachisaranai-sha-tachidearu. Hontōni nani ni tsuke anata ni yurushi o motomeru mono koso wa, arrā to sono shito o shinjiru monodearu. Kare-ra ga jibun no yōken de, anata ni yurushi o motomeru tokiniha, yoi to omou mono wa yurushi, kare-ra no tame ni arrā no o yurushi o koe. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
24|63|Anata gata wa shito no yobikake o, anata gata sōgo-kan no yobikake no yō ni shite wa naranai. Arrā wa anata gata no naka, hisokani nukedasu mono o shitte ora reru. Sorede, kare (arrā) no meirei ni ihan suru mono wa shiren ga kudari, matawa itamashī chōbatsu ga kase rarerukara, yōjin sa se nasai.
24|64|Kike, ten to ji no subete no yū wa arrā no yūdearu. Kare wa, anata gata no aru ga mama o kaku to shitte ora reru. Kare-ra ga kare no moto ni kisa reru hi, kare hakare-ra no okonatta koto o, kare-ra ni tsuge shiraserudearou. Arrā wa subete no koto o yoku shitte ora reru.
25|1|Banmin e no keikoku-sha to suru tame ni, kare noshi mo be ni shikibetsu o kudasa reta kata ni shukufuku are.
25|2|Ten to ji no taiken wa kare no yūdearu. Kare wa ko o mōke rarezu, mata sono taiken ni (san'yo suru) kyōryoku-sha mo naku, issai no mono o kura u zō shite, kisokutadashiku chitsujo dzuke rareru.
25|3|Daga kare-ra wa kare no soto ni kamigami o tateruga, sorera wa nani mo tsukurenai bakari ka, sorera jishin tsukura reta mono de, mizukara o gaisuru koto mo eki suru koto mo dekizu, mata shi mo nama mo fukkatsu mo, jiyū ni naranai.
25|4|Daga fushinjin'na-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa, kare ga tsukuriageta kyogen ni suginai. Soto no mono-tachi ga, kare ni kyōryoku shita nodearu.'Daga koto wa kare-ra koso, muhō to kyogi o (nishi? ) Shita nodearu.
25|5|Mata kare-ra wa iu. `Mukashi no monogatari de, sore o kare ga kakikudashita nodearu. Sore o asayufu, kuchi de itte kakitora seta nodearu.'
25|6|Itte yaru ga ī. `Kore o kudasa reta no wa, tenchi no ōgi o shitte ora re, hontōni kan'yō ni shite jihibukai kata de ara reru.'
25|7|Mata kare-ra wa iu. `Koreha-dōshita shitoda. Tabemono o tabe, machi o arukimawaru to wa, dōshite tenshi ga tsukawasa re, kare to issho ni keikoku-sha ni naranai nodarou ka.
25|8|Kare ni (dōshite) zaihō ga sadzuke rarenai no ka, mata (ikurademo) tabe rareru kaju-en o motanai nodarou ka.' Fugi no to-tachi wana shūtome,`anata gata wa,(Ken? ) Kareta mono ni shitagau dake no kotodearu.' To iu.
25|9|Kare-ra ga, don'na 譬 O, anata no tame ni mochidashita ka o mi nasai. Sore de kare-ra wa mayotte shimatte, michi o midasenai.
25|10|Kare ga nozoma rerunaraba, sore yori sugureta mono o, anata ni ataeru koto no dekiru kata. Kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen, soshite kyūden o anata ni ataeru okata ni shukufuku are.
25|11|Ni mo kakawarazu, kare-ra wa (shinpan no) toki o kyogidearu to suru. Ware wa, sonotoki o kyogidearu to suru mono ni taishi, moesakaru hi o yōi shite iru.
25|12|Haruka ni hanareta tokoro kara miru toki, kare-ra wa sono dosei to hōkō o kikudearou.
25|13|Kare-ra ga shibara rete hi goku no semai tokoro ni nagekoma reru toki,(isso) sokode, horobite shimau koto o tangan surudearou.
25|14|(Sonotoki, iwa reyou. ) `Kyō, ichido ni metsubō o tangan shite mo damedearu. Anata gata wa tabitabi kurikaesu metsubō demo tangan suruga ī.'
25|15|Itte yaru ga ī. `Kono (hi goku) ga yoi ka, soretomo omo o osoreru mono ni yakusoku sa reru eien no rakuen ka. Kore ga, kare-ra e no hōshōdeari ikitsuku tokorodearu.
25|16|Soko ni wa, sono nozomu subete no mono ga aru. Eien no sumikana nodearu. Kore wa anata gataga nengan suru,-nushi kara no yakusokudearu.'
25|17|Kare-ra soshite arrā igai ni tsukaeru mono-tachi o issho ni shōshū nasa reru hi, kare wa ōse rareyou. `Korera ware no shimo be-tachi o mayowa seta no wa anata gatadearu no ka. Soretomo kare-ra ga (mizukara) michi o fumihazushita no ka.'
25|18|Kare-ra wa iu. `Anata ni tatae are, anata no soto ni gādian o agameru koto wa, watashi-tachi ni fusawashiku arimasen. Daga anata wa, kare-ra to sono sosen ni (gense de no) kyōraku o yurusa re kunkai o wasurete hametsu no min to narimashita.'
25|19|(-Nushi wa ōse rareyou. ) `Ima kare-ra wa, anata gata no itta koto o usodearu. To risshō shita. Sorede anata gata wa (chōbatsu o) manukare rarezu, mata tasuke mo (e rare) nai. Ware wa, anata gata no naka, aku o okonau mono ni, chōbatsu o aji wa serudearou.
25|20|Anata izen ni ware ga tsukawashita shito-tachi wa, hitori to shite tabemono o tabenai mono wa naku, machi o arukimawaranai mono wa nakatta. Ware wa anata gata o otagai no shiren to naru yō ni torihakaratta.' Sorede anata gata wa taeshinobudearou ka. Anata no omo wa,(subete no koto o) shōran nasa reru.
25|21|Ware to no (shinpan no tame no) kaiken o nozomanai mono wa iu. `Naze tenshi ga watashi-tachi ni kudasa renai no ka. Mata (naze) watashi-tachi no omo ga,-me no mae ni mienai nodearou ka.' Kare-ra wa hontōni unuborete kōmandeari, mata hijō ni ōheina taido o totta nodearu.
25|22|Kare-ra ga tenshi o miru hi, tsumibito ni totte, yorokobi no nai hidearu. Kare-ra (tenshi) wa iudearou. ` (Anata gata ni wa) kinji rarete iru, tōzakare.'
25|23|Ware wa kare-ra no okonatta koto ni mukuite, sore o chiri no yō ni makichirasudearou.
25|24|Rakuen no nakama wa sonohi, subarashī sumai ni ochitsuite, kokoroyoi hirune-sho ni iyou.
25|25|Sonohi, ten wa kumo to tomoni sake, tenshi-tachi ga tsukawasa re (taikyo shite) kudaro.
25|26|Sonohi, shin no taiken wa, jihibukaki okata ni zokusuru. Fushin-sha ni totte wa, tanan no hidearu.
25|27|Sonohi, aku o okonatta mono wa,(shimatta to,) sono-te o ( 噛 ? ) Mi, iudearou. `Ā , watashi ga moshi shito to tomoni (tadashī) michi o erande itanaraba.
25|28|Ā, nasakenai, watashi ga an'na mono o tomo to shinakattanaraba.
25|29|Hontōni kare wa, kunkai ga kudatta nochi ni watashi o mayowa seta nodesu. Akuma wa tsuneni ningen o uragirimasu.'
25|30|Shito wa iu. `Omo yo, hontōni watashi no hitobito wa, kono kuruān o imubeki mono to shite kyohi shimasu.'
25|31|Ware wa kono yō ni, sorezore no yogen-sha ni, tsumibukaki-sha-tachi no naka kara teki o tsukuru. Daga shidō-sha, enjo-sha to shite wa anata no omo dakede jūbundearu.
25|32|Mata shinkō shinai mono wa,`kuruān wa naze ichido ni zenkan ga kudasa renai nodesu ka.' To iu. Kō suru no wa, ware ga anata no kokoro o kengo ni suru tame, yoku totonoete junjoyoku fukushō sa seru tamedearu.
25|33|Mata, kare-ra ga 譬 O, anata ni mochidashite kuru tabi ni shinri to saizen no kaishaku (no tegakari) o anata ni ataeru tamedearu.
25|34|Kao o utsumukete jigoku ni atsume rareru-sha, korera wa saiaku no kyōchi ni oka reru, 酪 Ku michinimayotta-shadearu.
25|35|(Kore yori saki) ware wa mūsā ni keiten o sazuke, sono kyōdai hārūn o agete kare no hojo-sha to shita.
25|36|Ware wa sonotoki (meijite) itta. `Anata gata ryōnin wa, waga shirushi o kyohi suru min no moto ni ike.' Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o tetteiteki ni 懲 Shimete kaimetsu shita.
25|37|Mata nūfu no min wa shito o kyohi shitanode, ware wa kare-ra o obore sasete, hitobito e no shirushi to shita. Ware wa aku o okonau mono no tame ni, itamashī chōbatsu o junbi shite iru.
25|38|Mata ādo to samūdo to rassu no jūmin-tachi, soshite sonoaida no iku sedai.
25|39|Ware wa sorezore no min ni jitsurei o motte keikoku shi, mata (sono tsumi ni taishi) sorezore o tetteiteki ni kaimetsu shita.
25|40|Kare-ra (fushin-sha) wa, wazawai no ame o dotto fura sa reta machi o, tabitabi otozurete iru. Kare-ra wa sore o minakatta no ka, iya, kare-ra wa fukkatsu no hi nado omoi mo yoranakatta nodearu.
25|41|Kare-ra ga anata o miru toki, tada reishō no-teki ni suru dakedearu. (Soshite iu. ) `Arrā ga, shito to shite tsukawasa reta no wa, kono-shadearu no ka.
25|42|Moshi watashi-tachi ga kamigami ni taishi, shikkari shite inakattanaraba, kare wa ayauku sore kara madowashi denrai no kamigami o misuteru tokorodeatta.'Daga, yagate chōbatsu o miru toki, dare ga, mottomo michinimayotta ka ga wakarudearou.
25|43|Anata wa jibun no omowaku o,-shin to shite (omoikomu)-sha o mita no ka. Anata wa kare-ra no gādian ni naru tsumorina no ka.
25|44|Soretomo kare-ra no ōku wa mimi o katamuke, matawa satoru to demo omotte iru no ka. Kare-ra wa kachiku no yōna mono ni suginai. Iya, sore yori mo michi kara mayotte iru.
25|45|Omo wa ikaga ni kage o hiroge rareta ka, anata wa minakatta no ka. Moshi kare ga o nozominaraba, sore o seishishita mama ni sa reyou. Sorekara ware wa, taiyō o sono an'nai-yaku to shita.
25|46|Sokode ware wa, yuruyakana ashidori de ware no kata ni hikiyoseru.
25|47|Kare koso wa, anata gata no tame ni yoru o tobari to sa re, suimin shite kyūsoku sa se, hiruma o yomigaeri (no toki) to nasa reta okatadearu.
25|48|Mata kare koso wa, sono jiu o furasu mae ni, kippō no kaze o fuki okosu okatadearu. Soshite ware wa, ten kara seijōna ame o furasu.
25|49|Ware wa sore de shinda daichi ni seimei o atae, mata ware ga tsukutta musū no kachiku ya ningen ni noma sete yaru.
25|50|Ware wa kare-ra ga kidzuku yō ni, kare-ra no ma de kore o kurikaeshi (te kaimei shi)ta. Daga dai tasū no ningen wa, tada kobamu dakedeatta.
25|51|Ware ga moshi nozomunaraba, dono machi ni mo keikoku-sha o 1-ri dzutsu tsukawashitadearou.
25|52|Dakara fushin-sha ni shitagatte wa naranai. Kare-ra ni taishi kono (kuruān) o motte ōini funtō doryoku shi nasai.
25|53|Kare koso wa, futatsunoumi o wake hedate rareta okatadearu. Hitotsu wa amaku shite umai,-gai wa shiokaraku shite nigai. Ryōsha no ma ni shōheki o mōke, kanzen ni bunri nasa reta.
25|54|Kare koso wa, mizu kara ningen o tsukuri, kettō ni yoru shinzoku to kon'in no kankei o sadame rareta kata. Hontōni anata no omo wa zen'nō de ara reru.
25|55|Daga kare-ra wa arrā o sashioite mueki mugai no mono ni tsukaeru. Hontōni fushin-sha wa, jibun no omo ni hankō suru mono (akuma) no enjo-shadearu.
25|56|Ware wa, tada kippō no dentatsu-sha, mata keikoku-sha to shite anata o tsukawashita dakedearu.
25|57|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa kore ni taishi, anata gata ni nani no hōshū mo motomenai. Daremoga,-nushi e no (tadashī) michi o nozomeba yoi'
25|58|shinu koto no nai eisei-sha o shinrai shite, kare o tataete 唱念 Shi nasai. Kare wa, shimo be-tachi no subete no tsumi o kanzen ni jukuchi sa reru.
25|59|Kare wa, ten to ji soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o, 6-nichi no ma ni sōzō shi, sorekara gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru jihibukaki okata de ara reru.Dakara kare ni tsuite jukuchi suru mono ni toe.
25|60|Daga kare-ra ga,`jihibukaki okata ni sajida shi nasai.' To iwa reru to, kare-ra wa iu. `Jihibukaki okata to wa nanidesu ka. Watashi-tachi wa anata no meijiru mono ni sajida suru nodesu ka.' To, kaette (shinri kara no) tōhi o masu bakari. 〔Sajida〕
25|61|ten ni sho seiza o haichi shi, sonoaida ni taiyō to terasu tsuki o oka reta okata ni, shukufuku are.
25|62|Kare koso wa, hansei shi, kansha shiyou to suru mono no tame ni yoru to hiru o mōke, kōtai sa seta katadearu.
25|63|Jihibukaki okata no shimo be-tachi wa, kenkyo ni chijō o aruku 宕 , Mata muchi no to (tashinkyō to) ga hanashikakete mo,`heian'are.' To (aisatsu shite) iu monodearu.
25|64|Mata omo no gozen ni sajida (matawa) kiritsu shite, yoru o sugosu mono.
25|65|Mata,`omo yo, jigoku no chōbatsu o watashi-tachi kara opparatte kudasai. Hontōni ano chōbatsu wa, kurushimi no kiwamidesu.
25|66|Hontōni sore wa warui sumaideari, warui yasumi-shodesu.' To iu monodearu.
25|67|Mata (zaika o) tsukau sai ni rōhi shinai mono, mata rinshokude mo naku, yoku sono chūkan o tamotsu mono.
25|68|Arrā to narabete,-gai no don'na kami ni mo inoranai mono, seitōnariyū ga nai kagiri, arrā ga kinji rareta sesshō o okasu koto naku, mata kan in shinai monodearu.Daga oyoso son'na koto o suru mono wa, chōbatsu sa reru.
25|69|Fukkatsu no hi ni wa chōbatsu wa (tsumi ni ōji) baika sa re, sono (jigoku de) kutsujoku no naka ni eien ni sumudearou.
25|70|Kaigo shite shinkō shi, zenkō ni hagemu mono wa betsudearu. Arrā wa korera no mono no, iroirona hikō o kaete zenkō ni sa reru. Arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
25|71|Kaigo shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa, honki de arrā ni kuite iru monodearu.
25|72|Uso no shōgen o shinai mono, mata muda-banashi o shite iru soba o tōru toki mo jichō shite tōrisugiru mono.
25|73|Mata wadai ga omo no shirushi ni oyobeba tsunbo (oshi? )-Sha ka mōjindearu ka no yō ni, 戯-Ra ni shiranaifuri o shinai mono.
25|74|Soshite,`omo yo, kokoro no nagusame to naru tsuma to shison o watashi-tachi ni atae,-nushi o osoreru mono no mohan ni shite kudasai.' To (inotte) iu mono.
25|75|Korera no mono wa, sono taeshinonda koto ni yori takai kai-i no sumai o motte (rakuen no naka ni) mukuwa reyou. Mata sokode kangei to aisatsu no kotoba o motte mukae rareyou.
25|76|Soko ni eien ni sumu nodearu. Nanto yoi sumai, nanto yoi yasumi-shodearu koto yo.
25|77|(Fushin-sha ni) itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gataga watashi no omo ni inoranainara, kare wa anata gata o, kamatte kudasaranaidearou. Anata gata wa hontōni (omo o) usotsuki yobawari shitaga, yagate manukare rarenai (chōbatsu ga) kudarudearou.'
26|1|Tā su~īn mīmu.
26|2|Kore wa meiryōna keiten no shirushidearu.
26|3|Kare-ra ga shinja ni narou to shinai tame, anata wa tabun, shinuhodo kunō shite iru kotodearou.
26|4|Moshi ware ga sono tsumori to nari, ten kara shirushi o kudaseba, kare-ra wa sore ni osoreitte kenkyo ni narudearou.
26|5|Daga, jihibukaki okata kara kare-ra ni atarashī kunkai ga (toki? ) Sa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa itsumo somuki saru.
26|6|Kare-ra wa (sore o) usodearu to suru.Daga ima ni sono gurō suru koto ga, sonojitsu to natte, kare-ra ni furikakaru nodearu.
26|7|Kare-ra wa, ka no daichi o minai no ka. Ikaga ni ōku no, subete no tōtoi mono o, ware wa soko de sodateru ka o.
26|8|Hontōni sono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|9|Hontōni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okatadearu.
26|10|Anata no omo ga mūsā ni yobikake, kō ōse rareta toki o omoi nasai. `Fuhōna min no moto ni ike.
26|11|Firuaun no min no moto ni. Kare-ra wa omo o osorenai no ka.'
26|12|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Watashi no omo yo, kare-ra ga watashi o (ari? )-Tsuki yobawari suru koto o osoremasu.
26|13|Watashi no mune wa appaku sa re, mata watashi no shita wa (-tei? ) Remasu. Desukara hārūn o, noko washi (tasuke)te kudasai.
26|14|Mata (sono Jō) kare-ra wa, watashi ni tsumi o ka shite irunode, watashi o korosu no o osoremasu.'
26|15|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Kesshite sōde wanai. Anata gata ryōnin wa, waga shirushi o motte ike. Hontōni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni ite, kiite iru nodearu.
26|16|Sorede anata gata ryōnin wa, firuaun no moto ni itte itte yaru ga ī. “Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yū no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shitodearukara,
26|17|Isuraeru no shison o, watashi-tachi to issho ni ika sete kudasai” to.'
26|18|Kare wa itta. `Anata wa yōshō no toki, watashi-tachi no ma de sodate raretade wanai ka. Anata no shōgai no ōku no nengetsu o, watashi-tachi no ma de sugoshitade wanai ka.
26|19|Sorenanoni anata wa 酪 I koto o shidekashita monoda. Anata wa onwowasureru-sha no nakamadearu.'
26|20|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Watashi ga, sore o okonatta no wa jadō ni fumi mayotte ita toki no kotodearu.
26|21|Sorede watashi wa osoroshiku natte, anata gatakara nige dashita. Daga,-nushi wa watashi ni chishiki o sazukete, shito no hitori to nasa reta nodearu.
26|22|Anata wa Isuraeru no shison o dorei to shite okinagara, sore ga watashi ni kōi o shimesu onkeidearu to demo iu nodesu ka.'
26|23|Firuaun wa itta. `Ban'yū no omo to wa, nandesuka.'
26|24|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no yū no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi (kore o) satottanaraba.'
26|25|Kare (firuaun) wa, sayū no mono ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata wa kikimashita ka.'
26|26|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Anata gata no shu, mata mukashikara no anata gata no sosen no omode mo ara remasu.'
26|27|Kare (firuaun wa sayū no mono ni) itta. `Anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kono shito wa, hontōni kichigaidesu.'
26|28|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Azuma to nishi, mata sonoaida ni aru ban'yū no omode ara remasu. Anata gataga moshi rikai suru nodeareba.'
26|29|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata ga, moshi watashi igai ni kami o taterunaraba, watashi wa kanarazu anata o shūjin ni surudeshou.'
26|30|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Watashi ga moshi, meihakuna nanimono ka o, anata ni (Yū? ) Shite modesu ka.'
26|31|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata no iu koto ga hontōnara, sore o shimeshi nasai.'
26|32|Sorede (mūsā) wa tsue o nageta. Miruga ī. Sore wa akiraka ni hebi to naru.
26|33|Mata kare no tewosashinoberu to, miruga ī. Sore wa dare ga mite mo masshirodearu.
26|34|Kare (firuaun) wa sayū no chōrō-tachi ni itta. `Hontōni kore wa, rōren'na majutsu-shidearu.
26|35|Kare wa sono majutsu de, anata gata o kono kuni kara oidasou to shite iru. Sorede anata gata wa dō shiyō to iu no ka.'
26|36|Kare-ra wa itta. ` (Hisashiku) kare to sono kyōdai o taiki sa se, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni noko washi,
26|37|subete no rōren'na majutsu-shi o anata no moto ni meshidasa reyo.'
26|38|Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, kimerareta-bi no kimerareta jikoku ni atsume rareta.
26|39|Mata minshū ni mukatte mo,`anata gata wa (zenbu) shūgō shita no ka.' To tsuge rareta.
26|40|(Hitobito wa iu. ) `Majutsu-shi no kata ga kateba, watashi-tachi wa kare-ra (no oshie) ni shitagaoude wanaidesu ka.'
26|41|Majutsu-shi-tachi wa yattekurunari, firuaun ni itta. `Watashi-tachi ga kateba, kanarazu hōbi ga arudeshou ka.'
26|42|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Mochirondearu. So no baai anata gata wa, kanarazu sokkin to narou.'
26|43|Mūsā wa kare-ra ni mukatte itta. `Anata gata no nageru mono o, nage nasai.'
26|44|Sokode kare-ra wa, nawa to tsue o nagete itta. `Firuaun no o ikō ni chikai kete, watashi-tachi wa kanarazu shōri-sha ni narou.'
26|45|Sonotoki mūsā ga tsue o nageru to, miruga ī. Sore wa kare-ra no netsuzō shita mono o, nomikonde shimatta.
26|46|Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, satto fushi sajida shite,
26|47|itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, ban'yū no omo o shinjimasu.
26|48|Mūsā to hārūn no omo o.'
26|49|Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Anata gata wa, watashi no yurushi mo enai uchi ni kare o shinjiru no ka. Kitto kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta, anata gata no shuchōdearou. Daga, yagate omoishirudearou. Watashi wa kanarazu anata gata no te to ashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shi, anata gata o, subete haritsuke no kei ni surudearou.'
26|50|Kare-ra wa itta. `Kamaimasen. Watashi-tachi wa, jibun no omo no moto ni kaeru dakedesukara.
26|51|Watashi-tachi no negai wa, tada-nushi ga, watashi-tachi no kazukazu no ayamachi o yurusa re, watashi-tachi ga shinja-tachi no sakigake ni naru kotodesu.'
26|52|Ware wa mūsā ni,`waga shimo be-tachi to issho ni, yoru no ma ni tabidate. Anata gata wa kanarazu otte ga kakarudearou.' To keiji shita.
26|53|Sonotoki firuaun wa, tsukai no mono o sho toshi ni tsukawashi,
26|54|(iwa seta) `korera no mono wa, hon'no shōsū no mure ni suginai nodesu.
26|55|Kare-ra wa, watashi-tachi ni hara o tatete irudeshouga,
26|56|watashi-tachi wa, keikai o totonoe, gunzei mo ōi nodesu.'
26|57|Sorede ware wa, kare-ra o kaju-en ya izumi kara oidashi,
26|58|zaihō ya eiyo aru chii kara tsuihō shita.
26|59|Son'na shidaideatta. Soshite ware wa Isuraeru no shison-tachi ni, korera no mono o (soto no tokoro de) tsuga seta.
26|60|Sate kare-ra (firuaun no gunzei) wa hinode no toki, kare-ra o otte kita.
26|61|Ryōsha ga tagaini sugata ga mieru yō ni naru to, mūsā no nakama wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, kanarazu oitsuka rerudearou.'
26|62|Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Kesshite, kesshite. Hontōni omo wa watashi to tomoni ora remasu. Sugu ni onmichibiki ga arudeshou.'
26|63|Sonotoki, ware wa mūsā ni keiji shita. `Anata no tsue de umi o ute.' Suruto sore wa wakaretaga, sorezore no wareta bubun wa kyodaina yama no yōdeatta.
26|64|Ware wa mata,-gai no gun o soko ni obiki konda.
26|65|Soshite ware wa, mūsā soshite kare to tomoni ita hitobito subete o sukutta.
26|66|Daga hoka no mono-tachi o, obore saseta.
26|67|Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|68|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
26|69|Iburāhīmu no monogatari o kare-ra ni katari nasai.
26|70|Kare ga chichioya to kare no hitobito ni mukatte,`anata gata wa nani o sūhai suru nodesu ka.' To itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
26|71|Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa gūzō o sūhai shi, itsumo kore ni tsukaeru nodesu.'
26|72|Kare wa itta. `Anata gata ga inoru toki kare-ra (gūzō) wa kiku no ka.
26|73|Mata kare-ra (gūzō) wa, anata gata o ekisuru nodesu ka, soretomo gaisuru nodesu ka.'
26|74|Kare-ra wa itta. `Iya, watashi-tachi no sosen ga, kōshite iru no o mita nodesu.'
26|75|Kare wa itta. `Sorenara anata gata wa, anata gataga ima made sūhai shite kita mono ni tsuite kangaete mita nodesu ka.
26|76|Anata gata mo, mukashi no sosen-tachi mo (sūhai shite ita mono ni tsuite).
26|77|Ban'yū no omo o nozoite wa, kare-ra wa watashi no tekidesu.
26|78|Kare wa watashi o tsukura reta kata de, watashi o michibika re,
26|79|watashi ni shokuryō o shikyū shi, mata inryō o sadzuke rareta okata.
26|80|Mata byōki ni nareba, kare wa watashi o iyashite kudasaimasu.
26|81|Watashi o shina se, sorekara ikikaera se rareru okata.
26|82|Shinpan no hi ni wa, zaika o o yurushi kudasa reru yō, watashi ga negai nozomu katadearu.
26|83|Omo yo, eichi o watashi ni sazuke, tadashī-sha-tachi no nakama ni irete kudasai.
26|84|Watashi o atoato no yo made shinjitsu o tsutaeta mono to shite kudasai.
26|85|Watashi o shifuku no en o tsugu mono ni nasa re,
26|86|watashi no chichi o o yurushi kudasai. Hontōni kare wa mayotta mono no nakamadesuga.
26|87|Mata (hitobito ga) fukkatsu sa se rareru hi ni, watashi no menboku o ushinawa senaide kudasai.
26|88|Sonohi ni wa, zaihō mo musuko-tachi mo, yakudachimasen.
26|89|Tada yogore no nai kokoro o, arrā ni bō-geru mono dake wa betsudesuga.'
26|90|Rakuen wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni chikadzuke rare,
26|91|jadō ni mayotta mono ni wa, hi goku ga arawareyou.
