32|15|Ware no shirushi o shinjiru mono to wa, sore ga nobe rareta toki ni keibo shi mi o nage dashite sajida shi,-nushi no eikō o tataete 唱念 Suru, kōmande wanai-sha-tachidearu. 〔Sajida〕
32|16|kare-ra no karada ga gashō o hanareru to, osore to kibō to o daite omoni inori, ware ga sazuketa mono o hodokoshi ni sashi dasu.
32|17|Kare-ra wa sono okonatta koto no hōshō to shite, yorokobashī mono ga jibun'notameni hisoka ni (yōi) sa rete iru no o shiranai.
32|18|Shinkō shite iru mono ga,-nushi no okite ni somuku mono to onajidearou ka. Kare-ra wa kesshite onajide wanai.
32|19|Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa, rakuen ga sumai de, soreha zenkō o shita koto e no hōshōdearu.
32|20|Daga okite ni somuku mono no sumai wa jigoku no gōkadearu. Soko kara deyou to suru tabi ni kare-ra wa sono naka ni hikimodosa re,`anata gataga kyogidearu to shite ita gōka no chōbatsu o ajiwae.' To iwa reyou.
32|21|Ware wa ōkī chōbatsu no mae ni, kanarazu tedjikana chōbatsu o kare-ra ni aji wa seru. Sō sureba kare-ra mo (kaigo shite ware ni) kaerudearou.
32|22|Omo no shirushi ni kidzuite inagara sonogo somuki saru mono yori hidoi tsumitsukuri ga arou ka. Ware wa kanarazu tsumibukaimono ni hōfuku surudearou.
32|23|Ware wa, mūsā ni shikato keiten o sazuketa. Dakara anata (muhanmado) ga kore o sazukaru koto o utagatte wa naranai. Ware wa sore o, Isuraeru no shison-tachi no michibiki to shita.
32|24|Ware wa, kare-ra no ma kara, waga meirei o kudashite (hitobito o) michibiku dōshi o ageta. Kare-ra wa yoku taeshinobi mata ware no shirushi o kataku shinjite ita.
32|25|Hontōni anata no omo wa, kare-ra ga iken o kotoni shite ita koto ni kanshite, shinpan no hi ni kare-ra no ma o saiketsu nasa reru.
32|26|Kare-ra ni oshienakatta ka. Sore izen ni ware ga iku sedai o horoboshi taka o. Sono sumai no naka o,(ima) kare-ra wa ōrai shite iru. Hontōni sono nakaniha, shuju no shirushi ga aru. Soredemo kare-ra wa kikumimiwomotanai no ka.
32|27|Mata ware ga mizu o fumōnochi ni okuri, sorede sakumotsu o ikusei sa se, kare-ra jishin ya kachiku ni tabe saseru no o minai no ka. Kare-ra wa mirume o motanai no ka.
32|28|Kare-ra wa,`moshi anata gata ga iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba shōri wa itsu kuru nodesu ka.' To iu.
32|29|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Shōri no hi ni wa, fushinjindeatta mono no shinkō wa kare-ra ni yakudatazu, kare-ra wa yūyo mo sa renaidearou.'
32|30|Dakara anata wa, kare-ra o sakete mate. Kare-ra mo matte iru nodearu.
33|1|Yogen-sha yo, arrā o osore, fushin-sha ya nise shinja ni shitagatte wa naranai. Hontōni arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
33|2|Nushi kara anata ni keiji sa reta tokoro ni shitagae. Hontōni arrā wa, anata no okonau koto o shiri tsukusa reru.
33|3|Arrā ni subete o takushi nasai. Hontōni arrā wa, kanrisha to shite banzende ara reru.
33|4|Arrā wa don'na otoko no karada no naka ni mo 2tsu no shinzō o tsukura renai. Anata gataga,`wagahahano senaka no yōda.' To itte (rien sengen suru) tsuma o anata gata no uminooya to dō ichi ni o tsukuri ni wa nara renai. Mata kare wa anata gata no yōshi o, anata gata no jisshi-tomo nasa renai. Korera wa, anata gataga kuchisaki dake de itta kotodearu. Daga arrā wa shinjitsu o katari, katsu (tadashī) michi ni michibika reru.
33|5|Kare-ra (yōshi) no chichi (no sei) o motte kare-ra o ko pe. Sore ga arrā no o me ni mottomo tadashī nodearu. Moshi kare-ra no chichi (no sei) o shiranainara, shinkō ni okeru anata gata no kyōdai, tomo to iu koto ni suruga yoi. Anata gataga sore ni tsuite ayamaru koto ga atte mo,-zaide wanai. Daga anata gata no kokoro ni warui ito no aru baai wa betsudearu. Arrā wa Satoru yō ni shite jihibukaki okata de ara reru.
33|6|Yogen-sha wa, shinja ni tori kare-ra jishin yori mo chikaku, mata kare (Sei yogen-sha) no tsuma-tachi wa kare-ra (shinja-tachi) no hahadearu. Mata arrā no sadamede wa mi no ketsuen kankei-sha wa tagaini, shinkō-jō no kyōdai (ansāru) ya (makka yori no) ijū-sha yori mo shinkindearu. Daga anata gata no mikata no tame ni wa, shinsetsu ni shite yare. Kore wa keiten ni shirusa rete iru kotodearu.
33|7|Mata ware ga, yogen-sha-tachi kara seiyaku o totta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. Anata kara mo, mata nūfu, iburāhīmu, mūsā, maruyamu no ko īsā kara mototta toki no koto o. Ware wa, ogosoka ni kare-ra kara seiyaku o totta nodearu.
33|8|(Kore wa omo ga) chūseina-sha ni, kare-ra no chūsei-sa o towa reru tamedearu. Kare wa fushinjin-sha-tachi no tame ni, itamashī chōbatsu o sonae rareru.
33|9|Shinkō suru mono yo, anata gata ni atae rareta arrā no onkei o nen e. Taigun ga anata gata ni semeyosete kita toki, ware wa kare-ra ni taishi ōkaze to,-me ni mienu gunzei o tsukawashita. Arrā wa, anata gata no okonau koto o (meikaku ni) gozonji de ara reru.
33|10|Miruga ī. Kare-ra wa, anata gata no ue kara mata shita kara osotte kita. Sonotoki-me wa kasumi, shinzō wa nodo moto made todoite, anata gata wa arrā ni tsuite, iroiro to (warui) sōzō o shita.
33|11|Kōshite shinja-tachi wa kokoromi rare, kare-ra wa mōretsuna dōyō ni 播 Sa bura reta.
33|12|Sonotoki, nise shinja ya kokoro ni yamai no yado tte iru-sha-tachi wa,`arrā to sono shito wa, tada azamuite watashi-tachi ni yakusoku shita nodesu.' To itta.
33|13|Mata kare-ra no ichidan wa itta. `Yasuribu (Aru madīna) no min yo. Anata gata ni wa totemo ganbareru monode wanai. Hikikaeshi nasai.' Mata kare-ra no aru mono wa, yogen-sha ni (kikan no) yurushi o negatte,`hontōni watashi-tachi no ie wa (mubōbi de kiken ni) sarasa rete imasu.' To itta. Kare-ra wa, sarasa rete iru node wanai, tada tōbō o nozonda dakedearu.
33|14|Moshi kare-ra (tekigun) ga yomo kara soko ni shin'nyū shite kite, hanran o yobikaketanara, kare-ra wa kanarazu kore o ukeire, sukoshi mo (sore ni) okureru koto wa nakattadearou.
33|15|Shikamo kare-ra wa sakini, kesshite somuki saranai to, arrā ni chikatte ita. Arrā to no yakusoku wa,(kanarazu) jinmon sa reru nodearu.
33|16|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Tōbō wa, tatoe shi ya senshi kara manugarete mo, anata gata o masanai. Anata gata wa suki no ma o tanoshimu takedearu.'
33|17|Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā ga, anata gata ni wazawai o nozoma re, mata jihi o hodokosou to nozoma reta toki dare ga, sore o sashitome rareyou ka. Arrā o oite wa, kare-ra no hogo-sha mo enjo-sha mo inai nodearu.'
33|18|Arrā wa, anata gata no naka (hitobito o) hiki tometa mono, mata sono dōhō ni mukatte,`watashi-tachi no kata e koi.' To itta mono o shitte ora reru. Mata kare-ra wa wazuka no ma no soto, senjō ni wa nozomanakatta.
33|19|Kare-ra wa anata ni taishite, don'yokudearu. Mā miruga ī. Kare-ra ni kiken ga otozureru to, rinjū no hito no yō ni medama o gurutto mawashite, anata o jukushi suru. Soshite kiken ga saruto yoi mono bakari musabori, kuchibiru o togara sete anata gata o tsūretsu ni hinan suru. Korera no mono wa shinjade wanai. Arrā wa, kare-ra no okonai o mueki ni nasa reru. Sore wa arrā ni wa yōina kotodearu.
33|20|Kare-ra wa, buzoku rengō-gun wa haitai shita node wa nai to kangaete iru. Moshi buzoku rengō-gun ga (futatabi) kuru koto ga areba, kare-ra wa bedō~in-zoku no ma ni mi o oite, anata gata no jōsokuwotazuneru (tachiba ni naru) koto o negatte iru. Mata moshi kare-ra ga anata gata no naka ni ite mo, wazuka no mono no soto wa tatakawanaidearou.
33|21|Hontōni arrā no shito wa, arrā to shūmatsu no hi o netsubō suru 宕 , Arrā o ōku 唱念 Suru mono ni totte, rippana mohandeatta.
33|22|Shinja-tachi wa, buzoku rengō no gunzei o mita toki itta. `Kore wa arrā to kare no shito ga, watashi-tachi ni yakusoku sa reta monodearu. Arrā to kare no shito wa, shinjitsu o hanasa reta.' Soreha, kare-ra no shinjin to fukujū, kie no nen o, iya ga ue ni mo fukameta.
33|23|Shinja no nakaniha, arrā to musunda yakusoku ni chūjitsudeatta hitobito ga (ōku) ita nodearu. Aru mono wa sono chikai o hatashi, mata aru mono wa (Nao) matte iru. Kare-ra wa sukoshi mo (sono shin'nen o) kaenakatta.
33|24|(Kore wa kekkyoku) arrā ga, chūseina hitobito ni taishi sono chūsei-sa ni mukuwa re, mata kare ga o nozominaraba, nise shinja o basshi, aruiwa kare-ra o yurusa reru to iu kotodearu. Hontōni arrā wa, kan'yō ni shite jihibukaki okata de ara reru.
33|25|Arrā wa fushinjin'na-sha-tachi o, ikari no uchi ni (Aru madīna kara) nanra ekisuru tokoro naku tettai nasa reta. Tatakai ni wa, arrā wa, shinja-tachi no sentō o (kyōfū ya tenshi ni yotte) subete ni watatte, mamotte kudasaru. Arrā wa kyōdai ni shite iryoku narabinaki hō de ara reru.
33|26|Mata kare wa, kare-ra (rengō-gun) o kōen shita keiten'notami o, sorera no toride kara oi, sono shinjū ni kyōfu o tōji rareta. Anata gata wa aru mono o koroshi, mata aru mono o horyo to shita.
33|27|Mata kare wa, kare-ra (keiten'notami) no tochi, jūtaku, zaisan mata anata gata no mitō no ji o, anata gata ni tsuga se rareta. Arrā wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru.
33|28|Yogen-sha yo, anata no tsuma-tachi ni itte yaru ga ī. `Moshi anata gataga, gense no seikatsu to sono 煌 Biyaka-sa o nozomunara kuruga ī. Watashi wa okurimono o ataete, rippa ni wakareyou.
33|29|Daga anata ga tata ga moshi arrā to sono yogen-sha, soshite raise no sumai o motomerunaraba, anata gata no naka de zenkō ni dō shimu mono ni wa, arrā wa idaina hōshō o junbi shite kudasatte iru.'
33|30|Yogen-sha no tsuma-tachi yo, anata gata no naka de meihakuna shūkō o okashita mono wa, sore ni taisuru chōbatsu wa baika sa reyou. Arrā ni wa sore wa yōina kotodearu.
33|31|Daga anata gata no naka, arrā to sono shito ni fukujū, sūkei shite zenkō ni hagemu mono ni wa, ware wa sore ni taisuru hōshō o baika shi, kandaina yōdo o junbi surudearou.
33|32|Yogen-sha no tsuma-tachi yo, anata gata wa (soto no) on'na-tachi to onajide wanai. Moshi a naka gata ga arrā o osorerunaraba, kokoro ni yamai aru mono no i o ugokasa senai yō, kotoba ga karukute wa naranai. Tanseina kotoba de mono o ie.
33|33|Anata gata no ie ni shizukani shite, izen no muchi jidai no yō ni, medatsu kazari o shite wa naranai. Reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no hodokoshi o nashi, arrā to shito ni jūjundeare. Ie no mono-tachi yo, arrā wa anata gatakara fujō o harai, anata gataga seijōdearu koto o nozoma reru.
33|34|Mata anata gata no ie de dokuju sa reru, arrā no shirushi to eichi o meiki seyo. Hontōni arrā wa shinsetsu ni shite zenchi de ara reru.
33|35|Hontōni musurimu no otome, shinkō suru otome, kenshin-tekina otome, shōjikina otome, ken'nin'na otome, kenkyona otome, hodokoshi o suru otome, saikai (danjiki) suru otome, teisetsuna otome, arrā o ōku 唱念 Suru otome, korera no mono no tame ni, arrā wa tsumi o yurushi, idaina hōshō o junbi nasa reru.
33|36|Shinkō suru otoko mo on'na mo, arrā to sono shito ga, nanika o kime rareta toki, katte ni sentaku subekide wanai. Arrā to sono shito ni somuku mono wa, akiraka ni mayotte (yokomichi ni) soreta monodearu.
33|37|Arrā no onkei o sazukari, mata anata ga shinsetsu o tsukushita mono ni, kō itta toki o omoe. `Tsuma o anata no moto ni tome, arrā o osore nasai.'Daga anata wa, arrā ga bakuro shiyou to sa reta, jibun no mune no naka ni kakushite ita kodo (yōshi no tsuma to no kekkon ga hito no kuchi no hashi ni agaru koto) o osorete ita. Yasushi anata wa, arrā o osoreru no ga hontōdeatta. Sorede zaido ga, ka no on'na ni tsuite hitsuyōna koto o sumase (ribetsu shi)tanode, ware wa anata o kano on'na to kekkon sa seta. (Korekara wa) shinja ga, hitsuyōna rikon tetsudzuki o kanryō shita toki wa, jibun no yōshi no tsuma demo,(kekkon ni mo) sashitsukaenai koto ni shita. Arrā no meirei wa kansui shinakereba naranai.
33|38|Yogen-sha ga, arrā no o meirei o okonau no wa samatagenai. Kore wa anata izen no mono ni taisuru arrā no kankōdearu. Arrā no meirei wa ugokasenai sadamedearu.
33|39|Arrā no o tsuge o tsutaeru-sha-tachi wa, kare o osore, arrā igai no nanimono o mo osorenai. Arrā wa seisan-sha to shite banzende ara reru.
33|40|Muhanmado wa, anata gata otoko-tachi no dare no chichioya demonai. Shikashi, arrā no shitodeari, mata yogen-sha-tachi no fūkandearu. Hontōni arrā wa zenchi de ara reru.
33|41|Anata gata shinja yo, arrā o tsuneni 唱念 〔Zu~ikuru〕 shi nasai.
33|42|Asanayūna, kare no eikō o tatae nasai.
33|43|Kare koso wa, anata gata o ankoku kara kōmyō ni tsuredasu tame ni, tenshi-tachi tomodomo anata gata o shukufuku nasa reru katadearu. Kare wa shin no shinja ni, jihibukaku ara reru.
33|44|Kare-ra ga kare ni au hi no aisatsu wa,`heian'are.'Dearu. Kare-ra no tame ni, kandaina hōshō o junbi nasa reru.
33|45|Yogen-sha yo, hontōni ware wa anata o shōnin to shi, kippō no dentatsu-sha soshite keikoku-sha to shite tsukawashi,
33|46|kare no yurushi de (hitobito o) arrā ni maneku mono, kōmyō o ikiwatara seru 燈 To shite (tsukawashita) nodearu.
33|47|Sorede shinja-tachi ni arrā kara no idaina tamamono ga aru to no kippō o tsutae nasai.
33|48|Mu shinkō no mono ya nise shinja ni, shitagatte wa naranai. Kare-ra no wazurawashi-sa o i ni tomezu, tada hitasura arrā ni (subetewo) takushi nasai. Arrā wa,(subete no koto no) kanrisha to shite banzende ara reru.
33|49|Shinkō suru mono-tachi yo, anata gata wa shinja no fujin to kekkon shi, ka no on'na ni furenai uchi ni rikon suru baai wa, ka no on'na-ra ni tsuite sadame no kigen o keisan shinakute mo yoi. Ka no on'na-ra ni zōyo o nashi, menboku o tatete kirei ni ribetsu shi nasai.
33|50|Yogen-sha yo, ware ga anata no tsuma to shite yurushita mono wa, anata ga maharu o ataeta tsuma-tachi, mata horyo to shite arrā ga anata ni sazuketa, anata no migite no shoyū suru mono, anata no chichikata no oji, oba no musume-tachi, hahagata no oji, oba no musume-tachi de, anata to tomoni ijū shite kita mono, mata on'na no shinja de shinshin o yogen-sha ni sasageta to iu mono de, moshi yogen-sha ga kore to kekkon o hossurunaraba (yurusareru). Kore wa anata dake no (tokurei) de,-gai no shinja-tachi ni wa yurusa renai. Ware wa, anata ga kyūchi ni ochī iranai yō kare-ra (shinja) no tsuma, to sono migite no shoyū suru mono ni tsuite, kare-ra ni ware ga kimeta koto wa shōchi sa sete iru. Arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukai katadearu.
33|51|Anata wa tsuma-tachi no naka no, hossuru mono o sara se, hossuru mono o ukeirete mo yoi. Mata anata ga dokete ita mono o meshite mo tsumi wanai. Kore wa kano on'na-ra o yorokoba se, sono kokoro no urei o toki, mata anata ga kakuji ni ataeru mono de manzoku sa seru tame datōdearu. Arrā wa anata gataga mune ni daku koto o shitte ora reru. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite taido de ara reru.
33|52|Anata wa kono ato, on'na (o metoru koto) mo mata tsuma-tachi o torikaeru koto mo yurusa renai. Tatoe sono bibō ga anata no ki o hīte mo. Tadashi anata no migite ga shoyū suru mono wa betsudearu. Arrā wa subete no koto o kanshi nasa reru.
33|53|Shinkō suru mono yo, yogen-sha no ie ni shokuji ni yoba rete mo shokuji no junbi ga, kanryō suru made wa, uchinonaka ni katte ni haitte wa naranai.Daga yoba reta toki wa hairi nasai. Shokuji ga owattanaraba tachisare. Yokenbanashi ni chōza shite wa naranai. Konna koto ga yogen-sha ni meiwakudeatte mo, yogen-sha wa anata gata o (taisan sa seru koto o) enryo surudearou. Daga arrā wa shinjitsu o (tsugeru koto o) enryo nasa renai. Mata anata gataga, ka no on'na-ra ni nanigoto demo tazuneru toki wa, kanarazu-chō no nochi kara ni shi nasai. Sonokata ga anata gata no kokoro, mata kano on'na-ra no kokoro ni totte ichiban yogore ga nai. Mata anata gata wa, arrā no shito o, nayamasu yōna koto ga atte wa naranai. Mata anata gata wa don'na baai demo, kare no nochi de kare no tsuma-tachi o metotte wa naranai. Hontōni sorera wa, arrā no o me ni wa taizaidearu.
33|54|Anata gataga nani ka gen wa shite mo mata kakushite mo, arrā wa subete no koto o fukaku shitte ora reru.
33|55|Ka no on'na-tachi ga (vu~ēru o tottemo) tsumide wa nai no wa, ka no on'na-ra no chichi matawa musuko, sorekara kyōdai, kyōdai no musuko matawa shimai no musuko, matawa dō shin no on'na-tachi toka no on'na-tachi no migite ga shoyū suru mono-tachidearu. (Fujin-tachi yo. ) Arrā o osore nasai. Arrā wa hontōni subete no koto no risshō-sha de ara reru.
33|56|Hontōni arrā to tenshi-tachi wa, hijiri yogen-sha o shukufuku suru. Shinkō suru mono-tachi yo, anata gata wa kare o shukufuku shi,(saidai no) keii o haratte aisatsu shi nasai.
33|57|Hontōni arrā to shito o nayamasu mono ni wa, arrā wa gense demo raise demo, gekido nasa re, kare-ra no tame ni hazubeki chōbatsu o junbi nasa reru.
33|58|Mata riyū mo naku, danjo no shinja o futō ni nayamasu mono wa, kanarazu soshira rete meihakuna tsumi o ou.
33|59|Yogen-sha yo, anata no tsuma, musume-tachi mata shinja no on'na-tachi ni mo, ka no on'na-ra ni nagaginu o matou yō tsuge nasai. Sore de mitome rare yasuku, nayamasa renakute sumudearou. Arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
33|60|Moshi, nise shinja ya kokoro ni yamai no yadoru mono, soshite shichū no sendō-sha-tachi ga,(sono akuji o) tomenakereba, kare-ra ni taishi anata o, karitatete yarou. Sō sureba kono ato, kare-ra ga anata gata no rinjin to shite i rareru no mo, wazuka no madearou.
33|61|Kare-ra wa kanarazu norowa re, mitsukari shidai torae rare, korosarerudearou.
33|62|Kore wa mukashi no sugisatta-sha-tachi ni taisuru, arrā no kankōdearu. Arrā no kankō ni wa nani no henkō mo nai.
33|63|Hitobito wa (shinpan no)-ji ni tsuite anata ni tazuneyou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni, sono chishiki wa, arrā no omoto ni aru. Dōshite anata ni wakarudarou ka, sonotoki wa chikaidearou.'
33|64|Hontōni arrā wa fushin-sha ni gekido sa re, kare-ra no tame ni rekka o junbi nasa re,
33|65|kare-ra wa eien ni sono naka ni sumi, gādian mo kyūjo-sha mo miidasenaidearou.
33|66|Sonohi, kare-ra no kao ga hi no naka de hikkurikaeri, kare-ra wa,`ā , watashi-tachi wa arrā ni shitagai, mata shito ni shitagaeba yokatta.' To iudarou.
33|67|Mata kare-ra wa iudarou. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi wa, hontōni atama ya kenryoku-sha-tachi ni shitagatte imashita. Kare-ra ga watashi-tachi o,-dō ni mayowa seta nodesu.
33|68|Omo yo, kare-ra no chōbatsu o 2-bai ni shite, hidoi gekido de kare-ra ni o okori kudasai.'
33|69|Shinkō suru mono yo, mūsā o nayama shita mono no yōdeatte wa naranai. Daga arrā wa kare-ra no itta chūshō kara, kare o kiyome rareta. Arrā no omoto de, kare wa eiyo o atae rarete ita.
33|70|Shinkō suru mono yo, arrā o osore nasai. (Tsuneni) jitchokuna kotoba de mono o ii nasai.
33|71|Kare wa anata gata no tame ni sono okonai o kyōsei sa re, moromoro no tsumi o yurusa reru. Arrā to sono shito ni shitagau mono wa, tashika ni idaina kōfuku o jōju suru monodearu.
33|72|Hontōni ware wa, sho ten to daichi to yamayama ni shintaku o mōshitsuketa. Daga sorera wa sore o, ninau koto o jitai shi, katsu sore ni tsuite osoreta. Ningen wa sore o ninatta. Hontōni (ningen wa) fugideari katsu muchidearu.
33|73|(Sore de) arrā wa, nise shinja no otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi, mata tashinkyō to no otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi o, shobatsu nasa reru. Daga arrā wa, shinkō suru otoko-tachi to on'na-tachi ni wa, awaremi o kake rareru. Arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukai okata de ara reru.
34|1|Ten ni ari-chi ni aru su subete no mono o shoyū nasa reru arrā ni tatae are. Raise ni oite mo, tatae hakare no monodearu. Kare wa eimei ni shite subete ni tsūjite ora reru.
34|2|Kare wa daichi ni hairu mono, mata sore kara deru mono o subete shitte ora re, mata ten kara kudaru mono, narabini soko ni noboru mono subete o shitte ora reru. Kare wa jihibukaku kan'yōde ara reru.
34|3|Shinkō no nai mono wa,`(shinpan no)-ji wa, watashi-tachi ni wa konaidearou.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Iya, omo ni chikatte, sore wa kanarazu anata gata ni yattekuru nodearu. Yūgen-kai made mo shitte ora reru omo ni chikatte. Ten ni oite mo ji ni oite mo, mijin no omo-sa demo, kare kara manukare rareru mono wanai. Mata sore yori chīsai mono mo ōkī mono mo, meikakuna sho ni shirusa renai mono wanai.
34|4|Sore wa kare ga, shinkō shite zenkō o suru mono ni, mukuwa reru tamedearu. Korera no mono ni koso, kan'yō to kandaina onmegumi ga arou.
34|5|Daga ware no shirushi o munashiku suru tame ni doryoku suru mono, korera no mono ni wa itamashī chōbatsu ga arou.
34|6|Chishiki o sazukatta mononara,-nushi ga anata ni kudasa reta mono wa shinrideatte, sore ga iryoku aru kata, sanbi subeki hō no michi ni michibiku monodearu koto ga wakarudearou.'
34|7|Fushin-sha-tachi wa (chōshō shite) iu. `Anata gataga konagona ni sa re chirasa reta nochi de, atarashiku sōzō sa reru nado to tsugeru ningen o, oshiemashou ka.'
34|8|Daga kare wa arrā ni tsuite, kyogi o itta no ka. Soretomo kichigai ni natte shimatta to iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa raise o shinjinai, chōbatsu no naka ni iru 酪 I kokoroechigai no monodearu.
34|9|Kare-ra wa kare-ra no zengo ni aru ten to ji o minai no ka. Moshi hossurunaraba, ware ga kare-ra o daichi ni noma se, matawa ten'noikkaku o kare-ra no ue ni otosudearou. Hontōni sono nakaniha kaigo shite omoni kaero shimo be ni totte no shirushi ga aru.
34|10|Ware wa, katsute dāūdo ni onkei o sazuke (te i~tsu)ta. `Yamayama yo, dāūdo to tomoni (ware o) tatae nasai. Mata tori-tachi mo.' Ware wa mata, kare no tame ni tetsu o yawaraka ni shite,
34|11|(itta). `Anata wa kusarikatabira o tsukuri, wa o yoku totonoe nasai. Soshite zenkō ni isoshime. Hontōni ware wa, anata gata no shogyō o yoku mite iru.'
34|12|Mata suraimān ni wa kaze o (shihai sa se),(sono kaze no ichi fukide) itchō ni ichi-kagetsu (no tabiji) o, mata ― yū ni ichi-kagetsu (no kiro) o (tabi sa seta). Mata ware wa kare-ra ni toketa dō no izumi o wakide saseta. Mata omo no o yurushi ni yori aru Jin (kasoke Tadashi) ni, kare no menzen de hatarakase, kare-ra no naka ware no meirei ni somuku mono ni wa, hageshī (homura? ) No chōbatsu o ajiwawa seta.
34|13|Kare-ra wa, kare (suraimān) no tame ni sono nozomu takadono ya chōzō ya ike no yōna suiban, mata kotei shita Ōkama o seisaku shita. (Sorezore no mochiba de) `anata gata wa hatarake, dāūdo no kazoku yo, kansha shite hatarake.'Daga ware no shimo be no naka de kansha suru mono wa wazukadearu.
34|14|Ware ga kare (suraimān) ni shi no dan o kudashita toki mo, kare-ra ni sono shi o shiraseta no wa, ichi-biki no ji no mushi ga kare no tsue o 蝕 Banda kotodeatta. Sore de kare ga taoreru to, Jin-tachi wa (hajimete) satotta. Moshimo yūgen-kai no koto o shitteitanaraba, chijoku no chōbatsu ni fuku shite iru kaname mo nakattanoni.
34|15|Hontōni sabaa demo, sono sumai ni hitotsu no shirushi ga sadzuke rarete ita. Migigawa to hidarigawa no 2tsu no kaju-en. (Soshite kare-ra ni ōse rareta. ) `Anata gata no omo no ataeru shokumotsu o tabe, kare ni kansha seyo. Tochi wa rippade,-nushi wa kandaide ara reru.'
34|16|Daga kare-ra wa (arrā kara) somuki satta. Sorede ware wa, kare-ra ni kōzui o okuri, ka no 2tsu no en o, yanagi to wazuka bakari no hamanatsume no nigai miwomusubu-en ni kaeta.
34|17|Sonoyōni ware wa, kare-ra ga fushinjindeatta tame ni mukuita. Ware ga, fushinjin (onwowasureru)-sha igai ni hōfuku nado shiyou ka.
34|18|Ware wa kare-ra to, ware ga shukufuku shita toshi to no ma ni,(tabibito ga) mitsuke yasui ikutsu ka no machi o mōke, sono ryotei o sadameta. `Hiru mo yoru mo anzen ni tabi o shi nasai.'
34|19|Sorenanoni kare-ra wa itta. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi no ryotei no kankaku o motto tōku shite kudasai.' Kōshite kare-ra mizukara sono mi o go matta. Ware wa kare-ra subete o konagona ni shite chirashi,(-go no hito no) katari kusa to shita. Hontōni kono nakaniha, ken'nin shite kansha suru mono-tachi e no (ware no) shirushi ga aru.
34|20|Iburīsu wa kare-ra ni tsuite, kare no omowaku ga zu ni tō tatsuta. Sokode kare-ra wa ichibu no shinja o nozoki,(subete) kare ni shitagatta.
34|21|Shikashi kare (akuma) wa, kare-ra ni taishite ken'i ga atta wakede wa nakatta. Ware wa, raise o utagatte iru mono to shinjiru mono o shikibetsu shiyou to shita nisuginai. Hontōni anata gata no omo wa subete no koto o mimamotte ora reru.
34|22|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Arrā o sashioite anata gataga (kamidearu to) shuchō shite ita mono-tachi ni inoruga yoi. Son'na kamigami wa, ten ni oite mo ji ni oite mo mijin no chikara mo nai. Mata sono (sōzō) ni atatte wa, nanra yakuwari o motazu, arrā ni shite mo son'na joryoku-sha o hitsuyō to wa shite inai.'
34|23|Kare ga o yurushi ni nara reta mono no soto, gozen de no torinashi wa muekidearu. Yagate kare-ra no kokoro no osore ga kieru to tenshi-tachi wa iu. `Anata gata no omo wa, nanto ōse rareta nodesu ka.' Suru to kare-ra wa (kotaete),`shinrideshita. Kare wa, shikō ni shite shidai no okatadesu.' To iu.
34|24|Itte yaru ga ī. `Tenchi kara anata gata ni fuyō o ataeru no wa darena no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā de ara reru. Yōsuruni watashi-tachi ka, matawa anata gata no dochira ka ga michibiki no ue ni ari, dochira ka ga mayotte iru.'
34|25|Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa, watashi-tachi no okashita tsumi ni tsuite towa rezu, watashi-tachi mo mata, anata gataga okonatta koto ni tsuite towa renai.'
34|26|Itte yaru ga ī. `Omo wa isseini watashi-tachi o mesa re, shinri ni motodzuite watashi-tachi no ma o sabaka reru. Kare wa shin no saiketsu-sha de zenchi ni owashimasu.'
34|27|Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gataga, dōi no mono to shite kare ni, haisuru mono o watashi ni mise nasai (kesshite dekinaidearouga).' Iya, kare koso wa arrā. Iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru.
34|28|Ware wa, zen jinrui e no kippō no dentatsu-sha mata keikoku-sha to shite, anata o noko wa shita. Daga hitobito no ōku wa, sore ga wakaranai.
34|29|Kare-ra wa,`anata no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kono yakusoku (shinpan no hi) wa nanji (yattekuru no)desu ka.' To itte iru.
34|30|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata e no yakusoku no hi wa, anata gataga ikkoku mo torimodosezu mata sakinjiru koto mo dekinai (Ni~Tsudearu).'
34|31|Shinjinai mono wa,`watashi-tachi wa kono kuruān mo shinjinaishi, mata kore izen ni atta Keisuke mo shinjimasen.' To iu. Fugi o okonatta mono ga,-nushi no gozen ni tatasa reru toki no sugata o, anata ni misete yaritai mono. Kare-ra wa tagaini (soto ni tsumi o owa sete) nonoshiri au. Muryokudeatta mono wa bi 慢Deatta mono ni iu. `Anata gataga, inakattara, watashi-tachi wa kitto, shinja ni natte imashita no ni.'
34|32|倣慢Deatta mono wa, muryokudeatta mono ni iu. `Michibiki ga anata gata ni todoita nochi, anata gata o sorera kara somuka seta no wa, watashi-tachideatta to iu no ka, iya, anata gata koso tsumitsukurideatta.'
34|33|Muryokudeatta mono wa gōmandeatta mono ni iu. `Iya, yoru to naku hiru to naku,(anata gata wa) sakubō o shite imashita. Gen'ni arrā o shinjinaishi, kare ni dōisha o tateru yō, anata gata wa (fudan ni) meirei shimashita.' Kare-ra wa chōbatsu o miru ni oyonde, kōkai suru. Ware wa fushinjin'na mono no kubi ni kase o kakeru. Kare-ra wa, sono okonatta koto de, mukui o ukeru dakedearu.
34|34|Ware ga machi ni, keikoku-sha o tsukawasu tabi ni, soko no fuyūna-sha-tachi wa,`anata gataga noko wa sa reta koto o, watashi-tachi wa shinjimasen.' To kimatte itta nodearu.
34|35|`Mata, watashi-tachi wa ōku no zaisan to shijo ga aru node, chōbatsu sa reru (yōna) koto wa arimasen.' Tomo itta.
34|36|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni watashi no omo wa, okokoro no mama ni yutaka ni onmegumi o atae rare, mata toboshiku mo nasa reru. Daga hitobito no ōku wa rikai shinai.'
34|37|Anata gata o ware ni motto chikadzukeru mono wa, zaisan demo shijo demonai. Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa, sono okonai no bai no hōshō o atae, takai sumai ga hoshō sa reru.
34|38|Mata ware no shirushi o tomi zasa seru tame ni doryoku suru mono wa, chōbatsu ni hikitate rareru.
34|39|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni watashi no omo wa, sono shimo be no naka kara o kokoronikanau-sha ni, onmegumi o yutaka ni atae mata aru mono ni wa toboshiku sadzuke rareru. Kare wa anata gataga (omo no michi no tame ni) hodokosu mono wa subete kaesa reru. Kare wa mottomo sugureta mimegumi o ataeru kata de ara reru.'
34|40|Isseini kare-ra o shōshū nasa reru hi. Kare wa tenshi-tachi ni mukatte ōse rareyou. `Korera no mono wa, anata gata o sūhai shite ita no ka.'
34|41|Kare-ra tenshi-tachi wa (kotaete) iu. `Anata ni tatae are. Anata wa watashi-tachi no aigo-sha de ara remasu. Daga kare-ra wa sono kagiride wa arimasen. Kare-ra (hitobito) wa jin o sūhai shite imashita. Ōku no mono wa, kare-ra (Jin) no shinjadeshita.'
34|42|Anata gata wa kono Ni~Tsu, otagai ni eki ni mo gai ni mo yakudatanai. Ware wa fugi o okonatte ita-sha-tachi ni iu. `Anata gataga itsuwari to shite ita, hi goku no chōbatsu o ajiwae.'
34|43|Meihakuna ware no shirushi ga, kare-ra ni dokuju sa rete mo, kare-ra wa iu. `Kore wa hitori no otoko ga, anata gata no sosen no sūhai shite ita kamigami kara somuka seyou to suru nodearu.' Mata iu. `Kore wa tada netsuzō shita,-tsukuri-gotodearu.' Mata shinri o shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, sore ga kare-ra ni arawareru to,`kore wa akiraka ni majutsu nisuginai.' To iu.
34|44|Ware wa (maemotte), kare-ra no manabi eru keiten o kudashite ita wakede wanai. Mata anata izen ni, don'na keikoku-sha mo kare-ra ni tsukawasanakatta.
34|45|Kare-ra izen no mono mo (Mari) o usodearu to shita. Ware ga mukashi no hitobito ni ataeta mono wa (makka no hitobito ni totte wa) jūbun'noichi ni mo tasshinai hodo (yūgū) shita no ni, ware no yogen-sha o usotsuki yobawari shita. Waga ikari wa nanto hageshikatta koto ka.
34|46|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa chūkoku suru. Anata gata wa arrā no gozen ni, 2-ri zutsu matawa 1-ri zutsu tatte yoku kangae nasai. Anata gata no dōryō wa, kichigaide wanai. Kare wa kibishī chōbatsu no (kudaru) izen ni, anata gata ni keikoku suru nisuginai.'
34|47|Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa, don'na hōshū mo anata gata ni yōkyū shinai. Sore wa (subete) anata gata no monodearu. Watashi wa hōshū o, tada arrā kara (itadaku) dakedearu. Kare wa subete no koto o risshō sa reru.'
34|48|Itte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni watashi no omo wa,(shimo be ni) shinri o nagekake rare, mi enai mono o shiri tsukusa reru.'
34|49|Itte yaru ga ī. `Shinri (isurāmu) wa kudari, itsuwari (jashin) wa nanra sonogo sōzō suru koto mo naku mata futatabi kurikaesu koto mo nai.'
34|50|Itte yaru ga ī. `Tatoe watashi ga mayotte mo, tada watashi jishin (o sokonau) dakedearu. Mata, moshi michibika rete irunaraba, soreha-nushi ga watashi ni keiji sa reta okagedearu. Hontōni kare wa zen Akira ni shite shikin ni owasu kata de ara reru.'
34|51|Kare-ra (fushin-sha) ga kyōfu ni furueru sugata o, anata ni misetai mono, kare-ra wa nogareru michi mo naku, chikai tokoro kara torae rareru.
34|52|Sonotoki kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa sore o shinjimasu.' To iu. (Son'na) enpō karade wa, dōshite (shinkō ga) e rareyou ka.
34|53|Izen ni mo kare-ra wa shinjiyou to wa shinaide, enpō kara yūgen-kai no koto ni tsuite suisoku suru bakarideattade wanai ka.
34|54|Izen, kare-ra no dōrui ni taishite nasa reta yō ni, sono netsubō suru mono (shinkō) to kare-ra to no ma ni, shōheki ga oka reyou. Hontōni kare-ra wa, jasui fukai utagai no naka ni iru nodearu.
35|1|Arrā ni tatae are. Ten to ji no sōzō-sha de arare, 2 tai, 3 tai matawa 4 tai no tsubasa o motsu tenshi-tachi o, shito to shite mikotoinochi nasa reru. Kare wa okokoro no mama kazu o mashite sōzō sa reru. Hontōni arrā wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru.
35|2|Arrā ga ningen ni ataerareru don'na jihi mo, habama reru koto wanai. Mata kare ga habamu nanigoto mo, sore o tokihanasu mono wanai. Hontōni kare wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru.
35|3|Hitobito yo, anata gata ni taisuru arrā no onkei o nen e. Ten to ji kara anata gata ni fuyō o ataerareru sōzō-sha ga, arrā o oite soto ni aru no ka. Kare no soto ni wa kami wa nai nodearu. Soredemo anata gata wa dōshite (shinri kara) mayou no ka.
35|4|Kare-ra wa anata o uso-tsuki yobawari suruga, anata izen no shito-tachi mo kyogen-sha to yoba reta. Hontōni subete no koto wa, arrā ni kisa reru nodearu.
35|5|Hitobito yo, arrā no yakusoku wa shinjitsudearu. Dakara, gense no seikatsu ni azamuka rete wa naranai. Mata arrā ni kanshi, damashi jōzu ni azamuka rete wa naranai.
35|6|Hontōni shaitān wa anata gata no tekidearu. Dakara teki to shite atsukae. Kare wa, tada moesakaru hi goku no nakama to suru tame ni jibun no teshita o maneku dakedearu.
35|7|Shinkō no nai mono wa, kibishī chōbatsu ni au. Daga shinkō shite zenkō ni dō shimu mono ni wa, kan'yō to idaina hōshō ga arou.
35|8|Jibun no akugyō o rippadearu to shi, sore o zenji to miru mono (hodo mayotta mono) ga arou ka. Hontōni arrā wa, o nozomi no mono o mayowa se, mata o nozomi no mono o michibika reru.Dakara kare-ra no tame ni nageite, anata no mi o sokonatte wa naranai. Arrā wa kare-ra no nasu koto o shiri tsukusa reru.
35|9|Hontōni arrā koso wa,-fū o okura reru katadearu. Sore wa kumo o okoshi, sore o shinda tochi ni yari, shinihateta daichi o yomigaera sa reru. Fukkatsu mo mata ko no yōdearu.
35|10|Daredemo eiyo kensei o negaunaraba, issai no eiyo kensei wa, arrā no omoto ni aru (koto o shire). (Issai no) yoi kotoba wa, kare no moto ni nobotte iki, tadashī okonai wa sore o takameru. Mata akuji o 企-Ra mu-sha ni wa, kibishī chōbatsu ga ari, sorera no 企-Ra mi wa, mukō ni narudearou.
35|11|Arrā wa, tsuchi kara anata gata o tsukuri, sarani 一精滴 Kara tsukuri, tsuide anata gata o hitokumi (no danjo) ni nasa reta. Kare ga shirazu ni, yadoshi mata bunben suru on'na wanai. Chōmeina mono mo, tanmeina mono mo, shosatsu no naka ni nose rarenai mono wanai. Hontōni sore wa, arrā ni oite wa yōina kotodearu.
35|12|Tsu no umi wa onajide wanai. (1Tsu wa) amaku, kawaki o iyashi, nonde kai yoi. Shikashi,(-gai wa) shiokarakute nigai. Shikashi, sono dore kara mo, shinsen'na niku o totte tabe, mata anata gataga mi ni tsukeru, shuju no sōshoku-hin mo saishu suru. Mata anata gata wa, sono naka o fune ga (mizu o) kitte susumu no o miyou. Sore wa anata gata ni, kare no onkei o motome saseru tamedearu. Kanarazu anata gata wa kansha surudearou.
35|13|Kare wa yoru o hiru ni botsunyū sa se, mata hiru o yoru ni botsunyū sa se,(chūya no kōtai), taiyō to tsuki o shitagae rare, sorezore shūki o motte sadame rareta kikan (fukkatsu no hi) made (sono kidō o) unkō sa shimeru. Ko no yōna koto ga (dekiru no wa) anata gata no shu, arrā de arare, taiken wa kare ni zokusuru. Daga kare-ra ga, kare o oite inoru mono-tachi wa, kitomīru (Sae) dō suru koto mo dekinai.
35|14|Anata gata ga kare-ra ni inotte mo, anata gata no inori o kikazu, kiita to shite mo anata gata ni kotaeha shinai. Shinpan no hi ni kare-ra wa anata gataga (kare-ra o omoni) hai shita koto sae hinin shiyou. Zenchina okata no yō ni,(shinjitsu o) anata ni shirase eru mono wa nai nodearu.
35|15|Hitobito yo, anata gata wa arrā ni motomeru igai-jutsu no nai monodearu. Arrā koso wa, fuyū ni shite sanbi subeki katadearu.
35|16|Moshi kare ga o nozominaraba, anata gata o dokete, atarashī sōzō-mono o (wan? ) Sa reru.
35|17|Kore wa, arrā ni oite mottomo yasashī kotodearu.
35|18|Ni o ou mono wa, tanin no ni o ou koto wa dekinai. Moshi ni o owasa reru mono ga, sono ni no tame tanin o yon demo, kinshin-shade sura, sono ichibu sae ou koto wa dekinai. Anata ga keikoku dekiru no wa, menimienai kare-ra no omo o osore, reihai no tsutome o mamoru mono dakedearu. Sono miwokiyomeru-sha wa, tada jibun no tamashī no tame ni kiyomeru. (Subete no mono wa) arrā no moto ni kaeri yuku nodearu.
35|19|Mōjin to seijō no me no hito to wa, onajide wanai.
35|20|Ankoku to kōmyō mo,
35|21|mata (suzushī) kage to,(taiyō no) shakunetsu mo,
35|22|mata seitoshi mo, onajide wanai. Hontōni arrā wa, o konomi ni nara reta mono ni o kikase ni naru. Daga anata wa,(shinde) haka no naka ni iru mono ni kika seru koto wa dekinai.
35|23|Anata wa hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai.
35|24|Hontōni ware wa, kippō no dentatsu-sha to shite, mata keikoku-sha to shite, shinri o mota sete anata o tsukawashita. (Mata kore made mo) dono min ni mo kare-ra no ma ni, hitori no keikoku-sha ga ikanakatta mono wanai.
35|25|Kare-ra wa anata o kyohi suruga, kare-ra izen no mono-tachi mo yahari kobande kita. Shito-tachi wa, meishō (kiseki) to shokan to kagayakashī keiten o tazusaete kare-ra ni kita.
35|26|Sorede ware wa, korera fushinjin no mono o basshita. Waga ikari no nanto hageshikatta koto yo.
35|27|Anata gata wa minai no ka. Arrā wa ten kara ame o furase rareru. Sorede ware wa, irotoridori no kudamono o minora seru. Mata yamayama ni wa, shiro ya aka no shima ga ari, sono soto ōku no iroai o mochi, makkuroi tokoro mo aru.
35|28|Mata ningen mo chōjū kachiku mo, i irotoridoridearu. Arrā no shimo be no naka de chishiki no aru mono dake ga kare o osoreru. Hontōni arrā wa iryoku narabinaku kan'yōde ara reru.
35|29|Hontōni arrā no keiten o dokuju suru mono, reihai no tsutome o mamori, ware ga sazuketa mono kara mitsu ni, mata arawa ni hodokosu mono wa, shippai no nai shōbai o negatte iru yōna mono.
35|30|Kare wa, jūbun ni kare-ra ni hōshō o harawa re, onmegumi o yobun ni atae rareru. Hontōni kare wa, tabitabi yurusa reru okata,(hōshi ni) jūbun kansha sa reru kata de ara reru.
35|31|Ware ga anata ni keiji shita Keisuke wa shinrideatte, sore izen no mono o kakushō suru monodearu. Hontōni arrā wa, kare no shimo be-tachi ni tsuite jukuchi shi, kare-ra o kanshi nasa reru.
35|32|Sonogo, ware wa shimo be no naka kara eranda mono ni, kono Keisuke o tsuga seta. Daga kare-ra no nakaniha, mizukara tamashī o ayamatta mono mo, chūkan no michi o toru mono mo atta. Mata kare-ra no naka no aru mono wa, arrā no o yurushi no moto ni, sossen shite shuju no zenkō ni isoshimu mono mo atta. Sore wa idaina onmegumidearu.
35|33|Kare-ra wa eien no rakuen ni nyūrō. Sono Chū de kare-ra wa, kogane no ude wa to shinju de mi o kazari, sono ishō wa kinudearu.
35|34|Kare-ra wa iu. `Arrā o tataemasu. Watashi-tachi kara (subete) no kunō o torinozoite kudasa reta okata. Watashi-tachi no omo wa, tabitabi yurusa reru okata,(hōshi o) jūbun ni mitome rareru okatadesu.
35|35|Kare no onmegumi ni yotte, watashi-tachi wa eien no teitaku ni sumi, sokode kurō o suru koto mo naku, mata tsukare o oboeru koto mo arimasen.'
35|36|Shikashi shinjinai mono ni taishite wa, jigoku no hi ga arou. Kare-ra ni wa (soko ni iru kikan mo) senkoku sa rezu, shinu koto mo dekizu, mata chōbatsu mo keigen sa renai nodearu. Ware wa, subete no onwowasureru-sha ni ko no yō ni mukuiru.
35|37|Kare-ra wa sono naka ni atte sakebudearou. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi o dashite kudasai. Kitto yoi okonai o shimasu. (Kore made) shite ita yōna koto wa, itashimasen.'(Kare wa ōse rareyou. ) `Ware wa, anata gata o jūbun ni chōmei sa setade wanai ka. Sonoaida ni daredemo kunkai o ukeireru mono wa, imashime o ukeireta hazu. Shikamo keikoku-sha sae anata gata ni tsukawasa rete ita. Dakara (chōbatsu o) ajiwae. Warui okonai no mono ni wa kyūjo-sha wa nai nodearu.'
35|38|Hontōni arrā wa, ten to ji no yūgen-kai o shitte ora reru. Kare wa,(ningen ga) mune no naka ni daku koto o jukuchi shite ora reru.
35|39|Kare koso wa, anata gata o chijō no keishō-sha to sa reta katadearu. Dare ni shite mo shinjinai mono wa, sono fushinjin de jibun jishin o son'u. Kare-ra no fushinjin wa,-nushi no nikushimi o masu bakarideari, mata kare-ra no fushinjin wa, jibun no sonshitsu o masu bakaridearu.
35|40|Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gataga arrā no soto ni inoru, anata gata ga haisuru (kamigami) ni tsuite kangaeta koto ga aru no ka. Chijō ni kare-ra no sōzō shita mono ga aru no ka. Soretomo kare-ra no tame ni ten kara no kyōryoku-sha ga aru no ka. Ware ni shimeshi nasai. Soretomo sono yō na (arrā ni dōisha ga iru to iu koto) shōko o shimesu keiten o ware ga kare-ra ni ataeta to demo iu no ka. Iya, warui okonai no mono-tachi wa, tada giman ni yotte tagaini yakusoku shi atte irunoni suginai.
35|41|Hontōni arrā wa, ten to ji no unkō ga hazurenai yō sasae rareru. Moshi sorera ryōsha ga, hazureru koto ga arunaraba, kare o oite nanimono mo kore o sasae eru mono wanai. Hontōni kare wa, gamandzuyoi kata, nankai mo yurusa reru kata de ara reru.
35|42|Kare-ra wa arrā (no gyomei) ni kakete, genshukuna chikai o tate, moshi keikoku-sha ga jibun-tachi no tokoro ni kurunaraba, don'na min yori mo rippa ni michibika rerudearou (to itte ita). Daga keikoku-sha ga kare-ra ni kuru ni oyonde, kare-ra wa masumasu (tadashī shinkō kara) tōzakaru bakarideari,
35|43|chijō de kōman ni furumai, akuji no sakubō bakari o shite ita. Daga akuji no sakubō wa, sono tōnin ni furi kakaru dakedearu.Dakara kare-ra wa mukashi no hitobito no (metsubō shita) kankō o matsu soto wanaidearou. Sorede anata wa, arrā no kankō ni wa daitai ga nai koto ga wakarudearou. Mata henkō mo kesshite nai koto mo wakarudearou.
35|44|Kare-ra wa chijō o tabi shite, kare-ra izen no mono-tachi no matsuro ga dō natta ka o kansatsu shinakatta no ka. Kare-ra (mukashi no mono) wa, kare-ra yori mo chikara ga sugurete ita. Ten ni ari-chi ni aru nanimono mo, arrā o kujiku koto wa dekinai nodearu. Hontōni kare wa zenchi ni shite zen'nō de ara reru.
35|45|Moshi arrā ga, ningen o sono shogyō ni yotte bassa rerunaraba, chijō ni, hitori no seizon-sha mo nokosa renakattadearou. Daga kare wa kigen o sadamete, kare-ra o yūyo nasa reta. Daga, kare-ra no kigen ga tōrai sureba, hontōni arrā wa shimo be-tachi no kanshi-sha de ara reru.
36|1|Yā su~īn.
36|2|Eichi ni michita, kuruān ni yotte chikau.
36|3|Hontōni anata wa, shito no hitori de,
36|4|tadashī michi no ue ni (hitobito o michibiku monodearu).
36|5|(Koreha) iryoku narabinaku jihibukaki okata no keiji de,
36|6|sosen ga imada keikoku o ukezu, sore de kidzukanaide iru min ni, anata ga keikoku suru tame no monodearu.
36|7|Hontōni sono o kotoba ga, kare-ra no ōku no mono ni kudatte shimatte iru nodaga, kare-ra wa shinjinai.
36|8|Ware wa kare-ra ni kubikase o hame, sore ga ago ni made oyobu. Sore de kare-ra no atama wa uwamuki ni natta.
36|9|Mata ware wa, kare-ra no zenmen ni jin kabe o oki, mata haimen ni mo shōheki o oki, sonoue kare-ra ni ōi o shita. Sore de kare-ra wa miru koto mo dekinai.
36|10|Anata ga keikoku shite mo mata keikoku shinakute mo, kare-ra ni totte onajide, kare-ra wa shinjinai.
36|11|Anata wa, kunkai ni shitagau mono, mata menimienai jihibukaki okata o osoreru mono dake ni, keikoku shi nasai. Sorede anata wa korera no mono ni, kan'yō to idaina hōshō no kippō o tsutae nasai.
36|12|Hontōni ware wa shisha o yomigaera se, mata kare-ra ga arakajime itta koto, soshite ato ni nokoshita ashiato o kiroku suru. Ware wa issai o, meiryōna kiroku-bo no naka ni kazoeagete iru.
36|13|Machi no nakama (no monogatari) o, rei to shite kare-ra ni shimesuga yoi. Shito-tachi ga soko ni yattekita toki no koto o.
36|14|Hajime ware wa, 2-ri no shito o noko wa shitaga, kare-ra wa, 2-ri tomo uso-tsuki atsukai o sa reta. Sorede ware wa dai 3 no mono de kyōka shita. Soshite shito-tachi wa itta. `Hontōni watashi-tachi wa, anata gata no moto ni tsukawasa reta monodesu.'
36|15|Suru to kare-ra wa itta. `Anata gata wa watashi-tachi to onaji ningen ni sugimasen. Jihibukaki okata wa nani mo keiji o kudasare wa shimasen. Anata gata wa, uso o tsuite iru dakedesu.'
36|16|Kare-ra (shito) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi ga, jissai anata gata ni tsukawasa reta monodearu koto wa,-nushi ga gozonjidesu.
36|17|Watashi-tachi no tsutome wa, tada anata gata ni meihaku (na arrā no o meirei) o nobetsutaeru dakedesu.'
36|18|Kare-ra (hitobito) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi ni totte anata gata wa tashikana kyōchōdesu. Moshi tomenainaraba, anata gata o kanarazu ishi-uchi (no kei) ni shimashou. Hidoi me ni awasete yarimasu zo.'
36|19|Kare-ra (shito) wa itta. `Anata gata koso kyōchōdesu. Anata gata wa kunkai sa rete mo (nao sō iu no)desu ka. Iya, anata gata wa muhō no mindesu.'
36|20|Sonotoki-chō no hazure kara hitori no otoko ga hashitte kite, itta. `Minasan,(arrā kara) tsukawasa reta kono hito-tachi ni shitagai nasai.
36|21|Anata gata ni nani no hōshū mo motomenai kata-tachi ni shitagai nasai. Kare-ra wa (tadashiku) michibiki o ete iru.
36|22|Watashi o tsukura reta kata ni tsukaenai nado, dōshite dekiyou ka. Anata gata mo kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodesu.
36|23|Sono yōna okata o sashioite,-gai no kamigami o motome raremashou ka. Moshi jihibukaki okata ga watashi ni wazawai o kudasou to nozoma rerunaraba, kare-ra (jashin) no torinashi wa sukoshi mo yakudatazu, mata watashi o sukuu koto mo dekimasen.
36|24|(Sō naru to shitara) akiraka ni watashi wa ayamari o okashita koto ni narimasu.
36|25|Watashi wa, anata gata no (shin no) omo o shinjimasu. Dakara (hitobito yo,) watashi (no iu koto) o kiki nasai.'
36|26|Sonotoki kare wa,`anata wa rakuen ni ire.' To ōse rareta. Soshite kare wa `waga omo no o yurushi ga atae rare, eiyo aru mono no naka ni,
36|27|kuwae rareta koto o nyū bito ni shitte moraetara.' To itta.
36|28|Kare no ato, ware wa sono min ni taishi ten kara gunzei o tsukawashi wa shinakatta. Mata-sō suru made mo nakatta.
36|29|Tada hitokoe sakebu dake de, kare-ra wa kieusete shimatta.
36|30|Ā, awarena shimo be-tachi yo. Kare-ra wa shito ga kuru tabi, chōshō shite kakatta.
36|31|Kare-ra wa kidzukanai no ka, jibun-tachi izen ni iku sedai no mono o ware ga horoboshi, kare-ra wa 2-do to kaeranai to iu koto o.
36|32|Sorezore mina wa,(shinpan no hi) isseini ware no mae ni mesa reyou.
36|33|Kare-ra e no shirushi no 1tsu to shite wa, ware ga shinda daichi o yomigaera se, kokumotsu o sore kara seisan shi, sore o kare-ra ga taberu koto ga age rareru.
36|34|Mata ware wa, soko ni natsumeyashi ya budō no en o mōke, sonoaida ni izumi o waki dasa seru.
36|35|Kare-ra wa sono kajitsu o taberuga, soreha kare-ra no te ga tsukuridashita monode wanai. Soredemo kansha shinai no ka.
36|36|Kare no eikō o tataeru. Kare wa daichi ni haeru mono, kare-ra jishin mo, mata kare-ra no shiranai mono mo, subete shiyū ni tsukura reta katadearu.
36|37|Mata kare-ra e no shirushi ni wa, yoru ga aru. Ware ga sore kara hiru o doka seru to, miyo, makkura ni naru.
36|38|Mata taiyō wa, kisokutadashiku unkō suru. Kore mo zen'nō zenchina okata no setsuridearu.
36|39|Mata tsuki ni wa, tengū o furiwaketa. (Sore o kayotte) natsumeyashi no oita yōhei no yō ni (hosoku natte) modotte kuru.
36|40|Taiyō ga tsuki ni oitsuku koto wa narazu, yoru wa hiru to saki o arasou koto wa dekinai. Sorera wa, sorezore no kidō o oyogu.
36|41|Mata mansai shita fune ni, ware ga kare-ra no shison o hakonda koto mo shirushi no 1tsudearu.
36|42|Mata ware wa kare-ra ga noru,(-gai no benrina) norimono o tsukutta.
36|43|Ware ga hossurunaraba, kare-ra o obore saseru koto ga dekiru. Sō nareba, kare-ra o tasukeru mono wa naku, sukuwa re wa shinai.
36|44|Tada ware no jihi ni yotte tsukanoma o kyōraku suru dakedearu.
36|45|Kare-ra ni mukatte,`anata gata no mae ni aru mono, mata ushiro ni aru mono o osore nasai. Sō sureba anata gata wa, kanarazu jihi ni azukarerudearou.' To iwa rete mo (mimiwokasudokoroka),
36|46|-nushi kara no shuju no shirushi ga shimesa rete mo, sukkari, se o mukete shimau.
36|47|Mata,`arrā ga anata gata ni sadzuke rareta mono o, hodokose.' To iwa reru to, fushinjin'na mono wa shinkō suru mono ni iu. `Arrā ga o nozominara,(o jibun de) yashinawa reru to iu mono o, dōshite watashi-tachi ga yashinau koto ga arimashou ka. Anata gata wa, akiraka ni omoichigai o shite iru dakedesu.'
36|48|Mata, kare-ra wa iu. `Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, nanji kono (shinpan) no yakusoku (ga hatasa reru no)desu ka.'
36|49|Daga kare-ra ga ronsō shite iru ma ni, hitokoe no sakebi ga (totsuzen) kare-ra o osou dakede wanai ka.
36|50|Sonotoki kare-ra wa, yuigon suru koto mo, mata kazoku no tokoro ni kaeru koto mo dekinai.
36|51|Soshite rappa ga fuka reru to, kare-ra wa hakaba kara (dete),-nushi no omoto ni isoideiku.
36|52|Kare-ra wa iu. `Ā , nasakenai. Watashi-tachi o fushido kara yobiokoshita no wa daredeshou ka. Kore wa, jihibukaki okata ga yakusoku nasa reta tōride wa arimasen ka. Shito-tachi no kotoba wa shinjitsudeatta nodesu ka.'
36|53|Tada hitokoe narihibikeba, isseini kare-ra wa ware no mae ni meshi atsume rareru.
36|54|Sonohi ni wa dare mo, sukoshi mo futōna atsukai o ukezu, anata gata wa, tada jibun no okonatta koto ni taishi mukui rareru.
36|55|Hontōni rakuen no nakama-tachi wa, kono Ni~Tsu, yorokobi ni 忙 Ga shī.
36|56|Kare-ra wa sono haigūsha-tachi to, kokage no nedoko ni yorikakaru.
36|57|Soko de kare-ra wa, kajitsu ya nozomi no mono o nandemo e rareru.
36|58|Jihibukaki nushi kara `heian'are.' To no o kotoba mo aru.
36|59|Anata gata tsumibito-tachi yo, kyō wa hanarete hikae nasai.
36|60|Ādamu no shison yo, akuma ni tsukaete wa naranai to, ware wa anata gata ni meirei shinakatta ka. Kare wa anata gata no kōzen no tekidearu.
36|61|Anata gata wa ware ni tsukae nasai. Sore koso tadashī michidearu.
36|62|Tashika ni kare (akuma) wa anata gata no daibubun o mayowa seta. Dōshite anata gata wa satoranakatta no ka.
36|63|Kore wa anata gata ni yakusoku sa rete ita, jigokudearu.
36|64|Anata gata wa fushinjindeatta tame ni, kyō soko ni hairu nodearu.
36|65|Sonohi ware wa, kare-ra no kuchiwofūjiru. Suruto sono-te ga ware ni katari, kare-ra no ashi wa, sono okonatta koto o risshō suru.
36|66|Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra no ryōme o mekura ni suru koto ga dekiru. Kare-ra wa (tengoku e no) michi o sakinjiyou to suruga, dōshite mitōsu koto ga dekiyou ka.
36|67|Ware ga nozomeba, kare-ra o sono basho de katachi o kaeru koto mo dekiru. Sō nareba kare-ra wa, iku koto mo kaeru koto mo dekinai.
36|68|Daredemo chōju sa seru sai ni wa, ware wa sōzō o gyaku ni modora seyou. Kare-ra wa, soredemo satoranai no ka.
36|69|Ware wa kare (muhanmado) ni uta o oshienakatta. Sore wa kare ni fusawashikunai. Kore wa (arrā no) kunkai magō kata nai kuruāndeari,
36|70|ikeru mono ni keikoku o atae, mata fushinjin'na mono ni taishite wa wa o kotoba ga kudasa reru.
36|71|Ware ga tezukara kare-ra no tame ni tsukutta kachiku o kare-ra ni shoyū sa sete iru no o minai no ka.
36|72|Ware wa, sore o kare-ra (no yō) ni fukusa seta. Sorede, kare-ra wa kore ni nori, soshite taberu.
36|73|Mata kare-ra wa (sono soto ni mo) iroiro sore o riyō shi, mata nomimono o eru. Soredemo kare-ra wa kansha shinai no ka.
36|74|Kare-ra wa, arrā no soto ni jashin o erabi nantoka tasuke rareyou to suru.
36|75|Sorera (jashin-tachi) wa, kare-ra o tasukeru chikara wa naku, mushiro kare-ra no kata ga jashin o mamoru tame gunbi o totonoete iru shimatsu.
36|76|Anata wa kare-ra no iu koto de, kanashinde wa naranai. Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra no kakusu koto mo gen wasu koto mo shitte iru.
36|77|Ningen wa kangaenai no ka. Ware wa 一精滴 Kara kare o tsukuttade wanai ka. Sorenanoni miyo, kare wa kōzen to ha mukatte iru.
36|78|Mata kare wa, ware ni nazoraeru mono o hikiai ni dashite, jibun no sōzō o wasure, iu. `Dare ga, kuchihateta hone o ikikaera semashou ka.'
36|79|Itte yaru ga ī. `Saisho ni o tsukuri ni natta kata ga, kare-ra o ikikaera seru. Kare wa subete no hi zōbutsu o shiri tsukushite ora reru.
36|80|Midori no ki kara, anata gata no tame ni hi o tsukura reta no mo karedeari, dakarakoso anata gata wa sore ni yotte moyasu.'
36|81|Ten to ji o sōzō nasa reta kare ga, kore ni ruisuru mono o tsukuri enaidearou ka. Iya, kare wa saikō no sōzō-shadeari, zenchi de ara reru.
36|82|Nanika o nozoma reru to, kare ga `are.' To o meiji ni nareba, sunawachi aru.
36|83|Kare ni koso subete no shō san'are. Sono o te de ban'yū o tōgyo nasa reru okata, anata gata wa kare no omoto ni kisa reru nodearu.
37|1|Seizento retsu o nasu-sha-tachi ni oi te.
37|2|Karitate ou mono ni oi te.
37|3|Mata kunkai (no guruān) o yomi kika seru mono ni oite, chikau.
37|4|Hontōni anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no omodearu.
37|5|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono no shu, mata hinode o tsukasa doru omodearu.
37|6|Hontōni ware wa, shinshin de kasō no ten o kazari,
37|7|(arrā no meirei ni) sakarau akuma ni taisuru mori to shita.
37|8|Kare-ra wa happō kara uta re, saikō no kaigi o nusumi kiku koto wa dekinai.
37|9|Gekitai sa rete, kare-ra wa towa no chōbatsu o ukeru.
37|10|Tōchō shi eta mono ga atte mo, hakunetsu no honō ga tsuiseki suru.
37|11|Kare-ra (makka no tashinkyō to) ni toe. `Kare-ra to ware no tsukutta mono (tenshi) no dochira ga tsuyoku tsukura rete iru ka.' Ware wa motomoto, nebari no aru doro de kare-ra o tsukutta nodearu.
37|12|Anata wa kantan shite iru to iu no ni, kare-ra wa chōshō suru.
37|13|Keikoku sa rete mo, kare-ra wa keikoku o ukeirenai.
37|14|Mata kare-ra wa, shirushi o mite mo chōshō suru bakari.
37|15|Soshite kare-ra wa iu. `Kore wa akiraka ni majutsu ni chigai arimasen.
37|16|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara,(mata) yobiokosa re ma shiyou ka.
37|17|Tōi sosen-tachi mo (issho nidesu ka) to iu.
37|18|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Sonotōri. Anata gata wa iyashime rareru nodearu.'
37|19|Sore wa tada hitokoe no sakebidearu. Sonotoki kare-ra wa (osoroshī kōkei o) manoatari ni mite,
37|20|`ā nasakenai, kore ga shinpan no hidesu ka.' To iu.
37|21|`Kore wa anata gata ga shinjinakatta kubun no hidearu.
37|22|Fugi o okonatte ita-sha-tachi, sono tsuma-tachi, mata kare-ra ga arrā o sashioite hai shite ita mono-tachi o atsume nasai.
37|23|Kare-ra o hi goku e no michi ni tsurete ike.
37|24|Iya, kare-ra o mata sete oke. Kare-ra ni tazuneru koto ga aru.
37|25|Anata gata ga tasukeawanai no wa dō shita koto ka.'
37|26|Iya, kyō bakari wa, kare-ra mo (shinpan ni) fuku suru.
37|27|Kare-ra wa tagaini chikadzuki tazune au.
37|28|Ippō wa iu. `Hontōni anata gata wa, migi kara kimashita.'
37|29|Suruto tahō wa iu. `Iya, anata gata wa,(motomoto) shinjade wa arimasendeshita.
37|30|Mata, watashi-tachi wa anata gata ni oshitsukeru ken'i mo arimasendeshita. Soreni anata gata wa hangyaku no todeshita.
37|31|Sore de omo no o kotoba ga, watashi-tachi ni jisshō sa reta ima, watashi-tachi wa,(chōbatsu o) ajiwawaneba naranai.
37|32|Watashi-tachi wa anata gata o mayowa setaga, watashi-tachi jishin mo mayotte ita nodesu.'
37|33|Kōshite sonohi, kare-ra wa,(subete) tomoni chōbatsu o ukeru.
37|34|Hontōni ware wa kono yō ni tsumi o okashita mono o jobunsuru.
37|35|Kare-ra wa,`arrā no soto ni kami wa arimasen.' To tsuge rareru to, itsumo kōman ni natta.
37|36|Soshite,`kichigai shijin no tame ni, watashi-tachi no kamigami o sutete naru monodesu ka.' To itte ita.
37|37|Iya, kare wa shinri o (o ? ) Shite,(kare izen no) yogen-sha-tachi (no Keisuke) o kakushō suru monodearu.

37|39|Dōse mina anata gataga okonatta koto no mukuidearu.

37|42|(yorokobashī) kajitsu, soshite eiyo ga (sadzuke rare),

37|53|Watashi-tachi ga shinde tsuchi to hone ni natte kara, hontōni shinpan sa reru nodeshou ka.”'

37|96|Hontōni arrā wa, anata gata o tsukuri, mata anata gataga, tsukuru mono o mo (tsukura reru).'
37|97|Hitobito wa itta. `Kare (iburāhīmu) no tame ni ro o kizuki, moesakaru hi no naka ni nagekomi nasai.'
37|98|Kono yō ni kare ni sakubō o meguraseyou to shitaga, ware wa kare-ra o sanzan'na me ni awa seta.
37|99|Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa omo no omoto ni ikou. Kanarazu watashi o michibika rerudearou.
37|100|Omo yo, tadashī jinbutsu ni naru yōna (musuko) o, watashi ni o sazuke kudasai.'
37|101|Sorede ware wa, yasashī omoiyari no aru danji o (sazukeru to iu) mukashi-hō o tsutaeta.
37|102|(Kono-ko ga) kare to tomoni hataraku toshigoro ni natta toki, kare wa itta. `Musuko yo, watashi wa anata o gisei ni sasageru yume o mimashita. Sā, anata wa dō kangaeru nodesu ka.' Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Chichiyo, anata ga meiji rareta yō ni shite kudasai. Moshi arrā ga o nozominaraba, watashi ga taeshinobu koto ga o wakarideshou.'
37|103|Sokode kare-ra ryōnin wa (meirei ni) fuku shite, kare (kodomo) ga gaku o (ji ni tsuke) utsubuse ni natta toki,
37|104|ware wa tsugeta. `Iburāhīmu yo.

37|106|Kore wa akiraka ni kokoromideatta.'

37|109|`Iburāhīmu ni heian'are.'(To itte).
37|110|Kono yō ni ware wa, tadashī okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|111|Hontōni kare wa, waga shinjinbukai shimo bedeatta.
37|112|Mata ware wa tadashī jinbutsu, yogen-sha isuhāku no (tanjō no) kippō o kare ni tsutaeta.
37|113|Soshite ware wa, kare to isuhāku o shukufuku shita. Daga kare-ra no shison no nakaniha tadashī okonai o suru mono mo ari, mata akiraka ni mizukara o sokonau mono mo atta.
37|114|Ware wa, mūsā to hārūn ni onkei o hodokoshita.
37|115|Mata kare-ra ryōnin, soshite sono min o ōkina sainan kara sukuidashi,
37|116|ware ga tasuketa tame ni kare-ra wa (sono kon'nan o) kokufuku suru koto ga dekita.
37|117|Nao ware wa, ryōnin ni (jiri o) meiryō ni sa seru keiten o sazuke,
37|118|kare-ra o tadashī michi ni michibiita.
37|119|Ware wa ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare-ra no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa.
37|120|`Mūsā to hārūn ni heian'are.'(To itte).
37|121|Kono yō ni ware wa, tadashī okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|122|Hontōni kare-ra ryōnin wa shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta.
37|123|Hontōni iruyāsu mo, shitodeatta.
37|124|Kare ga sono min ni kō itta toki o omoe. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
37|125|Anata gata wa bāru ni inotte, saikō no sōzōnushi (arrā) o misuteru nodesu ka.
37|126|Arrā koso anata gata no shu, mukashi no fuso-tachi no omode wa nai nodesu ka.'
37|127|Daga kare-ra wa kare (iruyāsu) o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Dakara kanarazu (shobatsu ni) nozomudearou.
37|128|(Kare-ra no naka) keiken'na, arrā no shimo be wa betsudearu.
37|129|Ware wa ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa.
37|130|`Iruyāsu ni heian'are.'(To itte).
37|131|Kono yō ni ware wa, tadashī okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|132|Hontōni kare wa shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta.
37|133|Rūto mo (ware ga) tsukawashita monodeatta.
37|134|Miyo, ware wa kare to sono kazoku no subete o sukutta.
37|135|Ato ni nokoru mono no naka ni ita, rōba no soto wa.
37|136|Sōshite ware wa,-gai no mono o horoboshite shimatta.
37|137|Anata gata wa kare-ra no (iseki no) katawara o, hiru
37|138|yoru kayotte iru. Anata gata wa sore demo satoranai no ka.
37|139|Hontōni yūnusu mo, shitodeatta.
37|140|Kare ga (ni o) mansai shita fune ni (notte) nogareta toki,
37|141|kare wa kuji o hiite, makete shimatta.
37|142|(Soshite umi ni nagekoma reruto) taigyo ni marunomi ni sa re, kare wa jiseki no nen ni kara reta.
37|143|Kare ga (Ume Satoru shite omo o) tataenakattanaraba,
37|144|kare-ra (hitobito) ga (fukkatsu shite) okosa reru hi made, kanarazu kare wa sakana no haranouchi ni tomattadearou
37|145|daga ware wa, arehateta (kishibe) ni kare o uchiageta. Kare wa yande ita.
37|146|Ware wa kare no ue ni, 1-pon no Hisago ki o shigera se (kage o tsukutta).
37|147|Soshite 10 man-ri, matawa sore ijō (no min) ni kare o tsukawashita.
37|148|Kare-ra ga shinkō ni haittanode, ware wa shibashi gense no kyōraku o yurushita.
37|149|Sate kare-ra ni toe. `Anata gata no omo wa musume o mochi, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyō to) wa musuko o motsu to iu no ka.
37|150|Soretomo kare-ra wa, ware ga tenshi-tachi o on'na ni tsukutta to shōgen suru no ka.'
37|151|Miyo, kare-ra no iu koto wa tsukurigotodearu.
37|152|Arrā ga ko o umareru to wa, kare-ra mo uso-tsuki no todearu.
37|153|Kare wa musuko yori mo, musume o erabareru to suru no ka.
37|154|Dō shita no ka. Anata gata wa dō handan suru no ka.
37|155|Anata gata wa nao kunkai o ukeirenai no ka.
37|156|Soretomo anata gata ni meiryōna ken'nō ga aru no ka.
37|157|Anata gata no iu koto ga shinjitsunaraba, anata gata no keiten o dashite mi nasai.
37|158|Kare-ra wa, kare to Jin wa shinruidearu to itte iru. Daga Jin wa jibun-tachi ga (chōbatsu ni) nozomu koto o yoku shitte iru.
37|159|Arrā ni tatae are. (Kare wa) kare-ra ga haisuru mono kara (chōzetsu nasa reru).
37|160|Daga kenkyo ni hōshi suru arrā no shimo be-tachi wa,-betsudearu.
37|161|Daga anata gata ni shite mo, anata gataga sūhai suru monode mo,
37|162|kare ni hankō shite (shinja-tachi o) yūwaku suru koto ga dekiyou ka.
37|163|Moesakaru hi de, yaka reru mono wa betsuni shite.
37|164|(Seiretsu shite iru-sha-tachi ga iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa onōno sadame no busho o motte imasu.
37|165|Watashi-tachi wa (hōshi no tame) seiretsu shite,
37|166|tsutsushinde (arrā o) tatae 唱念 Shimasu.'
37|167|Mata, kare-ra wa itsumo itte ita.
37|168|`Moshi watashi-tachi ga, mukashikara kunkai o motte itanara,
37|169|watashi-tachi mo, tashika ni arrā no kenkyona shimo bedeattadeshou.'
37|170|Tokoroga (jissai ni kuruān ga atae rarereba) sore o kyohi suru.Daga mamonaku kare-ra wa shirudearou.
37|171|Tashikani ware no kotoba wa, waga tsukawashita shimo be-tachi ni sudeni kudasa rete iru.
37|172|Kare-ra wa, kanarazu tasuke rareyou.
37|173|Hontōni ware no gunzei wa, kanarazu shōri o eru nodearu.
37|174|Anata (muhanmado) wa kare-ra kara shibarakunoaida tōzakatte,
37|175|kare-ra o kanshi shi nasai. Yagate, kare-ra wa mezamerudearou.
37|176|Daga kare-ra wa, waga chōbatsu o isogi motomete iru.
37|177|Daga sore ga jissai ni kare-ra ni kudaru to, sore made keikoku o ukete iru dake ni nezame no warui asa to narou.
37|178|Sorede anata wa kare-ra kara shibarakunoaida tōzakatte,
37|179|kare-ra o kanshi shi nasai. Yagate, kare-ra mo mezamerudearou.
37|180|Anata no shu, itoku no shu, kare-ra ga haisuru mono kara (chōzetsu nasa reru) omo ni tatae are.
37|181|Shito-tachi ni heian'are.
37|182|Ban'yū no shu, arrā ni tatae are.
38|1|Sādo. Kunkai ni michita kuruān ni kakete.
38|2|Iya, shinkō no nai-sha-tachi wa, kōman de hankō-tekidearu.
38|3|Ware wa kare-ra izen ni, don'nani ōku no sedai o horoboshita kotodearou. Kare-ra wa, mohaya nogare enai toki to natte (jihi o) kou.
38|4|Mata kare-ra wa, jibun-tachi no naka kara keikoku-sha ga deta koto ni odoroki, fushinjin-sha wa iu. `Kore wa majutsu-shidesu. Uso-tsukidesu.
38|5|Kare wa ōku no kamigami o, hitotsu no kami ni shite shimau nodesu ka. Kore wa mattaku, odoroki itta kotodesu.'
38|6|Soshite, kare-ra no chōrō-tachi wa tachisarinagara (sono ba ni ita nakama ni iu. ) `Iki nasai. Soshite anata gata no kamigami o mamori tōshi nasai. Kore wa (isshinkyō no oshie) mattaku no 企-Ra midesu.
38|7|Watashi-tachi wa kore made no oshie de, Konna koto o kiita koto ga arimasen. Kore wa tsukuribanashi ni sugimasen.
38|8|Watashi-tachi no ma de, an'na otoko ni dake o tsuge ga kudatta to iu nodesu ka.' Iya, kare-ra wa ware no kunkai ni, utagai o daite iru. Iya, kare-ra wa mada ware no chōbatsu o ajiwatta koto ga nai.
38|9|Soretomo kare-ra wa, iryoku narabinaku, megumi ōi anata no omo no, jihi no takaramono o motte iru no ka.
38|10|Kare-ra wa tenchi, soshite sonoaida no ban'yū no, taiken o motte iru no ka. Sorenara kare-ra ni tedate o sa sete,(ten no gyokuza made) nobora se nasai.
38|11|Shikashi are wa, toriai no shū de tada haisō suru bakari.
38|12|Kare-ra izen ni mo, nūfu no min, ādo (no min)oyobi kensei o hari megurashita firuaun mo,
38|13|mata samūdo (no min) ya rūto no min, oyobi mori no min mo shito-tachi o totō o kunde uso-tsuki yobawari shita.
38|14|(Korera wa) kai shito-tachi o uso-tsuki yobawari shi, sorede ware kara no chōbatsu ga kakujitsu ni kudatta.
38|15|Korera no mono mo, ka no hitokoe o matsu dakedearu. Soreni wa ikkoku no yūyo mo nai.
38|16|Kare-ra wa,`omo yo, watashi-tachi no sazukaru bun o seisan no nichiizen ni, isoide kudasai.' To iu.
38|17|Anata wa kare-ra no kotoba o taeshinobe. Soshite waga shimo bedearu kengo no hito dāūdo o omoe. Hontōni kare wa,(-nushi no) meirei ni fuku shite sanbi shitsutsu tsuneni (omo no omoto ni) kaetta.
38|18|Ware wa yamayama o shitagawa se, kare to tomoni asayū ni sanbi sa se,
38|19|mata chōrui mo,-shū tte, subete no mono ga omo no meirei ni fuku shite sanbi shitsutsu tsuneni (omo no omoto ni) kaetta.
38|20|Sokode ware wa kare no ōken o kyōka shi, eichi to dankotaru ketsudan-ryoku o kare ni sazuketa.
38|21|Anata wa ronsō-sha no monogatari o kiita no ka, hitobito ga watashi-shitsu no kabe o norikoete,
38|22|dāūdo no tokoro ni haitte kitanode kare wa odoroita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Osoreru koto wa arimasen. Kore ga soshō no tōjisha no sōhōdesu. Ippō ga tahō ni fusei o hatarakimashita. Shinri ni yotte watashi-tachi no ma o sabaite kudasai. Fukōhei ga nai yō ni, watashi-tachi o kōseina michi ni onmichibiki kudasai.'
38|23|`Koreha, watashi no anidesu. Kare wa 99-tō mo mehitsuji o motte ori, watashi wa (tada) 1-tō shika motte imasendeshita. Tokoroga kare wa, sore o mo jibun ni makase nasai to itta nodesu. Soshite kotoba takumi ni watashi o ii makasete shimatta nodesu.'
38|24|Kare (dāūdo) wa,`kare ga anata no hitsuji o, torikomou to shita no wa, tashika ni futōdesu. Hontōni kyōdō de shigoto o suru mono no ōku wa, tagaini okashi au. Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa betsudaga, sore wa maredesu.' To itta. (Sonotoki) dāūdo wa, ware ga kare o kokoromita koto o Yuiri,-nushi no o yurushi o koi, reihai ni hirefushi, kaigo shite omo no omoto ni kaetta. 〔Sajida〕
38|25|sorede ware wa, kare (no ayamachi) o yurushita. Kare wa (ima) hontōni ware ni chikadzuki, takōna (satori kitta) kaeri-sho ni iru.
38|26|`Dāūdo yo, ware wa anata o chijō no dairi-sha ni shita. Dakara hitobito o, shinri ni yotte sabaki, shiyoku ni shitagatte, arrā no michi o fumihazushite wa naranai. Arrā no michi kara mayou mono wa seisan no hi o wasureta mono de, kanarazu kibishī chōbatsu ni au.'
38|27|Ware wa ten to ji, soshite sonoaida ni aru mono o, 戯-Ra ni tsukuranakatta. Sore wa shinkō no nai mono no 億測Dearu.Daga (izure jigoku no) hi o ajiwau shinkō no nai mono koso awaredearu.
38|28|Ware ga shinkō shite zenkō ni dō shimu mono to, chijō de aku o okonau mono to onaji ni atsukau koto ga arou ka. Ware ga (akuma ni taishi) miwomamoru-sha to, jaaku no mono to o onaji ni atsukaudearou ka.
38|29|Ware ga anata ni kudashita Keisuke wa, shukufuku ni michi, sono shirushi o chinshimokukō suru tame no monodeari, mata shiryo aru-sha-tachi e no kunkaidearu.
38|30|Ware wa dāūdo ni suraimān o sazuketa. Nanto sugureta shimo bede wanai ka. Kare wa Ume Satoru shite tsuneni (ware ni) kaetta.
38|31|(Aru Ni~Tsu no) tasogaretoki, shunme ga, kare ni kenjō sa reta toki no koto o omoiokoshi nasai.
38|32|Kare wa itta. `Hontōni watashi wa,(konoyo no) subarashī mono o medete, yoru no tobari ga oriru made,-nushi o nenzuru koto o wasurete shimatta nodesu.
38|33|Sā, sono uma o tsurete maire. Soshite kare wa, umanoashi to kubi o kiriotoshite shimatta.
38|34|Mata ware wa suraimān o kokoromi,(-byō o atae) jūtai no kare o isu ni sueta. Sonogo kare wa kaifuku shi,
38|35|Itta. `Omo yo, watashi o o yurushi kudasai. Soshite kōsei no dare mo mochi enai hodo no ōkoku o watashi ni o atae kudasai. Hontōni anata wa yutaka ni atae rareru katadesu.'
38|36|Sokode ware wa,-fū o kare ni shitagawa seta. Sore wa kare no omou mama ni, sono meirei ni yotte nozomu tokoro ni shizuka ni fuku.
38|37|Mata ware wa shaitān-tachi o,(kare ni fukujū sa seta. Sono nakaniha) daiku ga ari sensui otto mo ari,
38|38|mata sono soto ni, suraimān no meirei ni fukusazu kusari ni tsunaga reta mono mo ita.
38|39|(Omo wa ōse rareta. ) `Kore ga ware no tamamonodearu. Anata ga ataeyou to, hikaeyou to, mondai wanai.'
38|40|Kare wa (ima) ware no chikaku ni ite, shiawasena (satori kitta) kaeri-sho ni iru.
38|41|Waga shimo be, aiyūbu o omoiokoshi nasai. Kare ga omoni mukatte,`shaitān ga watashi o nayama se, kurushimi nuite iru nodesu.' To sakenda toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
38|42|(Suruto meirei ga kudatta. ) `Anata no ashi de (daichi o) fumi nasai. Soko ni wa seiryōna awa-yoku to inryō no tame no (mizu) ga arou.'
38|43|Ware wa jihi to shite, kare ni (futatabi) kazoku o 2-bai ni shite sazuke, shiryo aru mono e no kyōkun to shita.
38|44|(Soshite itta. ) `Hitonigiri no kusa o te ni totte, sorede (tsuma o) ute. Anata no chikai o yabutte wa naranai.' Ware wa, kare ga yoku taeshinobu koto o shitta. Nanto sugureta shimo bede wanai ka. Kare wa (omo no meirei ni fuku shite) tsuneni (ware no moto ni) kaetta.
38|45|Mata waga shimo be no, iburāhīmu to isuhāku to yaakōbu o omoiokoshi nasai. Kare-ra wa iryoku o mochi, dōsatsuryoku ga atta.
38|46|Ware wa, kare-ra ga (raise no) sumai o nenjite iru to iu junsuina (shishitsu) ni yotte (menjite) kare-ra o kiyomete yatta.
38|47|Hontōni kare-ra wa, wa ga me ni mo eraba re sugureta monodeatta.
38|48|Mata isumāīru to Aru yasaa to zu ru kifuru o omoiokose. Kare-ra wa mina sugureta monodeatta.
38|49|Kore wa hitotsu no kyōkundearu. Hontōni omo o naga reru mono no tame ni wa, shiawasena kaeri-sho ga aru.
38|50|(Soreha) eien no rakuendeari, sono subete no mon wa kare-ra no tame ni aka reru.
38|51|Sono Chū de kare-ra wa (anraku ni nedoko ni) yorikakari, takusan no kajitsu ya nomimono ga, nozomi-hōdaidearu.
38|52|Mata hata ni wa, fushime-gachi no onaji toshigoro no (otome) ga haberu.
38|53|Korera wa seisan no hi no tame ni, anata gata ni yakusoku sa reru monodearu.
38|54|Hontōni kore wa, tsukiru koto no nai (anata gata e no) tamamonodearu.
38|55|(Omo o osoreru mono wa) kono yōdearu. Daga hangyaku no itazurani wa, warui kaeri-sho ga arou.
38|56|Sore wa jigokudearu. Kare-ra wa soko de yaka reyou. Nanto warui fushidodearou ka.
38|57|(Jitsuni) kore wa, kō iu kotodaga kare-ra wa nietatsu yu to nō o aji wa sa re,
38|58|sono soto, kore ni ruisuru (chōbatsu) o tori awa sete ukeru koto ni naru.
38|59|Kore wa anata gata to issho ni, muyami ni tsukisusumu ichigundearu. Kare-ra ni wa kangei no kotoba mo nai. Hi goku de yaka reru dakedearu.
38|60|Kare-ra wa (hi goku no nakama wa kare-ra no shidō-sha-tachi ni) iu. `Iya, kangei sa renai no wa, anata gatadesu. Watashi-tachi no tame ni, kō shimuketa no wa anata gatadesu. Nanto warui sumai ni kita monodeshou.'
38|61|Suru to kare-ra wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi-tachi o koko ni tsurete kita mono ni wa, hi goku de bai no chōbatsu o o kuwae kudasai.'
38|62|Kare-ra (hi goku no nakama) wa iu. `Watashi-tachi ga akunin no naka ni kazoete ita hitobito ga mienai nodesu. Dō shita nodeshou.
38|63|Watashi-tachi ga chōshō shite ita mono (ga mienai). Kare-ra wa,(watashi-tachi no)-me o kurama seta node wanaideshou ka.'
38|64|Hontōni kore wa shinsō de, hi goku no nakama no ronsōdearu.
38|65|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa keikoku-sha ni suginai. Yuiitsu no kata, teikō dekinai kata, arrā no soto ni wa kami wa nai nodearu.
38|66|Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no ban'yū no shu, iryoku narabinaku kan'yōde ara reru.'
38|67|Itte yaru ga ī. `Kore wa shikō no shirasedearu.
38|68|Anata gata wa, sorekara somuki saruga.
38|69|Katsute (tenshi no) takai ikai no mono-tachi no rongi ni tsuite wa, watashi wa nani no chishiki mo nakatta.
38|70|Kore ga watashi ni keiji sa reta no wa, tada watashi ga Kōmei ni keikoku suru tamedearu.'
38|71|Anata no omo ga, tenshi-tachi ni,`ware wa doro kara ningen o tsukurou to shite iru.' To ōse rareta toki o omoe.
38|72|`Sorede ware ga, kare (ningen) o katachidzukuri, soreni rei o fukikondanaraba, anata gata wa fuku shite kare ni sajida shi nasai.'
38|73|Sokode tenshi-tachi wa, kai isseini sajida shitaga,
38|74|iburīsu dake wa sō shinakatta. Kare wa kōman de, shinkō o kobamu mono to natta.
38|75|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Iburīsu yo, ware no tezukara tsukutta mono ni sajida suru no ni, nani ga anata o samatageta no ka. Anata wa kōman'na no ka, soretomo takai (iryoku aru)-shana no ka.'
38|76|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Watashi wa kare (ningen) yori mo sugurete imasu, anata wa hi de watashi o o tsukuri ni narimashitaga, kare wa doro de tsukura reta dakedesu.'
38|77|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Sorenara anata wa, koko kara dete iki nasai, hontōni imawashīkara.
38|78|Soshite ware kara no mikagiri wa, shinpan no hi made kanarazu anata no ue ni arou.'
38|79|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Omo yo, kare-ra ga yobiokosa reru hi made, yūyo o negaimasu.'
38|80|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Anata o yūyo shiyou.
38|81|Sadame rareta nichiji made.'
38|82|Kare wa mōshiageta. `Soredewa, anata no o ikō ni kakete chikaimasu. Watashi wa kare-ra (ningen) subete no mono o yūwaku shimasu.
38|83|Kare-ra no naka no, anata no kenkyona shimo be o nozoite wa.'
38|84|Kare wa ōse rareta. `Sore wa shinjitsudearu. Ware kara mo shinjitsu o iu.
38|85|Ware wa, anata to anata ni shitagau subete no mono de, jigoku o mitasudearou.'
38|86|Ie,`watashi wa kono (kuruān) ni taishi nani no hōshū mo anata gata ni motomenai. Mata watashi wa gizen-shade wanai.
38|87|Kore wa sho minzoku ni taisuru kunkai nihokanaranai.
38|88|Toki ga kitara, anata gata wa sore ga sonojitsudearu koto o kanarazu shirudearou.'
39|1|Kono Keisuke no keiji wa, iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru arrā kara (kudasa reta mono)dearu.
39|2|Hontōni ware wa shinri ni yotte, anata ni kono Keisuke o kudashita. Sorede arrā ni tsukae, shinjin no makoto o tsukuse.
39|3|Shinjin no makoto o tsukushite tsukaeru no wa, arrā ni taishi tōzende wanai ka. Daga kare o sashioite (hoka ni) hogo-sha o motomeru mono wa,`watashi-tachi ga kare-ra (kamigami) ni tsukaeru no wa tada watashi-tachi ga arrā no o-gawa ni chikadzuku tamedearu.'(To iu). Hontōni arrā wa kare-ra no kotonaru ten ni tsuite, kanarazu sonoaida o saiketsu nasa reru. Arrā wa, kyogi de onwowasureru-sha o onmichibiki ni nara renai.
39|4|Arrā ga ko o motou to o nozominara, o jibun no tsukura reru mono no naka kara, nozomi no mono o eraba reru. Kare ni tatae are. Kare wa arrā, yuiitsu ni shite (ban'yū no) seifuku-shadearu.
39|5|Kare wa shinri o motte tenchi o sōzō nasa re, yoru o motte hiru o ōi mata hiru o motte yoru o ōwa se, taiyō to tsuki o fukujū sa sete sorezore sadame rareta shūki ni unkō sa seru. Hontōni kare wa, iryoku narabinaku yoku yurusa reru katadearu.
39|6|Kare wa anata gata o hitotsu no tamashī kara tsukuri, sorekara sono haigūsha o tsukuri, mata kare wa 8-tō no kachiku o shiyū de anata gata ni tsukawasa reta. Kare wa anata gata o haha no tainai ni tsukura re, 3ttsu no ankoku no naka ni oite, sōzō ni tsugu sōzō o nasa reta. Ko no yō ni, anata gata no shu arrā ni taiken wa zokusuru. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu.Nanoni anata gata wa dōshite somuki saru no ka.
39|7|Moshi anata gata ga shinjinakute mo, arrā wa anata gata o hitsuyō to sa renai. Daga kare wa, shimo be-tachi no fushinjin o yorokoba re wa shinai. Shikashi kansha surunaraba, kare wa yorokoba reru. Omoni o ou mono wa,-gai no mono no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai. Yagate anata gata wa, jibun no omo no omoto ni kaeru nodearu. Sonotoki kare wa, anata gata no (gense ni okeru) okonai no subete o o tsuge ni naru. Hontōni kare wa,(hitobito no) mune ni daku koto o jukuchi nasa reru.
39|8|Ningen wa saiyaku ni aeba omoni inori, Ume Satoru shite kare ni kaeru. Daga, onkei ga kare no omoto kara sadzuke rareru to,-saki ni inotta koto o wasurete, arrā ni dōisha o haishi, kare no michi kara (hitobito o) mayowa seru. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata wa, tsukanoma no fushinjin (no seikatsu) o kyōraku suruga yoi. Hontōni anata wa, hi goku no nakamadearu.'
39|9|Yoru ni nemurazu me o samashite iru toki ni, sajida shi aruiwa tatte reihai ni uchikonde, raise ni sonae, mata omo no o jihi o koi negau mono (ga sōde wanai mono to onajidearou ka). Itte yaru ga ī. `Shitte iru mono to, shiranai-sha to onajidearou ka.'(Shikashi) kunkai o ukeireru no wa, shiryo aru mono dakedearu.
39|10|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Shinkō suru ware no shimo be-tachi yo,-nushi o osore nasai. Gense ni oite zenkō o nasu mono ni wa, yoi (hōshū) ga aru. Arrā no daichi wa hiroi nodearu. Yoku taeshinobu mono wa hontōni kagirinai hōshū o ukeru.'
39|11|Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa arrā ni, shinjin no makoto o tsukushite tsukaeru yō meiji rare,
39|12|mata watashi wa musurimu no sendatsudearu yō meiji rarete iru.'
39|13|Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi ga moshi,-nushi ni somuku yōna koto ga areba, idaina-bi no chōbatsu ga osoroshī.'
39|14|Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa arrā ni makoto o tsukushite tsukaemasu.
39|15|Anata gata wa, kare o sashioite, hossuru mono ni tsukaeruga ī.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Hontōni shippai-sha to wa, shinpan no hi ni, mizukara no tamashī to sono kazoku o ushinau monodearu. Hontōni sore wa akirakana shippaidearu.'
39|16|Kare-ra no ue wa hi no ōi, kare-ra no shita mo (hi no) yukadearou. Ko no yō ni arrā wa shimo be ni keikoku nasa reru. `Shimo be-tachi yo,dakara ware o osoreyo.'
39|17|Jashin 〔tāgūto〕 o sakete, sonshin sezu kaigo shite, arrā no moto ni kaeru mono ni wa kippō ga arou. Dakara waga shimo be-tachi ni kippō o tsutae nasai.
39|18|Okotoba o kiite, sono Chū no mottomo yoi tokoro ni shitagau-sha-tachi ni. Korera wa arrā ga michibika reta monodeari, korera koso shiryo aru-sha-tachidearu.
39|19|Daga kare ni taishi shinpan ga atte, chōbatsu no o kotoba ga kudatta mono o (dare ga tasuke rareyou). Anata wa hi goku no naka ni iru mono o, sukueru to demo iu no ka.
39|20|Daga omo o osoreru mono ni taishite wa,-kan no ue ni yakata no kōrō ga ari, sono-ka ni wa kawa ga nagareru. Arrā no o yakusokudearu. Arrā wa kesshite yakusoku o yabura renai.
39|21|Minai no ka, arrā ga ten kara ame o furase rare, sore o chichū ni haira sete izumi to nasa re, sorekara irotoridori no, shokubutsu o hae sase, yagate sorera ga karete kiiro ni naru no o. Sorekara, sore o kawakashite, boroboro no kuzu ni nasa reru. Hontōni kono nakaniha, shiryo aru mono e no kyōkun ga aru.
39|22|Arrā ga, mune o hiraki isurāmu to shi,-nushi kara no o hikari o uketa mono ga onajidearou ka. Wazawai naru ka na, arrā no keiji o katakuna ni kobamu mono koso, akiraka ni kokoro mayoeru monodearu.
39|23|Arrā wa konouenai subarashī kotoba o, tagaini nita (goku o motte) kurikaeshi keiten de keiji nasa reta. Omo o osoreru mono wa, sore ni yotte hada wa ononoki furueru. Sonotoki arrā o tatae 唱念 Sureba hada mo kokoro mo nagu. Kore ga arrā no onmichibikidearu. Kare wa o kokoronikanau-sha o michibika reru. Daga arrā ga mayou ni makaseta mono ni wa, michibikite wanai.
39|24|Sore de shinpan no hi no tsūku o kao ni ukeru mono wa dōdearou. Fugimono ni taishite wa iwa reyou. `Anata gataga okonatte eta koto (no batsu) o ajiwae.'
39|25|Kare-ra izen no mono mo (mata keiji o) kyohi shita. Sorede omoi mo kakenai hōmen kara, chōbatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta.
39|26|Arrā wa gense no seikatsu ni oite mo, kare-ra ni kutsujoku o ajiwawa se rareru. Daga raise ni okeru chōbatsu wa sarani ōkī. Ā, kare-ra ga sore o shitteitanaraba.
39|27|Mata ware wa kakushu no hiyu o nyū bito no tame ni, kono kuruān no naka de teiji shita. Kare-ra ga kunkai o ukeirereba yoi to omotte.
39|28|Sukoshi mo magatta tokoro no nai, Arabia-go no kuruān de kanarazu kare-ra wa ware o osoreru koto (o shiru)dearou.
39|29|Arrā wa hitotsu no hiyu o teiji nasa reru. Ōku no shujin ga ite tagaini arasou mono to, tadaichinin no shujin ni chūjitsu ni tsukaete iru mono to kono 2-ri wa kurabete mite onajidearou ka. Arrā ni tatae are. Daga, kare-ra no ōku wa wakaranai nodearu.
39|30|Hontōni anata wa (itsuka wa) shinu. Kare-ra mo mata shinu nodearu.
39|31|Sore kara shinpan no hi ni, anata gata wa omo no gozen de, ronsō su (ru koto ni nari sabaki o uke)ru.
39|32|Arrā ni tsuite uso o ii, mata jibun no moto ni shinri ga kuru to kore o kyohi suru mono ijō ni, fugina mono ga arou ka. Jigoku ni wa, fushinjin-sha e no sumai ga nai to demo iu no ka.
39|33|Daga shinri o (nishi? ) Su-sha, mata sore o kakunin (shite shiji) suru mono, korera wa seigi o okonau monodearu.
39|34|Kare-ra wa arrā no omoto de, nani demo nozomu mono o e rareyou. Kore wa zenkō o nasu mono e no hōshōdearu.
39|35|Sore de arrā wa, kare-ra no okonai no saiaku no monode mo shōmetsu nasa re, kare-ra no itta saizen no mono o totte hōshō o atae rareru.
39|36|Arrā wa sono shimo be ni totte banzen (na gādian)de wanai ka. Daga kare-ra wa kare igai (no kamigami) o motte, anata o odosou to suru. Arrā ga mayou ni makaseta (kono yō na)-sha ni wa michibiki wa ari enai.
39|37|Arrā ga michibiku mono o, mayowa seru mono wa daremoinai. Arrā wa (sono o ishi o jitsugen nasa reru) iryoku narabinaki katadeari, ōhō no omodearu.
39|38|Moshi anata ga kare-ra ni,`tenchi o tsukutta no wa dare ka.' To toeba, kare-ra wa kanarazu `arrā.' To iudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Sorenara anata gata wa kangaenai no ka. Arrā no soto ni anata gata no inoru mono-tachi wa, moshi arrā ga watashi ni taishi saiyaku o o nozomi no toki, kare no saiyaku o nozoku koto ga dekiru no ka. Mata watashi ni taishi jihi o o nozomi no toki, kare no jihi o kyohi suru koto ga dekiru ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa, arrā ga ireba banzendearu. Kichinto shinrai shiyou to suru mono wa, kare o shinrai suru.'
39|39|Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi no hitobito yo, anata gata no sukina yō ni okonae. Watashi wa (jibun no yakume o) okonau. Yagate anata gata wa shirudearou.
39|40|Dare ni hazubeki chōbatsu ga kuru no ka, mata dare ni eien no chōbatsu ga kudaru no ka o.'
39|41|Ware wa hitobito no tame, shinri ni yotte anata ni keiten o kudashita. Sorede dare demo, michibiki o ukeru mono wa, jibun o mashi, mata dare demo mayou mono wa, jibun o son'u dakedearu. Anata wa kare-ra no kōken'ninde wanai.
39|42|Arrā wa (ningen ga) shinu to sono tamashī o mesa re, mata shinanai-sha mo, suimin no ma (sore o meshi), kare ga shinosenkoku o nasa reta mono no tamashī wa, sonomama ni hikitome, sono soto no mono wa sadame rareta jikoku ni okurikaesa reru. Hontōni kono nakaniha, hansei suru hitobito e no shuju no shirushi ga aru.
39|43|Kare-ra wa arrā igai ni, torinasu mono o motomeru no ka. Itte yaru ga ī. `Kare-ra (jashin-tachi ni) wa nani no chikara mo naku, mata nani mo rikai shinaide wanai ka.'
39|44|Itte yaru ga ī. `Torinashi (no yurushi) wa, subete arrā ni zokusuru. Ten to ji no taiken wa kare no yūdearu. Yagate anata gata wa kare no moto ni kisa reru.'
