47|18|Kare-ra (nise shinja) wa, sonotoki (Saigonoshinpan) o matsu hoka wanai. Sore wa totsuzen kare-ra ni kudaru. Sono chōkō wa sudeni kudatte iru. Sore (toki) ga kita toki, kare-ra wa keikoku o dō yakudateru no ka. )
47|19|Dakara shire. Arrā no soto ni kami wanai koto o. Soshite anata no zaika ni taishi o yurushi o koe. Mata shinkō suru otoko-tachi, shinkō suru on'na-tachi no tame ni mo o yurushi o koe. Hontōni arrā wa, anata gata no hataraki furi mo, yasumi-kata mo (subete) shitte ora reru.
47|20|Shinkō suru mono-tachi wa,`dōshite 1-shō 〔sūra〕 ga kudatte konai no ka.' To iu. Tokoroga dankotaru 1-shō ga kudasa re, sono Chū de sentō no koto ga nobe rareru to, kokoro ni yamai no yadoru-sha-tachi wa, imanimo shi ni nozomu yōna yowayowashī mabuta de anata o miyou. Wazawaiare (kare-ra wa shinda kata ga ī. )
47|21|Fukujū suru koto to, kōsei ni iu koto (no kata ga daijidearu). Koto (sentō) ga, kettei sa reta toki wa, arrā ni chūseidearu koto ga kare-ra no tame ni yoi.
47|22|Anata gataga, moshi o meirei ni somuki sattari shite, chijō ni taihai o (da? ) Shi, mata ketsuen no danzetsu to naru yōna koto o kitai suru no ka.
47|23|Korera no hitobito wa, arrā ga mikagitta mono de, rōa (-sha) ni sa re, sono-me mo mōmoku ni nasa reru.
47|24|Kare-ra wa kuruān o jukudoku ganmi shinai no ka. Soretomo kokoro ni kagi o kaketa no ka.
47|25|Hontōni michibiki ga akiraka ni sa reta nochi sore kara somuki saru mono wa, akuma ni sosonokasa re, ayamatta ganbō no toriko to naru.
47|26|Sore wa kare-ra ga, arrā no kudasa reru mono o kirau mono ni mukatte,`watashi-tachi wa baainiyotte wa, anata gata ni shitagaimashou.' To itta tamedearu. Daga arrā wa kare-ra no himitsu o shitte ora reru.
47|27|Tenshi-tachi ga, kare-ra o meshi yose (shinde shimau koto) kare-ra no kao ya se o uttanara dōdearou ka.
47|28|Sore to iu no mo kare-ra ga arrā no o ikari ni naru koto bakari o okonai, kare no o yorokobi ni nara reru koto o kiratta tame, kare ga kare-ra no okonai o munashiku shita nodearu.
47|29|Soretomo kokoro ni yamai o yadosu mono wa, jibun-tachi no (mitsuna) akui o arrā ga akarumi ni dasa renaito demo kangaeru no ka.
47|30|Moshi ware ga hossurunara, kare-ra (nise shinja) o anata ni sashishimeshi, sono tokuchō ni yotte shikibetsu deki, mata (kare-ra wa) kotoba no chōshi ni yotte mo wakaru. Hontōni arrā wa anata gata no okonau koto o shitte ora reru.
47|31|Ware wa anata gata no naka, doryoku shi, taeshinobu-sha-tachi o kubetsu suru tame ni anata gata o kokoromiru. Mata anata gata no genkō o mo kaku meru.
47|32|Hontōni shinkō shinai mono, soshite (hitobito o) arrā no michi kara samatage, mata michibiki ga akiraka ni sa reta nochi shito ni hankō suru mono-tachi ga iru ga, sukoshi mo arrā o son'u koto wa dekinai. Kare wa, kare-ra no okonai o munashiku nasa reru.
47|33|Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, arrā ni shitagai, mata shito ni shitagae. Anata gata no okonai o, munashiku sa sete wa naranai.
47|34|Hontōni shinkō shinaide, arrā no michi kara (hitobito o) samatage, fushin-sha to shite shinu mono o, arrā wa kesshite o yurushi ni wa nara renai.
47|35|Dakara rakutan shite wa naranai. Wahei o tonaete wa naranai. Anata gata wa shōri o eru nodearu. Arrā wa, anata gata to tomoni ora reru. Kesshite anata gata no okonai o shippai sa senai.
47|36|Konoyo no seikatsu wa,(ichiji no) asobi ya tawamure nisuginai. Anata gataga shinkō shite jibun no gimu o hatasunaraba, kare wa anata gata ni hōshō o ataeru. Anata gata wa zaisan (no hōki) o motome rarete iru node wanai.
47|37|Moshi kare ga sore o anata gata ni motome rare, kyōyō sa rerunaraba, anata gata wa ka shikunari, kare wa anata gata no urami kokoro o bakuro sa reyou.
47|38|Miyo, anata gata wa, arrā no michi no tame ni (shoyū suru mono no ichibu no) hodokoshi o motome rareru nodearu. Sorenanoni anata gata no nakaniha, don'yokuna mono ga iru. Daga don'yokuna mono wa, tada jibun no tamashī o son'u dakedearu. Arrā wa jisoku sa rete iruga, anata gata wa mazushī. Moshimo anata gata ga somuki sarunaraba, kare wa anata gata igai no min o kawari ni tate rareyou. Sorera wa anata gata to dōyōde wanaidearou.
48|1|Hontōni ware wa, akirakana shōri o anata ni sazuketa.
48|2|Sore wa arrā ga, anata no tame ni kako to kongo no tsumi o yurushi, mata anata e no onkei o hatashite tadashī michi ni shirube mo ite kudasari,
48|3|mata chikaradzuyoi enjo de anata o tasukeyou to nasa reru tamedearu.
48|4|Kare koso wa, shinja-tachi no kokoro ni yasuragi o atae, kare-ra no shinjin no ue ni shinjin o kuwae rareru katadearu. Hontōni, ten to ji no sho gunzei wa arrā no yūdearu. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
48|5|Sore mo kare ga, shinjiru otoko-tachi to shinjiru on'na-tachi o kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni haira sete, sono naka ni eien ni sumawase, kare-ra no samazamana zaigō o shōmetsu nasa reru to no oboshimeshi kara. Kore koso arrā no omotode wa idaina jōjudearu.
48|6|Mata kare wa, arrā ni tsuite yokoshimana kangae o motsu nise shinja ya on'na-tachi, tashinkyō to wa otoko mo on'na mo chōbatsu nasa reru. Kare-ra wa arrā ni tsuite, warui kenkai de okusoku suru monodearu. Korera no mono ni wa hi un ga megutte kite, arrā wa kare-ra ni gekido sa re, Takashi rare, kare-ra no tame ni jigoku o junbi nasa reru. Warui kaeri-shodearu.
48|7|Ten to ji no sho gunzei wa arrā no monodearu. Arrā wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru.
48|8|Hontōni ware wa, jisshō-sha, kippō no dentatsu-sha mata keikoku-sha to shite, anata o tsukawashita.
48|9|Sore wa anata gataga, arrā to sono shito o shinji, mata kare (no oshie no sen'yō) o tasuke, kare o sonsū sa seru tamedeari, mata asanayūna kare o tatae saseru tamedearu.
48|10|Hontōni anata ni chūseiwochikau-sha wa, arrā ni chūseiwochikau-shadearu. Arrā no ote ga kare-ra no te no ue ni ari, sorede dare demo chikai o yaburu mono wa, jibun no tamashī o sokonau monodearu. Mata dare demo arrā to no yakusoku o, hatasu mono ni wa, kare wa idaina hōshō o ataeru nodearu.
48|11|Ato ni inokotta sabaku no Arabu hito-tachi wa, anata ni mukatte,`watashi-tachi wa, zaisan ya kazoku no koto ni torawarete imashita.Dakara dō ka watashi-tachi no tame ni, yurushi o inotte kudasai.' To kare-ra wa, kokoro ni mo nai koto o shita no saki de iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Moshimo arrā ga anata gata o gaishiyou to o nozomi ni nari, matawa eki shiyou to o nozomi ni nareba, dare ga anata gata no tame ni sukoshidemo arrā no i o hirugaesu koto nado dekiyou ka.' Iya, arrā wa, anata gata no okonau koto o shiri tsukusa reru.
48|12|Iya, shito to shinja-tachi wa, kesshite sono kazoku no moto ni kaeranaito anata gata wa kangae, tokui ni natte, janen o daite ita. Anata gata wa hametsu suru mindearu.
48|13|Daredemo arrā to sono shito o shinjinainaraba, ware wa sono yōna fushinjin no to ni taishite moesakaru hi o junbi shita.
48|14|Ten to ji no taiken wa arrā no yūdearu. Kare wa o nozomi no mono o yurushi, mata o nozomi no mono o chōbatsu nasa reru. Hontōni arrā wa, kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
48|15|Ato ni inokotta-sha-tachi mo, anata gataga shutsudō shite senri-hin ga toreru to naru to,`watashi-tachi o irete kudasai. Anata gata no gokū o shimasu.' To ii, kare-ra wa arrā no o kotoba o kaeyou to nozomu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa, kesshite tsuite kite wa naranai. Arrā ga sudeni sō ōse rareta nodearu.' Suru to kare-ra wa,`anata gata wa watashi-tachi o urande iru.' To iu. Iya, kare-ra wa sukoshi mo rikai shinai nodearu.
48|16|Ato inokotta sabaku no Arabu-tachi ni itte yaru ga ī. `Ima ni anata gata wa, kyōdaina yūbu no min ni taishite (tatakau tame ni) shōshū sa reyou. Anata gata ga soyoi nuku no ka, matawa kare-ra ga fukujū suru ka no izurekadearu. Daga kono meirei ni shitagaeba, arrā wa migotona hōshō o anata gata ni ataeyou.Daga moshi izen somuita yō ni somuki sarunaraba, kare wa itamashī chōbatsu de anata gata o shobatsu sa reyou.'
48|17|Tadashi, mōjin wa (shussei shinakute mo) tsumi wa naku, ashi no shōgaimono ya byōnin ni mo tsumi wanai. Dare demo arrā to sono shito ni shitagau mono wa, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni haira sa reyou. Shikashi dare demo somuki saru mono wa, itamashī chōbatsu ga kudasa rerudearou.
48|18|Kare-ra ga ano kinoshitade anata ni chūsei o chikatta toki, arrā wa shinja-tachi ni, koto no soto o man'etsudeatta. Kare hakare-ra no mune ni daku koto o shiri, kare-ra ni yasuragi o kudashi, tedjikana shōri o motte mukuwa reta.
48|19|Soshite kare-ra wa,(sono soto ni) takusan no senri-hin o eta. Arrā wa iryoku narabinaku eimei de ara reru.
48|20|Arrā wa, anata gata ga eru koto ni naru takusan no senri-hin o yakusoku nasa reta. Shikamo suguni sore o hatasa re, anata gata ni (hankō suru) hitobito no te o osae rareta. Sore wa shinkō suru mono e no shirushideari, mata anata gata o tadashī michi ni michibiku tamedearu.
48|21|Mata kare wa imadani anata gata no chikara no oyobanai mono o mo (yakusoku sa retaga), arrā wa shikkari to torikakonde iru. Hontōni arrā wa subete no koto ni zen'nō de ara reru.
48|22|Fushinjin-sha-tachi ga, anata gata to tatakatta to shite mo, kare-ra wa kitto se o mukeyou. Kare-ra ni wa, hogo-sha mo kyūjo-sha mo inai.
48|23|Kore wa mukashi kara no, arrā no kankōdearu. Anata wa arrā no kankō ni wa, sukoshi no henkō mo miidasenai.
48|24|Mata kare koso wa, makka no tanima de anata gatakara kare-ra no te o, mata, kare-ra kara anata gata no te o osae rareta katadeari, sonogo kare wa, anata gata ni kare-ra ni taishi kō kekka o atae rareta. Hontōni arrā wa, anata gata no okonau koto no kanshi-sha de ara reru.
48|25|Kare-ra koso wa (keiji o) kyohi shi, anata gata o seinaru masujido kara samatage, mata kumotsu ga sono gisei no ba ni tassuru koto o samatageta monodearu. Mata anata gataga,(kare-ra to majiri sumu) shinkō suru otoko ya on'na-tachi o,-shirazu ni fumi 躪 Tte, muishiki ni tsumi o okasanai yō (anata gata no te o osae rareta). Kare wa o kokoronikanau-sha o sono jihi no naka ni haira se rareru. Moshi kare-ra (zen'nanzen'nyo) ga (hakkiri to) wakarete itanaraba, ware wa itamashī chōbatsu de fushin no to o chōbatsu shite itadearou.
48|26|Ano toki fushinjin'na-sha-tachi wa, mune no naka ni manshin no nen o moyashita. Jāhirīya (jidai no yōna) muchi ni yoru manshindearu. Sorede arrā wa, shito to shinja no ue ni yasuragi o kudashi, kare-ra ni jisei no o kotoba o oshitsuke rareta. Kore wa kare-ra ga sono (yasuragi) ni ataishi, mata sore o ukeru tamedeatta. Arrā wa subete no koto o shitte ora reru.
48|27|Hontōni arrā wa, shito no tame ni kare no yume o shinjitsu ni nasa reta. Moshi arrā ga o nozominara, anata gata wa, anshin shite kanarazu seinaru masujido ni hairi, anata gata no atama o so, matawa (kami o) mijika kaku karikonde (Hajji ya Omura o mattousuru). Nani mo osoreru koto wa nai nodearu. Kare wa anata gataga shiranai koto o shitte ora reru. Sore bakari ka, kare wa tedjikana hitotsu no shōri o yurusa reta.
48|28|Kare koso wa, michibiki to shinjitsuna oshie o motte, sore o subete no shūkyō no ue ni sen'yō suru tame, kare no shito o noko wa sa reta kata. Hontōni arrā wa risshō-sha to shite banzende ara reru.
48|29|Muhanmado wa arrā no shitodearu. Kare to tomoni iru mono wa fushinjin no mono ni taishite wa tsuyoku, kujikezu, otagai no made wa yasashiku shinsetsudearu. Anata wa, kare-ra ga rukuu shi sajida shite, arrā kara no onkei to o man'etsu o motomeru no o miyou. Kare-ra no shirushi wa,-gaku ni aru sajida ni yoru atodearu. (Mūsā no) rippō ni mo, kare-ra no yōna mono no tatoe ga ari,(īsā no) fukuin ni mo, kare-ra no yōna tatoe ga aru. Sore wa maita tane ga me o fuki, jōbuna kuki o nobashite,-shu o maita mono o yorokoba seru yōna mono. Sorede fushin-sha-tachi wa, kare-ra ni fungeki suru kotodearou. Daga arrā wa, kare-ra no naka de shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono ni, yōsha to idaina hōshō o yakusoku nasa reru.
49|1|Shinkō suru mono yo, anata gata wa arrā to sono shito o sashioite kattena furumai o shite wa naranai. Arrā o osore nasai. Hontōni arrā wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru.
49|2|Shinkō suru mono yo, anata gata no koe o yogen-sha no koe yori mo takaku agete wa naranai. Mata anata gataga tagaini kowadaka ni hanasu toki no yō ni, kare ni ōgoe de (hanashite) wa naranai. Anata gata no kidzukanai-chū ni, jibun no okonai o munashiku shinai tame ni.
49|3|Hontōni arrā no shito no mae de sono-goe o hikuku suru mono wa, arrā ga sono kokoro no keiken-sa o kokoromi rareta monodearu. Kare-ra ni wa, yurushi to idaina hōshō ga arou.
49|4|Hontōni heya no soto kara ōgoe de anata o yobu mono no ōku wa, shiryobunbetsu no nai monodearu.
49|5|Moshi kare-ra ga, anata no detekuru no o matsunaraba, soreha kare-ra no tame ni mo yoi. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
49|6|Shinkō suru mono yo, moshi yokoshimana mono ga jōhō o anata gata ni (wan? ) Shitanaraba, shinchō ni kentō shi nasai. Kore wa anata gataga, kidzukanai-chū ni hitobito ni kigai o oyoboshi, sono okonatta koto o kōkai suru koto ni naranai tamedearu.
49|7|Anata gata no ma ni arrā no shito ga iru koto o shire. Kare ga moshi ōku no kotogara ni tsuite anata gata ni shitagattanaraba, anata gata wa kitto fukō ni ochītta kotodearou. Daga arrā wa, anata gata ni shinkō o konomashī mono to nasa re, mata anata gata no kokoro o, sore ni fusawashiku shite, anata gata ni fushinjin to jaaku to hangyaku o kirau yō ni nasa reta. Kore wa tadashiku michibika reta monodearu.
49|8|Sore mo arrā kara no onmegumideari, onkeidearu. Arrā wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru.
49|9|Moshimo shinja ga 2tsu ni wakarete arasoeba, ryōsha no ma o chōtei shi nasai. Moshi kare-ra no ippō ga tahō ni taishite,(ippō-teki ni) muhōna koto o surunaraba, muhōmono ga arrā no meirei ni tachikaeru made tatakai nasai. Daga kare-ra ga tachi kaettanaraba, seigi to kōhei o mune to shite kare-ra no ma o chōtei shi nasai. Hontōni arrā wa kōseina mono o aisa reru.
49|10|Shinja-tachi wa kyōdaidearu. Dakara anata gata wa kyōdai no ma no yūwa o hakari, arrā o osore nasai. Kanarazu anata gata wa jihi ni azukaru nodearu.
49|11|Shinkō suru mono yo, aru-sha-tachi ni soto no mono-tachi o chōshō sa sete wa naranai. Sorera (chōshō sa reta kata) ga kare-ra yori mo sugurete iru kamo shirenai. On'na-tachi ni mo soto no on'na-tachi o (chōshō sa sete wa) naranai. Sono on'na-tachi ga kano on'na tachiyori mo, sugurete iru kamo shirenai. Soshite tagaini chūshō shite wa naranai. Mata adana de, nonoshiri atte wa naranai. Shinkō ni haitta nochi wa, aku o anji suru yōna yobina wa yokunai. Sore demo tomenai mono wa fugi no todearu.
49|12|Shinkō suru mono yo, jasui no ōku o harae. Hontōni jasui wa, tokiniha tsumidearu. Muyō no sensaku o shi tari mata tagaini kagebi shite wa naranai. Shinda kyōdai no niku o, taberu no o dare ga konomou ka. Anata gata wa sore o imikiraude wanai ka. Arrā o osore nasai. Hontōni arrā wa tabitabi yurusa reru kata, jihibukai hō de ara reru.
49|13|Hitobito yo, ware wa hitori no otoko to hitori no on'na kara anata gata o tsukuri, shuzoku to buzoku ni waketa. Kore wa anata gata o, tagaini shiriau yō ni sa seru tamedearu. Arrā no omoto de mottomo tōtoi mono wa, anata gata no naka mottomo omo o osoreru monodearu. Hontōni arrā wa, zenchi ni shite 凡 Yuru koto ni tsūgyō nasa reru.
49|14|Sabaku no Arabu-tachi wa,`watashi-tachi wa shinkō shimasu.' To iu. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa shinjite wa inai. Tada “watashi-tachi wa nyūshin shimashita” to itte iru dake de, shinkō wa mada anata gata no kokoronouchi ni haitte wa inai. Moshi anata gataga, arrā to sono shito ni shitagaunara, kare wa sono okonai ni tsuite, sukoshi mo (hōshō o) keigen sa reru koto wanai. Hontōni arrā wa kan'yō ni shite jihibukaku ara reru.
49|15|Hontōni shinja to wa, ichizu ni arrā to sono shito o shinjiru-sha-tachi de, utagai o motsu koto naku, arrā no michi no tame ni, zaisan to seimei to o sasagete funtō doryoku suru monodearu. Korera no mono koso shin no shinjadearu.'
49|16|Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa jibun no shūkyō o, arrā ni oshieyou to demo (omou no ka). Arrā wa tenchi ni aru subete no mono o shitte ora reru. Hontōni arrā wa subete no koto o jukuchi shite ora reru.'
49|17|Kare-ra wa, jibun ga isurāmu ni kie shite, anata ni taisuru on o hodokoshita yō ni omotte iru. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata no kie wa, watashi e no megumi to wa naranai. Moshi anata gataga shinjitsu (kie shita)nara, arrā wa, anata gata o shinkō ni michibiku koto o, anata gata e no megumi to nasa reru nodearu.'
49|18|Hontōni arrā wa, ten to ji no ōgi o shitte ora reru. Arrā wa, anata gata no shogyō o yoku dōsatsu nasa reru katadearu.
50|1|Kāfu. Eikō ni michita kuruān ni yotte chikau.
50|2|Iya, kare-ra wa jibun-tachi no ma kara hitori no keikoku-sha ga arawareta koto ni odoroki, sokode fushinjin'na-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa mattaku fushigina kotodearu.
50|3|Watashi-tachi ga shinde chiri ni natte (mata yomigaeru no) ka. Sore wa (rikai dekinai) tondemonai yomigaeridearu.'
50|4|Ware wa daichi ga, kare-ra o ikaga ni mushibami saru ka o shitte iru. Mata waga temoto ni wa,( 凡 Yuru shijū no) kiroku no chōbo ga aru.
50|5|Shinri ga otozureta toki, sore o kyogi to shitanode, kare-ra wa konran jōtai ni ochītta.
50|6|Kare-ra wa zujō no ten o minai no ka. Ware ga ikaga ni sore o sōzō shi, ikaga ni sore o kazatta ka. Soshite soreni wa, sukoshi no kizu mo nai to iu no ni.
50|7|Mata, ware wa daichi o uchi hiroge, sono-jō ni yamayama o sue, samazama no shurui no utsukushī (kusaki) o, oishigera seru.
50|8|(Sorera wa) kaigo shite (omo no omoto ni) kaeru subete no shimo be ga, yoku kansatsu subeki kotodeari, kyōkundearu.
50|9|Ware wa mata, shukufuku suru ame o ten kara fura sete, kaju-en ya shūkaku no kokumotsu o yutaka ni seichō sa seru.
50|10|Bisshiri to mi o tsuketa take no takai natsumeyashi no ki wa,
50|11|(arrā no) shimo be-tachi no shokuryō. Mata sore (ame) de ware wa shinda daichi o yomigaera seru. Yobidashi (fukkatsu) ni shite mo onajiyōna koto.
50|12|Kare-ra izen mo,(shito o) uso-tsuki yobawari shita mono ga atta. Nūfu no min mo, rassu no nakama mo samūdo mo,
50|13|mata ādo no min mo, firuaun mo, rūto no dōhō mo,
50|14|mata mori no nakama mata tobbau no min mo kai shito o uso-tsuki yobawari shita. Dakara (ware no) keikoku wa kakujitsu ni jitsugen sa rete shimatta.
50|15|Saisho no sōzō no tame ni, ware ga tsukareta to iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa atarashī sōzō ni tsuite utagai o daite iru.
50|16|Hontōni ware wa ningen o tsukutta. Soshite sono tamashī ga sasayaku koto mo shitte iru. Ware wa (ningen no) sune dōmyaku yori mo ningen ni chikai nodearu.
50|17|Miyo, migigawa ni mata hidarigawa ni suwatte, 2-ri no (shugo no tenshi no) kanshi-sha ga kanshi suru.
50|18|Kare ga mada hitokoto mo iwanai no ni, kare no hata no kanshu wa (kiroku no) junbi o totonoete iru.
50|19|Soshite jissai ni shi no konsui ga otozureru. Kore wa anata ga sakete kita mono.
50|20|Soshite rappa ga fuka reru. Kore wa ano yakusoku sa reta hidearu.
50|21|Soshite onōno no tamashī wa, otte to shōgen-sha ni tomonawa rete kuru. Soshite onōno no tamashī wa,(hitsuji no gun o oitateru yō ni) otte (no tenshi) hitori to (gense no shogyō o shōgen suru tame no) shōgen (no tenshi) hitori ni tomonawa rete yatte kuru.
50|22|(Sonotoki, iwa reyou. ) `Anata wa, kono (shinpan no hi) ni tsuite jissai chūi shinakatta. Ware wa ima, anata kara kutsugae o torinozoku. Kyō wa, anata no shikaku wa eibindearu.'
50|23|Kare no dōhan no nakama wa iu. `Kore ga, watashi no junbi shita monodesu.'
50|24|(Sonotoki omo wa ōse rareyou. ) `Anata gata ryōmei, hangyaku shita ganmeina mono o subete, jigoku ni nagekome.
50|25|Tadashī michi o samatageta mono, okite o yabutta mono,(shinri ni) utagai o daita mono,
50|26|arrā to dōi ni soto no kami o tateta mono, anata gata ryōmei wa, korera o kibishī chōbatsu no naka ni nagekome.'
50|27|Kare no nakama wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi ga kare o somuka seta node wa arimasen. Kare ga (mizukara) tōku mayoikonde shimatta nodesu.'
50|28|Kare wa ōse rareyou. `Ware no mae de giron shite wa naranai. Ware wa soku ni anata gata ni keikoku shita nodearu.
50|29|Ware wa itta koto o kaeru koto wanai. Mata ware no shimo be-tachi ni taishi, kesshite fuseide wa nai nodearu.'
50|30|Sonohi ware ga jigoku ni,`man'in ni natta ka.' To tou to,`nao ōku no (hairu)-sha ga orimasu ka.' To kotaeru.
50|31|Omo o osoreru mono ni wa, rakuen ga chikadzuite kuru. Sugu chikaku ni.
50|32|Kore wa kaigo shite tsuneni (arrā ni) kaeri (omo no okite o) mamoru subete no mono no tame ni yakusoku sa rete ita monodeari,
50|33|menimienai jihibukaki okata o osore, kokoronosokokara kaigo shite (omoni) kaetta-sha-tachi no tame (no monodearu).
50|34|`Yasu njite sore ni ire. Kore wa eien no hidearu.'
50|35|Kare-ra no tame ni wa soko ni, hoshīmono wa nandemoari, mata waga moto kara motto tsuika ga arou.
50|36|Ware wa kare-ra izen ni, ikaga ni ōku no sedai o horoboshita koto ka. Kare-ra wa, korera (makka no tashinkyō to) yori mo chikara ni oite motto yūmōdeattade wanai ka. Sore de kare-ra wa sho toshi o meguri aruitaga, doko ni hinansho ga arou ka.
50|37|Hontōni kono nakaniha kokoro aru mono, mata mimiwokatamukeru-sha, chūshi suru mono e no kyōkun ga aru.
50|38|Ware wa ten to ji, mata sonoaida ni aru subete no mono o 6-nichi no ma ni sōzō shita. Shikashi ware wa sukoshi no tsukare mo kanjiru koto wa nakatta.
50|39|Sorede anata wa kare-ra no iu koto o shinobi,-nushi no eikō o home tatae nasai. Taiyō ga noboru mae to shizumu mae ni.
50|40|Mata yoru mo, kare o tataete 唱念 Shi nasai, mata reihai no owari ni mo.
50|41|Mimi o katamuke nasai. Shōshū-sha ga sugu chikai tokoro kara yobu hi ni (sonaete).
50|42|Sonohi, kare-ra wa shinjitsu no hitokoe o kikou. Sore wa (hakaba kara) deteiku-bidearu.
50|43|Hontōni ware wa nama o sazuke, mata shi o ataeru. Ware ni (subete no mono no) kichaku-sho ga aru.
50|44|Sonohi, daichi wa kare-ra (no tokoro) kara sake, kare-ra wa isoide deteiku. Kore koso ga shōshū de, ware ni totte wa yōina gōdearu.
50|45|Ware wa kare-ra no iu koto o yoku shōchi shite iru. Anata wa kare-ra ni kyōsei shite wa naranai. Waga keikoku o osoreru-sha-tachi ni, kuruān ni yotte kunkai shi nasai.
51|1|Hiroku 撤Ki chirasu (kaze) ni kakete,
51|2|omoku (ame o) hakobu (kumo) ni kakete,
51|3|yasuyasuto hashiru (fune) ni kakete,
51|4|o inochi o hōjite haifu o tsukasadoru mono ni kakete (chikau).
51|5|Anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto wa, shinjitsu de,
51|6|hontōni shinpan wa, kanarazu kudaru.
51|7|Obitadashī kidō o motsu ten ni kakete (chikau).
51|8|Hontōni anata gata wa, shinjō ga machimachide,
51|9|kore (fukkatsu no shinkō) kara somuku mono wa,(shinjitsu kara) somuki saru monodearu.
51|10|Okusoku-sha wa shobatsu sa reyou.
51|11|Konran no kōzui no naka de bon'yari shite iru mono,
51|12|kare-ra wa,`shinpan no hi wa nanji no kotodesu ka.' To tou.
51|13|(Soreha) kare-ra ga, hi goku de kokoromi rareru hi.
51|14|(Itte yaru ga ī. ) `Anata gata no seme ku o ajiwae. Kore koso anata gataga, saisoku shite ita monodearu.'
51|15|Daga omo o osore (keikende a~tsu)ta mono wa, rakuen to izumi ni (sumi),
51|16|-nushi ga kare-ra ni sadzuke rareru mono o sazukaru. Hontōni kare-ra wa, izen zenkō ni dō shinde ita.
51|17|Kare-ra wa, yakan demo sukoshidake nemuri,
51|18|mata reimei ni wa, o yurushi o inotte ita.
51|19|Mata kare-ra no zaisan ni wa, kou mono ya, kou koto mo dekinai konkyū-sha-tachi no kenri ga aru to ninshiki shite ita.
51|20|Chijō ni wa shinjinbukai-sha-tachi e no shuju no shirushi ga ari,
51|21|mata anata gata jishin no naka ni mo aru. Soredemo anata gata wa miyou to shinai no ka.
51|22|Ten ni wa, anata gata e no kate to, anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta mono ga aru.
51|23|Sore de ten to ji no omo ni kakete (chikau). Hontōni sore wa shinjitsudearu. Chōdo anata gata ga hanasu koto ga (jijitsu de) aru yō ni.
51|24|Anata gata wa, iburāhīmu no tōtoi hinkyaku-tachi no monogatari o kiita no ka.
51|25|Kare-ra wa kare (iburāhīmu) no ie ni haitte,`heian'are.' To itta toki, kare mo `heian'are. Mishiranu katagata yo.' To kotaeta.
51|26|Sore de kare wa sotto kazoku no tokoro ni hikikaeshi, koeta koushi (no yakiniku) o motte dete,
51|27|sore o kare-ra no mae ni oita. (Daga te o tsukenainode) kare wa itta. `Anata gata wa, meshi noborimasen ka.'
51|28|Kare wa, kare-ra (hinkyaku) ga usukimiwaruku nari, shinpai ni natta. Kare-ra wa `osoreru ni wa oyobimasen.' To ii, yagate, kare ni kashikoi musuko ga sazukarudearou to iu kippō o tsutaeta.
51|29|Suruto kare no tsuma wa koe o agete susumidete,-gaku o butte,`watashi wa rōba de, umazumedesunoni.' To itta.
51|30|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata no omo ga kō ōse rareta nodesu. Hontōni kare wa eimei ni shite zenchi de ara remasu.'
51|31|Kare wa itta. `Sore de, anata gata no o yōken wa nandesuka, shito no kata gata yo.'
51|32|Kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa tsumibukai min ni tsukawasa reta nodesu.
51|33|Doro no haritsuke o (ame no yō ni) kare-ra no ue ni furasu tame ni.
51|34|Hō rachi o tsukusu mono ni taishite,-nushi no omoto de shirusa reta (doro no haritsuke o furasou).' To itta.
51|35|Sore kara, ware wa soko ni ita shinja-tachi o tachi noka seyou to shita.
51|36|Shikashi, sono (machi no)-chū de miidashita musurimu no ie wa, tada no ikken dakedeatta.
51|37|Ware wa itamashī chōbatsu o, osoreru mono no tame ni hitotsu no shirushi to shite soko ni nokoshita.
51|38|Mata mūsā ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga akirakana ken'i o sazukete, kare o firuaun ni tsukawashita toki o omoiokose.
51|39|Kare (firuaun) wa sono kensei o kasa ni, se o muke,`koitsu wa majutsu-shi ka, soretomo kichigaida.' To itta.
51|40|Sorede are wa, kare to sono gunzei o toraete umi ni nagekonda. Hontōni kare wa, ke shikaranu monodeatta.
51|41|Mata ādo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). Ware ga sangai o (nishi? ) Su kaze o kare-ra ni okutta toki o omoiokose.
51|42|Sore wa kare-ra o osotte, subete o kaimetsu shi haikyo no yō ni shite, nani mo nokosanakatta.
51|43|Mata samūdo ni mo (shirushi ga atta). `Tsukanoma (no anata gata no nama) o tanoshime.' To iwa reta toki o omoiokoshi nasai.
51|44|Sonotoki kare-ra wa,-nushi no meirei ni ōhei ni somuitanode, are yo to mite iru ma ni kaminari ni osowa reta.
51|45|Mohaya kare-ra wa oki noboru koto mo dekizu, mata mamoru koto mo dekinakatta.
51|46|Izen ni mo, nūfu no min o (ware wa horoboshita). Hontōni kare-ra wa hangyaku no mindeatta.
51|47|Ware wa iryoku o motte ten o uchi-date, hate shinai hirogari ni shita.
51|48|Mata ware wa daichi o uchi hirogeta. Nanto migoto ni hirogeta koto yo.
51|49|Mata ware wa, subete no mono o ryōsei ni tsukutta. Anata gata wa kunkai o ukeirerudearou (to iu hairyo kara).
51|50|`Sorede anata gata wa, arrā no higo no shita ni omomuke. Hontōni watashi wa kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kōmeina keikoku-shadearu.
51|51|Sore de arrā to issho ni soto no kami o tatete wa naranai. Hontōni watashi wa, kare kara anata gata ni tsukawasa reta kōmeina keikoku-shadearu'.
51|52|Dōyō ni kare-ra izen no mono mo, shito ga kare-ra ni yattekuru tabi ni,`majutsu-shi ka, matawa kichigaida.' To itta.
51|53|Kare-ra wa sore o ikun to shite keishō shite kita no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa hōgai no mindearu.
51|54|Sore de, kare-ra o sakete sare. Anata gata wa (kare-ra no okonai ni taishite) togame wa nai nodearu.
51|55|Daga kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa shinja-tachi o ekisuru.
51|56|Jin to ningen o tsukutta no wa ware ni tsukae saseru tame.
51|57|Ware wa kare-ra ni don'na kate mo motomezu, mata fuyō sa reru koto mo motomenai.
51|58|Hontōni arrā koso wa, kate o sadzuke rareru okata, kengonaru iryoku no omode ara reru.
51|59|Akugyō no to no sazukari-bun (batsu) wa, kare-ra no nakama no sazukari-bun (batsu) to onajidearou.Dakara sō (ware o) sekitatenakute mo ī.
51|60|Shinkō shinai mono ni wazawai are. Yakusoku no hi ga kare-ra ni kanarazu yattekuru.
52|1|Kano (keiji no) yama ni kakete (chikau).
52|2|Seizento kakishirusa reta Keisuke ni kakete,
52|3|maka rete inai yōhishi ni,
52|4|fudan ni mōde rareru seiden ni kakete,
52|5|takaku kakage rareta tengai ni kakete,
52|6|minagiri (Yutaka? ) Reru taiyō ni kakete (chikau).
52|7|Hontōni omo no chōbatsu wa kanarazu kudaru.
52|8|Sore wa sake enai.
52|9|Sonohi, ten wa ōini yurayura to yure,
52|10|mata yamayama wa yurugi ugokudearou.
52|11|Sonohi,(shinri o) kyogidearu to shita mono ni wazawai are.
52|12|Munashī koto ni tawamurete ita-sha-tachi ni.
52|13|Kare-ra ga (monosugoi chikara de) jigoku no hi no naka ni tsuki otosa reru sonohi,
52|14|(kō iwa reyou. ) `Kore koso wa, anata gataga kyogidearu to shite ita jigoku no gōkadearu.
52|15|Kore demo majutsuna no ka. Soretomo anata gata wa, mienai no ka.
52|16|Anata gata wa soko de yaka reruga ī. Anata gataga sore o taeshinon demo, shinobanakute mo onaji koto. Anata gataga okonatta koto ni, mukui rareru dakedearu.'
52|17|-Nushi o osoreta-sha-tachi wa kanarazu rakuen no yorokobi no naka ni 置Ri,
52|18|-nushi ga kare-ra ni ataeru mono ni kanki shi, mata omo ga goku hi no chōbatsu kara kare-ra o sukuwa reta koto o yorokobu.
52|19|(Kare-ra ni wa iwa reyou. ) `Tanoshinde tabe, katsu nome. Kore mo anata gata no (yoi) okonai no tamedearu'.
52|20|Kare-ra wa narabe rareta sofā ni yorikakari, ware wa utsukushī-me no otome-tachi o kare-ra no haigūsha ni surudearou.
52|21|Shinkō suru mono-tachi, mata kare-ra ni shitagatta shinjinbukai shison no mono-tachi, ware wa, sorera no mono o (rakuen ni oite) isshonisuru. Kare-ra no subete no kōi ni taishi, sukoshi mo (hōshō o) keigen shinaidearou. Daremoga sono kasegi ni taishi, hōshū o ukeru.
52|22|Mata ware wa kudamono, niku, sono soto kare-ra no nozomu mono o ataeyou.
52|23|Kare-ra wa soko de tagaini hai o kawasou. Sono tokini mo munashī hanashi ni fukeru koto naku, ranbō mo okasanai.
52|24|Kare-ra no shū ni wa, hime rareta shinju no yōna kodomo ga kashizuite meguru.
52|25|Kare-ra wa tagaini chikayotte, tazune ai,
52|26|itte ita. `Izen, watashi-tachi wa kazoku no ma ni ite mo itsumo ki o nokotte ita.
52|27|Daga arrā wa, watashi-tachi ni onmegumi o atae rare, neppū no chōbatsu kara o sukui kudasa reta.
52|28|Izen kara watashi-tachi wa, kare ni inotte ita nodesu. Hontōni kare wa megumi atsuku, jihibukaki okata de ara reru'
52|29|sā, kare-ra ni kunkai shi nasai. Omo no onkei ni yotte, anata wa uranaishi demo kichigai demonai.
52|30|Mata kare-ra wa,`tada no shijinda. Kare no unsei ga gyakuten suru no o matou' to iu.
52|31|Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Matte iruga ī. Watashi mo anata gata to tomoni matte iyou.'
52|32|Ittai kare-ra no mazushī rikai-ryoku ga kō meijita no ka, soretomo kare-ra wa hōgaina min'na no ka.
52|33|Matawa,`kare (muhanmado) ga kore o gisaku shita nodearu.' To iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa shinjite wa inai nodearu.
52|34|Moshi kare-ra no kotoba ga shinjitsunara, kore to onaji o tsuge o motte kosa seruga yoi.
52|35|Kare-ra wa mu kara tsukura reta node wanai ka. Soretomo kare-ra jishin ga sōzō-shana no ka.
52|36|Soretomo kare-ra ga, ten to ji o sōzō shita no ka. Iya, kare-ra ni wa shikkari shita shinkō ga nai nodearu.
52|37|Soretomo kare-ra wa, anata no omo no samazamana takaramono o motte iru no ka. Matawa (jibutsu no) kanrishana no ka.
52|38|Soretomo kare-ra ni wa hashigo ga atte, sorede (ten ni nobori, sono himitsu o) kiku koto ga dekiru no ka. Sorenara kiita to iu mono ni, meikakuna shōko o motte kitasa seruga yoi.
52|39|Soretomo anata gata ni wa musuko ga atte, kare ni wa musume ga aru (dake) to iu no ka.
52|40|Soretomo anata ga, kare-ra ni hōshū o motome, sore de kare-ra wa fusai no omoni o otte iru to iu no ka.
52|41|Soretomo yūgen-kai no koto ga sukkari wakatte ite, sore o kakitomete iru to iu no ka.
52|42|Soretomo (anata ni taishite) sakuwomegurasu tsumori ka. Daga haishin-sha-tachi koso, sakubō ni kakarudearou.
52|43|Soretomo kare-ra wa, arrā igai ni kami ga aru to iu no ka. Arrā ni tatae are, kare wa haisuru mono (jashin) no ue ni ito takaku ora reru.
52|44|Tatoe ten'noikkaku ga (kare-ra no ue ni) ochiru no o mite mo, kare-ra wa,`tsumikasanatta kumodesu.' To iudearou.
52|45|Kare-ra wa,(osore no tame ni) soko ni kontō suru (shinpan no)-bi ni au made, hanatte oke.
52|46|Sonohi kare-ra no sakubō wa, nani no eki mo naku, kekkyoku kare-ra wa tasuke rarenaidearou.
52|47|Hontōni fugina okonai no mono ni wa, kono soto ni mo chōbatsu ga aru. Daga, kare-ra no ōku wa kidzukanai.
52|48|Sore de omo no sabaki o taeshinonde mate. Hontōni ware wa anata gata o mimamotte iru. Soshite anata ga tachiagaru toki wa,-nushi o tatae nasai.
52|49|Yonaka ni, mata shinshin ga shirizoku toki ni mo, kare o tatae nasai.
53|1|Shizumi yuku hoshi ni kakete (chikau).
53|2|Anata gata no dōryō wa, mayotte iru node wa naku, mata machigatte iru node mo nai.
53|3|Mata (jibun no) nozomu koto o itte iru node mo nai.
53|4|Sore wa kare ni keiji sa reta, o tsuge nihokanaranai.
53|5|Narabinai iryoku no mochinushi ga, kare ni oshieta no wa,
53|6|sugureta chiryoku no mochinushidearu. Massugu ni tatte,
53|7|kare wa chihei no mottomo takai tokoro ni arawareta.
53|8|Sore kara orite kite, chikadzuita.
53|9|Oyoso yumi 2tsu, iya sore yori mo chikai kyorideatta ka.Ta.
53|10|Soshite shimo be (muhanmado) ni, kare no keiji o tsugeta.
53|11|Kokoro wa jibun ga mita koto o itsuwaranai.
53|12|Kare no mita koto ni tsuite, anata gata wa kare to ronsō suru no ka.
53|13|Hontōni kare (muhanmado) wa, saido no kōka ni oite mo, kare (jiburīru) o mita nodearu.
53|14|(Dare mo kosenai) 涯 Ni aru, su~idora ki no hata de.
53|15|Sono soba ni tsui no sumai no rakuen ga aru.
53|16|Ōu mono ga su~idora ki o konmori to ōu toki.
53|17|(Kare no) shisen wa suiyose rare, mata (bushitsuke ni)-do o sugosu koto mo nai.
53|18|Kare wa tashika ni,-nushi no saidai no shirushi o mita nodearu.
53|19|Anata gata wa, arrāto to uzzā o (nanidearu to) kangaeru ka.
53|20|Sore kara dai 3-banme no manāto o.
53|21|Anata gata ni wa danshi ga ari, kare ni wa joshi ga aru to iu no ka.
53|22|Soredewa, hontōni futōna wakekatadearou.
53|23|Sorera wa, anata gata ya sosen-tachi ga nadzuketa (tada no) namae ni suginai. Arrā wa (don'na) ken'i o mo, sorera ni kudasa renakatta. Kare-ra (fushinjin-sha) wa, munashī okusoku ya shiyoku ni shitagatte iru nisuginai. Sudeni omo kara no michibiki ga, kare-ra ni kite irunoni.
53|24|Oyoso ningen ni wa, hoshīmono wa nani demo te ni hairu no ka.
53|25|Iya, raise mo gense mo, arrā no yūdearu.
53|26|Ten ni ikaga ni tenshi ga ite mo, arrā ga nozoma re, sono o yorokobi ni azukaru mono ni taisuru o yurushi ga deta nochidenakereba, kare-ra (tenshi) no torinashi wa nani no yaku ni mo tatanai.
53|27|Hontōni raise o shinjinai mono wa, tenshi ni josei no na o tsuke tari suru.
53|28|Kare-ra wa (nani no) chishiki mo naku, okusoku ni shitagau dakedearu. Daga shinri ni taishite wa, okusoku nado nani mo yakudatsu wake wanai.
53|29|Sorede anata wa ware no kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha, mata konoyo no seikatsu shika nozomanai mono kara tōzakare.
53|30|Kono teido (gense no seikatsu) ga, kare-ra no chishiki no todoku genkaidearu. Hontōni omo wa,-dō kara mayotte iru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Mata kare wa, michibiki o ukeru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru.
53|31|Hontōni ten ni ari-chi ni aru subete no mono wa, arrā no yūdearu. Dakara akugyō no itazurani wa fusawashī mukui o atae rare, mata zenkō no itazurani wa saizen no mono de mukuwa reru.
53|32|Chīsai go chi wa betsu to shite, taizai ya harenchina kōi o yokeru mono ni wa,-nushi no yōsha wa hontōni kōdaidearu. Kare wa daichi kara tsukuridasa reta toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mata, anata gataga haha no tainai ni hisonde ita toki no anata gata ni tsuite, mottomo yoku shitte ora reru. Dakara, anata gata wa jibun de seijō butte wa naranai. Kare wa omo o osoreru mono o mottomo yoku shitte ora reru.
53|33|Anata wa (shinri kara) somuki saru mono o mita ka.
53|34|Wazuka ni hodokoshi o shite wa,(-mono ka mi shite) tomeru.
53|35|Sōiu mono ni yūgen-kai no chishiki ga atte, sorede nani demo mieru to iu no ka.
53|36|Soretomo, mūsā no sho ni aru koto ga, tsuge rareta koto wa nai no ka.
53|37|Mata (yakusoku o) kanzen ni hatashita iburāhīmu no koto mo.
53|38|Omoni o ou mono wa, tanin no omoni o ou koto wa dekinai.
53|39|Ningen wa, sono doryoku shita mono igai, nani mo eru koto wa dekinai.
53|40|Sono doryoku (no seika) wa, yagate mitomerarerudearou.
53|41|Yagate hōshō wa, jūbun ni mukui rareru.
53|42|Hontōni anata no omoni koso, kichaku-sho wa aru.
53|43|Kare koso wa, warawase nakaseru okata.
53|44|Mata shina se, ikasu okatadearu.
53|45|Hontōni kare wa, otome no kumiawase o tsukura reta.
53|46|Sore mo seieki o fukikomu koto de.
53|47|Mata 2-dome no sōzō (no fukkatsu) mo, kare no okokoro no mamadearu.
53|48|Kare koso wa toma se, mata michitari saseru okata.
53|49|Mata ōkami hoshi (Shiriusu) no omo mo kono okata.
53|50|Kare wa mukashi ādo (no min) o horoboshi.
53|51|Mata samūdo mo hitori nokosazu horobosa reta.
53|52|Sore izen ni nūfu no min mo. Hontōni kare-ra wa, hidoi fugi, fusei no yakaradeatta.
53|53|Mata (sodomutogomora no yō ni) tenpuku sa reta sho toshi.
53|54|Soshite kare wa sore o ōi sara reta.
53|55|(Hitobito yo,) ittai-nushi no dono o megumi ni, anata gata wa iron o daku no ka.
53|56|Kore wa, mukashi no keikoku-sha-tachi to onaji hitori no keikoku-shadearu.
53|57|(Shinpan no toki wa) chikaku ni sematte kite iru.
53|58|Sore wa arrā no soto nanimono mo akiraka ni shi e enai.
53|59|Anata gata hako no hanashi o kiite odoroite iru no ka.
53|60|Chōshō wa shite mo, nakanai no ka.
53|61|Anata gata wa, ji 惚 No naka de toki o sugosu no ka.
53|62|Ichizu ni arrā ni sajida shi,(kare ni) tsukae nasai. 〔Sashida〕
54|1|toki wa chikadzuki, tsuki wa mijin ni saketa.
54|2|Kare-ra wa tatoe shirushi o mite mo, somuki satsute,`koreha aikawarazu no majutsuda.' To iudearou.
54|3|Kare-ra wa (kunkai o) kyogidearu to shi, jibun no yokubō ni shitagatte kita. Daga issai no koto ni wa, sadame rareta ketsumatsu ga aru.
54|4|Kore made, samazamana shōsoku wa, sudeni (chū? ) Sa re, sorede jūbun jisei dekita hazu.
54|5|Sore wa mezamashī eichideatta. Daga keikoku wa yakudatanakatta.
54|6|Dakara anata wa, kare-ra kara tōzakare. Shōshū-sha ga kirawa reru tokoro e yobidasu hi.
54|7|Kare-ra wa me o fusete, chōdo batta ga chirabaru yō ni hakaba kara dete kite,
54|8|shōshū-sha no kata ni isogu. Fushinjin-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa dainan no hidesu.'
54|9|Kare-ra izen ni, nūfu no min mo (sono yogen-sha o) kyogi to shi, waga shimo be o uso-tsuki yobawari shi,`kichigaidesu.' To itte tsuihō shita.
54|10|Sore de kare wa omoni,`watashi wa, hontōni chikaratsukimashita. Dō ka o tasuke kudasai.' To inotta.
54|11|Sorede ware wa, ten no sho mon o hiraki mizu o sosogi fura seta.
54|12|Mata daichi ni moroizumi o funshutsu sa se, mizu wa awasari, kanete no kami inochi ni yoru koto (kōzui) ga okita.
54|13|Shikashi ware wa ita to kugi de tsukutta mono (hakobune) ni kare o nosete yatta.
54|14|Waga mimamoru naka de sore wa hashitta. Kore ga (mina kara) shirizoke rareta ano mono e no mukuidearu.
54|15|Ware wa kore o hitotsu no shirushi to shite nokoshita. Sate dare ka satoro-sha wa aru ka.
54|16|Sā waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka.
54|17|Hontōni ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sā, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|18|Ādo (no min) mo (shinri o) kyogidearu to shita. Sorede waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka.
54|19|Ware wa saiyaku no uchitsudzuku hi ni, kare-ra ni taishi arekuruu kaze o okutta.
54|20|Suruto ningen wa, nekosogi ni natta. Natsumeyan no kirikabu no yō ni, mushiri sara reta.
54|21|Ano toki no waga chōbatsu to imashime to wa dōdeatta ka.
54|22|Makotoni ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku tokiakashita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|23|Samūdo (mo mata) keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.
54|24|Soshite kare-ra wa itta. `Nani to, watashi-tachi no naka no ikkai no ningende wanaidesu ka. Dōshite kon'na mono ni shitagaimasu ka. Sore koso jadō, kichigaizatadesu.
54|25|Watashi-tachi no ma de kare dake ni keiji ga kudasa reta nodesu ka. Iya, kare wa ōuso-tsukidesu.'
54|26|(Ōse rareta. ) `Kare-ra wa ashita shirudearou. Dochira ga daiuso-tsukidearu ka o.
54|27|Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra o kokoromiru tame mesu rakuda o okurudearou. Anata wa taeshinobi kare-ra o mimamore.
54|28|Soshite kare-ra ni rakuda to mizu o bunpai shi, junban ni nomu yō tsutae nasai.
54|29|Daga kare-ra wa nakama o yobiyose, sono otoko wa (ken o) te ni toru to hiza no ken o kitte shimatta.
54|30|Sonotoki no waga chōbatsu to imashime to ga dōdeatta ka.
54|31|Hontōni ware wa, kare-ra ni mukakkate (mimi o tsunzaku) hitokoe o kudasu to, kare-ra wa kachiku no kakoi ni tsukawareru kare kabu no yō ni natta.
54|32|Ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sate, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|33|Rūto no min mo keikoku o kyogidearu to shita.
54|34|Ware wa saseki no arashi o kare-ra ni okutta. Rūto no kazoku dake wa betsudeatta. Reimei ni kare-ra o sukui,
54|35|ware kara no onkei to shita. Ko no yō ni ware wa kansha suru mono ni mukuiru.
54|36|(Rūto wa) waga chōbatsu o kare-ra ni keikoku shita nodaga, kare-ra wa sono keikoku ni tsuite giwaku no nen o daita.
54|37|Soshite kare no hinkyaku (tenshi) o, kare kara ubaou to shitanode, ware wa kare-ra no me o tsubushita. `Sā, waga chōbatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|38|Akuru asa, eien no chōbatsu ga kare-ra ni kudatta.
54|39|`Sā waga chōbatsu to keikoku o ajiwae.'
54|40|Ware wa, kuruān o yasashiku toki mei shita. Sā, dareka satoru mono ga aru ka.
54|41|Hontōni firuaun no ichizoku ni mo keikoku-sha ga tsukawasa reta.
54|42|(Daga) ware no shuju no shirushi o kyogidearu to shita. Sorede ware wa, idaide kyōryokuna mono no ichi (kumi? ) Mi de, kare-ra o toraeta.
54|43|Anata gata fushinjin-sha (kuraishu-zoku) no kata ga, korera no mono yori mo sugurete iru no ka. Soretomo Keisuke no naka ni anata gata no tame no shamen ga aru no ka.
54|44|Soretomo kare-ra wa,`watashi-tachi wa mina shōri o eru monodesu.' To demo iu no ka.
54|45|Yagate korera no hitobito wa yabure sari, nige sarudearou.
54|46|Iya (shinpan no)-ji wa, kare-ra ni yakusoku sa reta kigendearu. Shikamo sono tokiniha, mottomo nagekawashī mottomo kurushī me ni audearou.
